 14083                                  ;	GetExtent
 14084                                  ;	SetExtent
 14085                                  ;	GetExtended
 14086                                  ;	GetRecSize
 14087                                  ;	FCBIO
 14088                                  ;	$FCB_OPEN
 14089                                  ;	$FCB_CREATE
 14090                                  ;	$FCB_RANDOM_WRITE_BLOCK
 14091                                  ;	$FCB_RANDOM_READ_BLOCK
 14092                                  ;	$FCB_SEQ_READ
 14093                                  ;	$FCB_SEQ_WRITE
 14094                                  ;	$FCB_RANDOM_READ
 14095                                  ;	$FCB_RANDOM_WRITE
 14096                                  ;
 14097                                  ;	Revision history:
 14098                                  ;
 14099                                  ;		Created: ARR 4 April 1983
 14100                                  ;			 MZ  6 June  1983 completion of functions
 14101                                  ;			 MZ 15 Dec   1983 Brain damaged programs close FCBs multiple
 14102                                  ;				  times.  Change so successive closes work by
 14103                                  ;				  always returning OK.	Also, detect I/O to
 14104                                  ;				  already closed FCB and return EOF.
 14105                                  ;		 MZ 16 Jan   1984 More braindamage.  Need to separate info
 14106                                  ;				  out of sft into FCB for reconnection
 14107                                  ;
 14108                                  ;	    A000   version 4.00	Jan. 1988
 14109                                  
 14110                                  ; Defintions for FCBOp flags
 14111                                  
 14112                                  RANDOM	equ 2				; random operation
 14113                                  FCBREAD equ 4				; doing a read
 14114                                  BLOCK	equ 8				; doing a block I/O
 14115                                  
 14116                                  ;Break <GetRR - return the random record field in DX:AX>
 14117                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14118                                  ;
 14119                                  ;   GetRR - correctly load DX:AX with the random record field (3 or 4 bytes)
 14120                                  ;	from the FCB pointed to by DS:SI
 14121                                  ;
 14122                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to an FCB
 14123                                  ;		BX has record size
 14124                                  ;   Outputs:	DX:AX contain the contents of the random record field
 14125                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 14126                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14127                                  
 14128                                  GetRR:
 14129                                  	;mov	ax,[si+21h]
 14130 00001D30 8B4421                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RR]	; get low order part
 14131                                  	;mov	dx,[si+23h]
 14132 00001D33 8B5423                  	MOV	DX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+2]	; get high order part
 14133 00001D36 83FB40                  	CMP	BX,64			; ignore MSB of RR if recsiz > 64
 14134 00001D39 7202                    	JB	short GetRRBye
 14135 00001D3B 30F6                    	XOR	DH,DH
 14136                                  GetRRBye:
 14137 00001D3D C3                      	retn
 14138                                  
 14139                                  ;Break <GetExtent - retrieve next location for sequential IO>
 14140                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14141                                  ;
 14142                                  ;   GetExtent - Construct the next record to perform I/O from the EXTENT and
 14143                                  ;	NR fields in the FCB.
 14144                                  ;
 14145                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI - point to FCB
 14146                                  ;   Outputs:	DX:AX contain the contents of the random record field
 14147                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 14148                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14149                                  
 14150                                  GetExtent:
 14151                                  	;mov	al,[si+20h]
 14152 00001D3E 8A4420                  	MOV	AL,[SI+SYS_FCB.NR]	; get low order piece
 14153                                  	;mov	dx,[si+0Ch]
 14154 00001D41 8B540C                  	MOV	DX,[SI+SYS_FCB.EXTENT]	; get high order piece
 14155 00001D44 D0E0                    	SHL	AL,1
 14156 00001D46 D1EA                    	SHR	DX,1
 14157 00001D48 D0D8                    	RCR	AL,1	; move low order bit of DL to high order of AH
 14158 00001D4A 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 14159 00001D4C 88F2                    	MOV	DL,DH
 14160 00001D4E 30F6                    	XOR	DH,DH
 14161 00001D50 C3                      	retn
 14162                                  
 14163                                  ;Break <SetExtent - update the extent/NR field>
 14164                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14165                                  ;
 14166                                  ;   SetExtent - change the position of an FCB by filling in the extent/NR
 14167                                  ;	fields
 14168                                  ;
 14169                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to FCB
 14170                                  ;		DX:AX is a record location in file
 14171                                  ;   Outputs:	Extent/NR fields are filled in
 14172                                  ;   Registers modified: CX
 14173                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14174                                  
 14175                                  SetExtent:
 14176 00001D51 50                      	push	ax
 14177 00001D52 52                      	push	dx
 14178 00001D53 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX
 14179 00001D55 247F                    	AND	AL,7FH			; next rec field
 14180                                  	;mov	[si+20h],al
 14181 00001D57 884420                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.NR],AL
 14182 00001D5A 80E180                  	AND	CL,80H			; save upper bit
 14183 00001D5D D1E1                    	SHL	CX,1
 14184 00001D5F D1D2                    	RCL	DX,1			; move high bit of CX to low bit of DX
 14185 00001D61 88E8                    	MOV	AL,CH
 14186 00001D63 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 14187                                  	;mov	[si+0Ch], ax
 14188 00001D65 89440C                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.EXTENT],AX	; all done
 14189 00001D68 5A                      	pop	dx
 14190 00001D69 58                      	pop	ax
 14191 00001D6A C3                      	retn
 14192                                  
 14193                                  ;Break <GetExtended - find FCB in potential extended fcb>
 14194                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14195                                  ;
 14196                                  ;   GetExtended - Make DS:SI point to FCB from DS:DX
 14197                                  ;
 14198                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a possible extended FCB
 14199                                  ;   Outputs:	DS:SI point to the FCB part
 14200                                  ;		zeroflag set if not extended fcb
 14201                                  ;   Registers modified: SI
 14202                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14203                                  
 14204                                  GetExtended:
 14205 00001D6B 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; point to Something
 14206 00001D6D 803CFF                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],-1		; look for extention
 14207 00001D70 7503                    	JNZ	short GetBye		; not there
 14208 00001D72 83C607                  	ADD	SI,7			; point to FCB
 14209                                  GetBye:
 14210 00001D75 39D6                    	CMP	SI,DX			; set condition codes
 14211                                  getextd_retn:
 14212 00001D77 C3                      	retn
 14213                                  
 14214                                  ;Break <GetRecSize - return in BX the FCB record size>
 14215                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14216                                  ;
 14217                                  ;   GetRecSize - return in BX the record size from the FCB at DS:SI
 14218                                  ;
 14219                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to a non-extended FCB
 14220                                  ;   Outputs:	BX contains the record size
 14221                                  ;   Registers modified: None
 14222                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14223                                  
 14224                                  	; 07/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 14225                                  GetRecSize:
 14226                                  	;mov	bx,[si+0Eh]
 14227 00001D78 8B5C0E                  	MOV	BX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ]	; get his record size
 14228 00001D7B 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX			; is it nul?
 14229 00001D7D 74F8                    	jz	short getextd_retn
 14230 00001D7F BB8000                  	MOV	BX,128			; use default size
 14231                                  	;mov	[si+0Eh],bx
 14232 00001D82 895C0E                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ],BX	; stuff it back
 14233 00001D85 C3                      	retn
 14234                                  
 14235                                  ;BREAK <FCBIO - do internal FCB I/O>
 14236                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14237                                  ;
 14238                                  ;   FCBIO - look at FCBOP and merge all FCB operations into a single routine.
 14239                                  ;
 14240                                  ;   Inputs:	FCBOP flags which operations need to be performed
 14241                                  ;		DS:DX point to FCB
 14242                                  ;		CX may have count of number of records to xfer
 14243                                  ;   Outputs:	AL has error code
 14244                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 14245                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14246                                  
 14247                                  	; 09/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 14248                                  	; DOSCODE:5B17h (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 14249                                  FCBIO:
 14250                                  
 14251                                  FEOF	EQU	1
 14252                                  FTRIM	EQU	2
 14253                                  
 14254                                  %define	FCBErr	byte [bp-1]  ; byte	
 14255                                  %define	cRec	word [bp-3]  ; word	
 14256                                  ;%define RecPos	word [bp-7]  ; dword
 14257                                  %define RecPosL	word [bp-7]  ; word
 14258                                  %define RecPosH	word [bp-5]  ; word
 14259                                  %define	RecSize	word [bp-9]  ; word
 14260                                  ;%define bPos	word [bp-13] ; dword
 14261                                  %define bPosL	word [bp-13] ; word
 14262                                  %define bPosH	word [bp-11] ; word
 14263                                  %define cByte	word [bp-15] ; word	
 14264                                  %define cResult word [bp-17] ; word	
 14265                                  %define	cRecRes	word [bp-19] ; word
 14266                                  %define	FCBOp	byte [bp-20] ; byte
 14267                                  
 14268                                  	;Enter
 14269                                  
 14270 00001D86 55                      	push	bp
 14271 00001D87 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 14272 00001D89 83EC14                  	sub	sp,20
 14273                                  	;mov	[bp-20],al
 14274 00001D8C 8846EC                  	MOV	FCBOp,AL
 14275                                  	;mov	byte [bp-1],0
 14276 00001D8F C646FF00                	MOV	FCBErr,0		;   FCBErr = 0;
 14277 00001D93 E8D5FF                  	call	GetExtended		;   FCB = GetExtended ();
 14278                                  	;test	byte [bp-20],8
 14279 00001D96 F646EC08                	TEST	FCBOp,BLOCK		;   if ((OP&BLOCK) == 0)
 14280 00001D9A 7503                    	JNZ	short GetPos
 14281 00001D9C B90100                  	MOV	CX,1			;	cRec = 1;
 14282                                  GetPos:
 14283                                  	;mov	[bp-3],cx
 14284 00001D9F 894EFD                  	MOV	cRec,CX 		;*Tail coalesce
 14285 00001DA2 E899FF                  	call	GetExtent		;   RecPos = GetExtent ();
 14286 00001DA5 E8D0FF                  	call	GetRecSize		;   RecSize = GetRecSize ();
 14287                                  	;mov	[bp-9],bx
 14288 00001DA8 895EF7                  	MOV	RecSize,BX
 14289                                  	;test	byte [bp-20],2
 14290 00001DAB F646EC02                	TEST	FCBOp,RANDOM		;   if ((OP&RANDOM) <> 0)
 14291 00001DAF 7403                    	JZ	short GetRec
 14292 00001DB1 E87CFF                  	call	GetRR			;	RecPos = GetRR ();
 14293                                  GetRec:
 14294                                  	;mov	[bp-7],ax
 14295 00001DB4 8946F9                  	MOV	RecPosL,AX		;*Tail coalesce
 14296                                  	;mov	[bp-5],dx
 14297 00001DB7 8956FB                  	MOV	RecPosH,DX
 14298 00001DBA E894FF                  	call	SetExtent		;   SetExtent (RecPos);
 14299                                  	;mov	ax,[bp-5]
 14300 00001DBD 8B46FB                  	MOV	AX,RecPosH		;   bPos = RecPos * RecSize;
 14301 00001DC0 F7E3                    	MUL	BX
 14302 00001DC2 89C7                    	MOV	DI,AX
 14303                                  	;mov	ax,[bp-7]
 14304 00001DC4 8B46F9                  	MOV	AX,RecPosL
 14305 00001DC7 F7E3                    	MUL	BX
 14306 00001DC9 01FA                    	ADD	DX,DI
 14307                                  	;mov	[bp-13],ax
 14308 00001DCB 8946F3                  	MOV	bPosL,AX
 14309                                  	;mov	[bp-11],dx
 14310 00001DCE 8956F5                  	MOV	bPosH,DX
 14311                                  	;mov	ax,[bp-3]
 14312 00001DD1 8B46FD                  	MOV	AX,cRec 		;   cByte = cRec * RecSize;
 14313 00001DD4 F7E3                    	MUL	BX
 14314                                  	;mov	[bp-15],ax
 14315 00001DD6 8946F1                  	MOV	cByte,AX
 14316                                  
 14317                                  ;hkn; 	SS override
 14318 00001DD9 360306[2C03]            	ADD	AX,[SS:DMAADD]		;   if (cByte+DMA > 64K) {
 14319 00001DDE 83D200                  	ADC	DX,0
 14320 00001DE1 7419                    	JZ	short DoOper
 14321                                  	;mov	byte [bp-1],2
 14322 00001DE3 C646FF02                	MOV	FCBErr,FTRIM		;	FCBErr = FTRIM;
 14323                                  
 14324                                  ;hkn; 	SS override
 14325 00001DE7 36A1[2C03]              	MOV	AX,[SS:DMAADD]		;	cRec = (64K-DMA)/RecSize;
 14326 00001DEB F7D8                    	NEG	AX
 14327 00001DED 7501                    	JNZ	short DoDiv
 14328 00001DEF 48                      	DEC	AX
 14329                                  DoDiv:
 14330 00001DF0 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 14331 00001DF2 F7F3                    	DIV	BX
 14332                                  	;mov	[bp-3],ax
 14333 00001DF4 8946FD                  	MOV	cRec,AX
 14334 00001DF7 F7E3                    	MUL	BX			;	cByte = cRec * RecSize;
 14335                                  	;mov	[bp-15],ax
 14336 00001DF9 8946F1                  	MOV	cByte,AX		;	}
 14337                                  DoOper:
 14338 00001DFC 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX
 14339                                  	;mov	[bp-17],bx
 14340 00001DFE 895EEF                  	MOV	cResult,BX		;   cResult = 0;
 14341                                  	;cmp	[bp-15],bx
 14342 00001E01 395EF1                  	CMP	cByte,BX		;   if (cByte <> 0 ||
 14343 00001E04 7506                    	JNZ	short DoGetExt
 14344                                  	;test	byte [bp-1],2
 14345 00001E06 F646FF02                	TEST	FCBErr,FTRIM		;	(FCBErr&FTRIM) == 0) {
 14346                                  	;JZ	short DoGetExt
 14347                                  	;JMP	short SkipOp
 14348                                  	; 16/12/2022
 14349 00001E0A 7576                    	jnz	short SkipOp
 14350                                  	; 09/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 14351                                  	;JZ	short DoGetExt
 14352                                  	;JMP	short SkipOp
 14353                                  DoGetExt:

 14355 00001E0F 730F                    	JNC	short ContinueOp
 14356                                  FCBDeath:
 14357 00001E11 E87BE8                  	call	FCB_RET_ERR		; signal error, map for extended
 14358                                  	;mov	word [bp-19],0
 14359 00001E14 C746ED0000              	MOV	cRecRes,0		; no bytes transferred
 14360                                  	;mov	byte [bp-1],1
 14361 00001E19 C646FF01                	MOV	FCBErr,FEOF		;	    return FTRIM;
 14362 00001E1D E9EF00                  	JMP	FCBSave 		; bam!
 14363                                  ContinueOp:
 14364                                  	;mov	ax,[si+10h]
 14365 00001E20 8B4410                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SYS_FCB.FILSIZ]
 14366                                  	;mov	[es:di+11h],ax

 14368                                  	;mov	ax,[si+12h]

 14370                                  	;mov	[es:di+13h],ax

 14372                                  	;mov	ax,[bp-13]

 14379 00001E38 26875517                	XCHG	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position+2],DX
 14380 00001E3C 52                      	PUSH	DX			; save away Open age.
 14381                                  	;mov	cx,[bp-15]
 14382 00001E3D 8B4EF1                  	MOV	CX,cByte		;	cResult =
 14383                                  
 14384                                  ;hkn; DOS_Read is in DOSCODE
 14385 00001E40 BF[E833]                	MOV	DI,DOS_READ		;	    *(OP&FCBRead ? DOS_Read
 14386                                  	;test	byte [bp-20],4

 14389

 14392                                  DoContext:

 14396

 14400                                  
 14401                                  ;; Fix for disk full
 14402 00001E51 FFD7                    	CALL	DI	; DOS_READ or DOS_WRITE	
 14403                                  	
 14404 00001E53 5E                      	pop	si
 14405 00001E54 1F                      	pop	ds
 14406 00001E55 5D                      	pop	bp
 14407 00001E56 72B9                    	JC	short FCBDeath
 14408

 14430                                  					;	}

 14433 00001E82 8B46EF                  	MOV	AX,cResult		;   cRecRes = cResult / RecSize;

 14441                                  	;adc	word [bp-5],0
 14442 00001E90 8356FB00                	ADC	RecPosH,0
 14443                                  
 14444                                  ; If we have not gotten the expected number of records, we signal an EOF
 14445                                  ; condition. On input, this is EOF. On output this is usually disk full.
 14446                                  ; BUT... Under 2.0 and before, all device output IGNORED this condition. So

 14519 00001EFE F646EC04                	TEST	FCBOp,FCBREAD		;   if (!(FCBOP & FCBREAD)) {

 14539 00001F1E 8A46FF                  	MOV	AL,FCBErr		;   return (FCBERR);
 14540                                  	;Leave	
 14541 00001F21 89EC                    	mov     sp,bp
 14542 00001F23 5D                      	pop     bp
 14543 00001F24 C3                      	retn

 14547                                  ;Break <$FCB_Open - open an old-style FCB>
 14548                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14549                                  ;
 14550                                  ;   $FCB_Open - CPM compatability file open. The user has formatted an FCB
 14551                                  ;	for us and asked to have the rest filled in.
 14552                                  ;
 14553                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an unopenned FCB
 14554                                  ;   Outputs:	AL indicates status 0 is ok FF is error
 14555                                  ;		FCB has the following fields filled in:
 14556                                  ;		    Time/Date Extent/NR Size
 14557                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14558                                  
 14559                                  _$FCB_OPEN:			; System call 15
 14560                                  
 14561 00001F25 B80200                  	MOV	AX,SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 14562                                  
 14563                                  ;hkn; DOS_Open is in DOSCODE
 14564 00001F28 B9[882C]                	MOV	CX,DOS_OPEN
 14565                                  
 14566                                  ; The following is common code for Creation and openning of FCBs. AX is
 14567                                  ; either attributes (for create) or open mode (for open)... DS:DX points to
 14568                                  ; the FCB
 14569                                  
 14570                                  DoAccess:
 14571 00001F2B 1E                      	push	ds
 14572 00001F2C 52                      	push	dx
 14573 00001F2D 51                      	push	cx
 14574 00001F2E 50                      	push	ax			; save FCB pointer away
 14575                                  
 14576                                  ;hkn; 	OpenBuf is in DOSDATA
 14577 00001F2F BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF
 14578 00001F32 E8124D                  	call	TransFCB		; crunch the fcb
 14579 00001F35 58                      	pop	ax
 14580 00001F36 59                      	pop	cx
 14581 00001F37 5A                      	pop	dx
 14582 00001F38 1F                      	pop	ds			; get fcb
 14583 00001F39 7303                    	JNC	short FindFCB		; everything seems ok
 14584                                  FCBOpenErr:
 14585                                  	; AL has error code
 14586 00001F3B E951E7                  	jmp	FCB_RET_ERR
 14587                                  FindFCB:
 14588 00001F3E E82AFE                  	call	GetExtended		; DS:SI will point to FCB
 14589                                  
 14590                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14591                                  
 14592                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 14593                                  	;call	LRUFCB
 14594                                  	;jc	short HardMessage
 14595                                  
 14596                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 14597 00001F41 50                      	push	ax
 14598 00001F42 B001                    	mov	al,1			;indicate Open/Create operation
 14599 00001F44 E820FB                  	call	LRUFCB			; get a sft entry (no error)
 14600 00001F47 58                      	pop	ax
 14601 00001F48 722A                    	jc	short HardMessage
 14602                                  	
 14603                                  	;mov	word [es:di+2],8000h
 14604 00001F4A 26C745020080            	mov	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB
 14605 00001F50 1E                      	push	ds
 14606 00001F51 56                      	push	si	
 14607 00001F52 53                      	push	bx			; save fcb pointer
 14608 00001F53 89CE                    	MOV	SI,CX
 14609                                  
 14610                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 14611 00001F55 16                      	push	ss
 14612 00001F56 1F                      	pop	ds			    ; let DOS_Open see variables
 14613 00001F57 FFD6                    	CALL	SI ; DOS_OPEN or DOS_CREATE ; go open the file
 14614 00001F59 5B                      	pop	bx
 14615 00001F5A 5E                      	pop	si
 14616 00001F5B 1F                      	pop	ds			; get fcb
 14617                                  
 14618                                  ;hkn; SS override
 14619 00001F5C 36C43E[9E05]            	LES	DI,[SS:THISSFT]		; get sf pointer
 14620 00001F61 7318                    	JNC	short FCBOK		; operation succeeded
 14621                                  failopen:
 14622 00001F63 50                      	PUSH	AX
 14623 00001F64 B052                    	MOV	AL,"R"	; 52h		; clear out field (free sft)
 14624 00001F66 E8E5FC                  	call	BlastSFT
 14625 00001F69 58                      	POP	AX
 14626                                  	;cmp	ax,4
 14627 00001F6A 83F804                  	CMP	AX,error_too_many_open_files
 14628 00001F6D 7405                    	JZ	short HardMessage
 14629                                  	;cmp	ax,24h
 14630 00001F6F 83F824                  	CMP	AX,error_sharing_buffer_exceeded
 14631 00001F72 7505                    	jnz	short DeadFCB
 14632                                  HardMessage:
 14633 00001F74 50                      	PUSH	AX
 14634 00001F75 E897FD                  	call	FCBHardErr
 14635 00001F78 58                      	POP	AX
 14636                                  DeadFCB:
 14637                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 14638                                  	;jmp	FCB_RET_ERR
 14639 00001F79 EBC0                    	jmp	short FCBOpenErr
 14640                                  FCBOK:
 14641                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 14642 00001F7B E8D5F3                  	call	IsSFTNet		;AN007;F.C. >32mb  Non Fat file?
 14643 00001F7E 750F                    	JNZ	short FCBOK2		;AN007;F.C. >32mb  yes
 14644 00001F80 E8F054                  	call	CheckShare		;AN000;F.C. >32mb  share around?
 14645 00001F83 750A                    	JNZ	short FCBOK2		;AN000;F.C. >32mb  yes
 14646                                  ;SR;
 14647                                  ; If we reach here, we know we have got a local SFT. Let's update the 
 14648                                  ; LocalSFT variable to reflect this.
 14649                                  
 14650 00001F85 36893E[8910]            	mov	[ss:LocalSFT],di
 14651 00001F8A 368C06[8B10]            	mov	[ss:LocalSFT+2],es; Store the SFT address
 14652                                  ;;SR;
 14653                                  ;; The check below is not valid anymore since we regenerate for media > 32M.
 14654                                  ;;
 14655                                  ;;	CMP	WORD [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_dirsec+2],0 
 14656                                  ;;					       ;AN000;F.C. >32mb  if dirsec >32mb
 14657                                  ;;	JZ	short FCBOK2		       ;AN000;F.C. >32mb    then error
 14658                                  ;;	MOV	AX,error_sys_comp_not_loaded   ;AN000;F.C. >32mb
 14659                                  ;;	JMP	short failopen		       ;AN000;F.C. >32mb
 14660                                  
 14661                                  FCBOK2:
 14662                                  	; MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 14663 00001F8F 26FF05                  	inc	word [es:di]
 14664                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count] ; increment reference count
 14665 00001F92 E802FA                  	call	SaveFCBInfo
 14666                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 14667                                  	;call	SetOpenAge
 14668                                  	; MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 14669                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],80h
 14670                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device
 14671 00001F95 26F6450580              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device  ; 28/07/2019
 14672 00001F9A 7508                    	JNZ	short FCBNoDrive	; do not munge drive on devices
 14673 00001F9C 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]			; get drive byte
 14674 00001F9E E8314C                  	call	GETTHISDRV		; convert
 14675                                  	;INC	AL
 14676                                  	; 17/12/2022
 14677 00001FA1 40                      	inc	ax
 14678 00001FA2 8804                    	MOV	[SI],AL			; stash in good drive letter
 14679                                  FCBNoDrive:
 14680                                  	;mov	word [si+0Eh],128
 14681 00001FA4 C7440E8000              	MOV	word [SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ],80h ; stuff in default record size
 14682                                  
 14683                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+0Dh]
 14684 00001FA9 268B450D                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time] ; set time
 14685                                  	;mov	[si+16h],ax
 14686 00001FAD 894416                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FTIME],AX
 14687                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+0Fh]
 14688 00001FB0 268B450F                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date] ; set date
 14689                                  	;mov	[si+14h],ax
 14690 00001FB4 894414                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FDATE],AX
 14691                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+11h]
 14692 00001FB7 268B4511                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size] ; set sizes
 14693                                  	;mov	[si+10h],ax
 14694 00001FBB 894410                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FILSIZ],AX
 14695                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+13h]
 14696 00001FBE 268B4513                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size+2]
 14697                                  	;mov	[si+12h],ax
 14698 00001FC2 894412                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.FILSIZ+2],AX
 14699 00001FC5 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			; convenient zero
 14700                                  	;mov	[si+0Ch],ax
 14701 00001FC7 89440C                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.EXTENT],AX	; point to beginning of file
 14702                                  
 14703                                  ; We must scan the set of FCB SFTs for one that appears to match the current
 14704                                  ; one.	We cheat and use CheckFCB to match the FCBs.
 14705                                  
 14706                                  ;hkn; 	SS override
 14707 00001FCA 36C43E[4000]            	LES	DI,[SS:SFTFCB]		; get the pointer to head of the list
 14708                                  	;mov	ah,[es:di+4]
 14709 00001FCF 268A6504                	MOV	AH,[ES:DI+SFT.SFCount]	; get number of SFTs to scan
 14710                                  OpenScan:
 14711                                  	;cmp	al,[si+18h]
 14712 00001FD3 3A4418                  	CMP	AL,[SI+fcb_sfn]		; don't compare ourselves
 14713 00001FD6 7407                    	JZ	short SkipCheck
 14714 00001FD8 50                      	push	ax			; preserve count
 14715 00001FD9 E888FC                  	call	CheckFCB		; do they match
 14716 00001FDC 58                      	pop	ax			; get count back
 14717 00001FDD 7309                    	JNC	short OpenFound		; found a match!
 14718                                  SkipCheck:
 14719 00001FDF FEC0                    	INC	AL			; advance to next FCB
 14720 00001FE1 38E0                    	CMP	AL,AH			; table full?
 14721 00001FE3 75EE                    	JNZ	short OpenScan		; no, go for more
 14722                                  OpenDone:
 14723 00001FE5 30C0                    	xor	al,al			; return success
 14724 00001FE7 C3                      	retn
 14725                                  
 14726                                  ; The SFT at ES:DI is the one that is already in use for this FCB. We set the
 14727                                  ; FCB to use this one. We increment its ref count. We do NOT close it at all.
 14728                                  ; Consider:
 14729                                  ;
 14730                                  ;   open (foo)	delete (foo) open (bar)
 14731                                  ;
 14732                                  ; This causes us to recycle (potentially) bar through the same local SFT as
 14733                                  ; foo even though foo is no longer needed; this is due to the server closing
 14734                                  ; foo for us when we delete it. Unfortunately, we cannot see this closure.
 14735                                  ; If we were to CLOSE bar, the server would then close the only reference to
 14736                                  ; bar and subsequent I/O would be lost to the redirector.
 14737                                  ;
 14738                                  ; This gets solved by NOT closing the sft, but zeroing the ref count
 14739                                  ; (effectively freeing the SFT) and informing the sharer (if relevant) that
 14740                                  ; the SFT is no longer in use. Note that the SHARER MUST keep its ref counts
 14741                                  ; around. This will allow us to access the same file through multiple network
 14742                                  ; connections and NOT prematurely terminate when the ref count on one
 14743                                  ; connection goes to zero.
 14744                                  
 14745                                  OpenFound:
 14746                                  	;mov	[si+18h],al
 14747 00001FE8 884418                  	MOV	[SI+fcb_sfn],AL 	; assign with this
 14748 00001FEB 26FF05                  	inc	word [es:di]
 14749                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 14750                                  					; remember this new invocation
 14751 00001FEE 36A1[1000]              	MOV	AX,[SS:FCBLRU]		; update LRU counts
 14752                                  	;mov	[es:di+15h],ax
 14753 00001FF2 26894515                	MOV	[ES:DI+sf_LRU],AX
 14754                                  ;
 14755                                  ; We have an FCB sft that is now of no use.  We release sharing info and then
 14756                                  ; blast it to prevent other reuse.
 14757                                  ;
 14758 00001FF6 16                      	push	ss
 14759 00001FF7 1F                      	pop	ds
 14760 00001FF8 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 14761 00001FFC 26FF0D                  	dec	word [es:di]
 14762                                  	;DEC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 14763                                  					; free the newly allocated SFT
 14764 00001FFF E8A954                  	call	ShareEnd
 14765 00002002 B043                    	MOV	AL,'C'	 ; 43h
 14766 00002004 E847FC                  	call	BlastSFT
 14767 00002007 EBDC                    	JMP	short OpenDone
 14768                                  
 14769                                  ;BREAK	<$FCB_Create - create a new directory entry>

 14772                                  ;   $FCB_Create - CPM compatability file create. The user has formatted an
 14773                                  ;	FCB for us and asked to have the rest filled in.
 14774                                  ;
 14775                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an unopenned FCB

 14893                                  ; 22/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 14895                                  
 14896                                  ; DOSCODE:5DDFh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 14897                                  
 14898                                  ; 09/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 14899                                  ; DOSCODE:5DCBh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 14900                                  
 14901                                  ;**	Search.asm
 14902                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14903                                  ;	Directory search system calls.
 14904                                  ;	These will be passed direct text of the pathname from the user. 
 14905                                  ;	They will need to be passed through the macro expander prior to
 14906                                  ;	being sent through the low-level stuff. 
 14907                                  ;	I/O specs are defined in DISPATCH. The system calls are:
 14908                                  ;
 14909                                  ;	$Dir_Search_First	  written
 14910                                  ;	$Dir_Search_Next	  written
 14911                                  ;	$Find_First	  written
 14912                                  ;	$Find_Next		  written
 14913                                  ;	PackName		  written
 14914                                  ;
 14915                                  ;	Modification history:
 14916                                  ;
 14917                                  ;	  Created: ARR 4 April 1983
 14918                                  
 14919                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14920                                  ; Procedure Name : $DIR_SEARCH_FIRST
 14921                                  ;
 14922                                  ; Inputs:
 14923                                  ;	DS:DX Points to unopenned FCB
 14924                                  ; Function:
 14925                                  ;	Directory is searched for first matching entry and the directory
 14926                                  ;	entry is loaded at the disk transfer address
 14927                                  ; Returns:
 14928                                  ;	AL = -1 if no entries matched, otherwise 0
 14929                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14930                                  
 14931                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 2B88h
 14932                                  
 14933                                  _$DIR_SEARCH_FIRST:
 14934 00002037 368916[A605]            	MOV	[SS:THISFCB],DX
 14935 0000203C 368C1E[A805]            	MOV	[SS:THISFCB+2],DS
 14936 00002041 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX
 14937 00002043 803CFF                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0FFH
 14938 00002046 7503                    	JNZ	short NORMFCB4
 14939 00002048 83C607                  	ADD	SI,7			; Point to drive select byte
 14940                                  NORMFCB4:
 14941 0000204B FF34                    	push	word [SI]		; Save original drive byte for later
 14942                                  
 14943 0000204D 16                      	push	ss
 14944 0000204E 07                      	pop	es			; get es to address DOSGroup
 14945                                  
 14946 0000204F BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		; appropriate buffer
 14947 00002052 E8F24B                  	call	TransFCB		; convert the FCB, set SATTRIB EXTFCB
 14948 00002055 7304                    	JNC	short SearchIt		; no error, go and look
 14949 00002057 5B                      	pop	bx			; Clean stack
 14950                                  
 14951                                  ; Error code is in AX
 14952                                  
 14953                                  	; 09/11/2022
 14954                                  dcf_errj:
 14955 00002058 E934E6                  	jmp	FCB_RET_ERR		; error
 14956                                  
 14957                                  SearchIt:
 14958 0000205B 16                      	push	ss
 14959 0000205C 1F                      	pop	ds			; get ready for search
 14960 0000205D FF36[2C03]              	push	word [DMAADD]
 14961 00002061 FF36[2E03]              	push	word [DMAADD+2]
 14962 00002065 C706[2C03][BE04]        	MOV	WORD [DMAADD],SEARCHBUF
 14963 0000206B 8C1E[2E03]              	MOV	WORD [DMAADD+2],DS
 14964                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 14965                                  	;call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 14966                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 14967 0000206F E88501                  	call	GET_FAST_SEARCH		; search
 14968 00002072 8F06[2E03]              	pop	word [DMAADD+2]
 14969 00002076 8F06[2C03]              	pop	word [DMAADD]
 14970 0000207A 7303                    	JNC	short SearchSet		; no error, transfer info
 14971 0000207C 5B                      	pop	bx			; Clean stack
 14972                                  
 14973                                  ; Error code is in AX
 14974

 14976                                  	;jmp	FCB_RET_ERR
 14977 0000207D EBD9                    	jmp	short dcf_errj

 14979                                  ; The search was successful (or the search-next). We store the information
 14980                                  ; into the user's FCB for continuation.

 14982                                  SearchSet:

 14984 00002082 C43E[A605]              	LES	DI,[THISFCB]		; point to the FCB
 14985 00002086 F606[6C05]FF            	TEST	byte [EXTFCB],0FFh		;

 14998                                  	;STOSB				; Store the correct "user" drive byte
 14999                                  					;  at the start of the search info

 15003                                  					;   byte to AL

 15005                                  					;   contin info

 15007 000020AB F606[6C05]FF            	TEST	byte [EXTFCB],0FFh

 15025 000020C6 E9C3E5                  	jmp	FCB_RET_OK

 15027                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15028                                  ;
 15029                                  ; Procedure Name : $DIR_SEARCH_NEXT
 15030                                  ;
 15031                                  ; Inputs:
 15032                                  ;	DS:DX points to unopenned FCB returned by $DIR_SEARCH_FIRST
 15033                                  ; Function:
 15034                                  ;	Directory is searched for the next matching entry and the directory
 15035                                  ;	entry is loaded at the disk transfer address
 15036                                  ; Returns:
 15037                                  ;	AL = -1 if no entries matched, otherwise 0
 15038                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15039                                  
 15040                                  _$DIR_SEARCH_NEXT:
 15041 000020C9 368916[A605]            	MOV	[SS:THISFCB],DX

 15044 000020D9 36C606[6C05]00          	MOV	byte [SS:EXTFCB],0
 15045

 15047 000020E0 07                      	pop	es
 15048

 15053 000020E9 750D                    	JNZ	short NORMFCB6
 15054 000020EB 83C606                  	ADD	SI,6
 15055 000020EE AC                      	LODSB
 15056

 15058 000020F3 36FE0E[6C05]            	DEC	byte [SS:EXTFCB]
 15059                                  NORMFCB6:
 15060 000020F8 AC                      	LODSB				; Get original user drive byte
 15061 000020F9 50                      	push	ax			; Put it on stack
 15062 000020FA 8A4414                  	MOV	AL,[SI+20]		; Get correct search contin drive byte
 15063 000020FD AA                      	STOSB				; Put in correct place
 15064 000020FE B90A00                  	MOV	CX,20/2

 15066

 15068 00002104 1F                      	pop	ds

 15099                                  ;   Procedure Name : $FIND_FIRST
 15100                                  ; 
 15101                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 15102                                  ;	    MOV AH, FindFirst
 15103                                  ;	    LDS DX, name
 15104                                  ;	    MOV CX, attr
 15105                                  ;	    INT 21h
 15106                                  ;	; DMA address has datablock
 15107                                  ;
 15108                                  ;   Error Returns:
 15109                                  ;	    AX = error_path_not_found
 15110                                  ;	       = error_no_more_files
 15111                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15112                                  
 15113                                  	; 09/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 15114                                  	; DOSCODE:5ED2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 15115                                  
 15116                                  _$FIND_FIRST:
 15117 0000213C 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; get name in appropriate place
 15118 0000213E 36880E[6D05]            	MOV	[SS:SATTRIB],CL		; Search attribute to correct loc
 15119

 15121                                  
 15122 00002146 E8644B                  	call	TransPathSet		; convert the path
 15123 00002149 7305                    	JNC	short Find_it 		; no error, go and look
 15124                                  FindError:

 15127                                  	; 09/11/2022

 15132 00002151 1F                      	pop	ds
 15133

 15137 00002160 8C1E[2E03]              	MOV	WORD [DMAADD+2],DS
 15138                                  	; MSDOS 3.3

 15140                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 15142 00002167 8F06[2E03]              	pop	word [DMAADD+2]
 15143 0000216B 8F06[2C03]              	pop	word [DMAADD]
 15144

 15146                                  	;JNC	short FindSet 		; no error, transfer info
 15147 0000216F 72DC                    	jc	short FF_errj	; jmp SYS_RET_ERR
 15148                                  	;
 15149                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR

 15151                                  ;FFF_errj:
 15152                                  	;jmp	short FF_errj	; jmp SYS_RET_ERR
 15153                                  
 15154                                  FindSet:
 15155 00002171 BE[BE04]                	MOV	SI,SEARCHBUF
 15156 00002174 C43E[2C03]              	LES	DI,[DMAADD]
 15157 00002178 B91500                  	MOV	CX,21
 15158 0000217B F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB
 15159 0000217D 56                      	PUSH	SI			; Save pointer to start of entry
 15160                                  	;mov	al,[si+0Bh]

 15172 0000218C E83500                   	CALL	PackName

 15176                                  ;
 15177                                  ;   Procedure Name : $FIND_NEXT
 15178                                  ;

 15181                                  ;	    MOV AH, findnext
 15182                                  ;	    INT 21h
 15183                                  ;	; next entry is at dma
 15184                                  ;

 15191 00002192 16                      	push	ss
 15192 00002193 07                      	pop	es
 15193

 15195

 15199 0000219F F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB			; Put the search continuation info
 15200                                  					;  in the right place
 15201 000021A1 16                      	push	ss
 15202 000021A2 1F                      	pop	ds			; get ready for search
 15203                                  	
 15204 000021A3 FF36[2C03]              	push	word [DMAADD]
 15205 000021A7 FF36[2E03]              	push	word [DMAADD+2]
 15206 000021AB C706[2C03][BE04]        	MOV	WORD [DMAADD],SEARCHBUF
 15207 000021B1 8C1E[2E03]              	MOV	WORD [DMAADD+2],DS

 15209 000021B8 8F06[2E03]              	pop	word [DMAADD+2]

 15212                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR

 15214 000021C2 EB89                    	jmp	short FF_errj	; jmp SYS_RET_ERR
 15215                                  	; 09/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 15216                                  	;jmp	short FFF_errj	; jmp SYS_RET_ERR

 15218                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15219                                  ;**	PackName - Convert file names from FCB to ASCIZ format.
 15220                                  ;
 15221                                  ;	PackName transfers a file name from DS:SI to ES:DI and converts it to
 15222                                  ;	the ASCIZ format.
 15223                                  ;
 15224                                  ;	ENTRY	(DS:SI) = 11 character FCB or dir entry name
 15225                                  ;		(ES:DI) = destination area (13 bytes)
 15226                                  ;	EXIT	(ds:SI) and (es:DI) advanced
 15227                                  ;	USES	al, CX, SI, DI, Flags  (BUGBUG - not verified - jgl)
 15228                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15229                                  
 15230                                  PackName:
 15231                                  ;	Move over 8 characters to cover the name component, then trim it's
 15232                                  ;	trailing blanks.
 15233                                  
 15234 000021C4 B90800                  	MOV	CX,8			; Pack the name
 15235 000021C7 F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB			; Move all of it
 15236                                  main_kill_tail:
 15237 000021C9 26807DFF20              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1]," "
 15238 000021CE 7507                    	JNZ	short find_check_dot
 15239 000021D0 4F                      	DEC	DI			; Back up over trailing space
 15240 000021D1 41                      	INC	CX
 15241 000021D2 83F908                  	CMP	CX,8
 15242 000021D5 72F2                    	JB	short main_kill_tail
 15243                                  find_check_dot:
 15244                                  	;CMP	WORD [SI],(" " << 8) | " "
 15245 000021D7 813C2020                	cmp     word [si],2020h 
 15246 000021DB 7506                    	JNZ	short got_ext 		; Some chars in extension
 15247 000021DD 807C0220                	CMP	BYTE [SI+2]," "
 15248 000021E1 7410                    	JZ	short find_done		; No extension
 15249                                  got_ext:
 15250 000021E3 B02E                    	MOV	AL,"."	; 2Eh
 15251 000021E5 AA                      	STOSB
 15252                                  	;MOV	CX,3
 15253                                  	; 18/12/2022
 15254                                  	;mov	cl,3
 15255                                  	;REP	MOVSB
 15256 000021E6 A4                      	movsb
 15257 000021E7 A4                      	movsb
 15258 000021E8 A4                      	movsb
 15259                                  ext_kill_tail:
 15260 000021E9 26807DFF20              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1]," "
 15261 000021EE 7503                    	JNZ	short find_done
 15262 000021F0 4F                      	DEC	DI			; Back up over trailing space
 15263 000021F1 EBF6                    	JMP	short ext_kill_tail
 15264                                  find_done:
 15265 000021F3 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 15266 000021F5 AA                      	STOSB				; NUL terminate
 15267 000021F6 C3                      	retn
 15268

 15278                                  					;FO.trigger fastopen ;AN000;
 15279                                  	;call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 15280                                  	;retn
 15281                                  	; 17/12/2022
 15282 000021FD E9500C                  	jmp	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST

 15284                                  ;============================================================================
 15285                                  ; PATH.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 15286                                  ;============================================================================
 15287                                  ; 06/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 15288                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15289                                  
 15290                                  ; DOSCODE:5FB0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 15291                                  
 15292                                  ;**	Directory related system calls. These will be passed direct text of the
 15293                                  ;	pathname from the user. They will need to be passed through the macro
 15294                                  ;	expander prior to being sent through the low-level stuff. I/O specs are
 15295                                  ;	defined in DISPATCH. The system calls are:
 15296                                  ;
 15297                                  ;	$CURRENT_DIR  Written
 15298                                  ;	$RMDIR	  Written
 15299                                  ;	$CHDIR	  Written
 15300                                  ;	$MKDIR	  Written
 15301                                  ;
 15302                                  ;
 15303                                  ;	Modification history:
 15304                                  ;
 15305                                  ;	    Created: ARR 4 April 1983
 15306                                  ;		 MZ 10 May 1983     CurrentDir implemented
 15307                                  ;		 MZ 11 May 1983     RmDir, ChDir, MkDir implemented
 15308                                  ;		 EE 19 Oct 1983     RmDir no longer allows you to delete a
 15309                                  ;				    current directory.
 15310                                  ;		 MZ 19 Jan 1983     Brain damaged applications rely on success
 15311                                  
 15312                                  ;	I_Need	ThisCDS,DWORD		; pointer to Current CDS
 15313                                  ;	I_Need	WFP_Start,WORD		; pointer to beginning of directory text
 15314                                  ;	I_Need	Curr_Dir_End,WORD	; offset to end of directory part
 15315                                  ;	I_Need	OpenBuf,128		; temp spot for translated name
 15316                                  ;	I_need	fSplice,BYTE		; TRUE => do splice
 15317                                  ;	I_Need	NoSetDir,BYTE		; TRUE => no exact match on splice
 15318                                  ;	I_Need	cMeta,BYTE
 15319                                  ;	I_Need	DrvErr,BYTE					;AN000;
 15320                                  
 15321                                  ;BREAK <$CURRENT_DIR - dump the current directory into user space>
 15322                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15323                                  ;
 15324                                  ;   Procedure Name : $CURRENT_DIR
 15325                                  ;
 15326                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 15327                                  ;		LDS	SI,area
 15328                                  ;		MOV	DL,drive
 15329                                  ;		INT	21h
 15330                                  ;	    ; DS:SI is a pointer to 64 byte area that contains drive
 15331                                  ;	    ; current directory.
 15332                                  ;   Error returns:
 15333                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_drive
 15334                                  ;
 15335                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15336                                  
 15337                                  _$CURRENT_DIR:
 15338                                  	;06/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 15339                                  	;IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 2D4Eh
 15340 00002200 E8FBF1                  	call	ECritDisk
 15341 00002203 88D0                    	MOV	AL,DL			; get drive number (0=def, 1=A)
 15342 00002205 E8AE49                  	call	GetVisDrv		; grab it
 15343 00002208 7310                    	JNC	short CurrentValidate 	; no error -> go and validate dir
 15344                                  CurdirErr:
 15345 0000220A E80CF2                  	call	LCritDisk
 15346                                  
 15347                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 15348                                  	;mov	al,0Fh
 15349                                  	
 15350                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 15351 0000220D 1E                      	push	ds
 15352 0000220E 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 15353 00002213 A0[1006]                	mov	al,[DrvErr]		;IFS.			;AN000;
 15354 00002216 1F                      	pop	ds
 15355                                  
 15356                                  curdir_errj:
 15357 00002217 E960E4                  	jmp	SYS_RET_ERR		;IFS. make noise	;AN000;
 15358                                  
 15359                                  CurrentValidate:
 15360 0000221A 1E                      	push	ds			; save destination
 15361 0000221B 56                      	push	si

 15364

 15367 00002221 C536[A205]              	lds     si,[THISCDS]

 15370                                  %if 0
 15371                                  	; 09/11/2022 (following test instruction is nonsense!)
 15372                                  	; (I am leaving it here for MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 15373

 15376                                  	;jnz	short $+2  ; 09/11/2022

 15378                                  %endif
 15379                                  
 15380                                  ; Random optimization nuked due to some utilities using GetCurrentDir to do
 15381                                  ; media check.
 15382                                  ;	CMP	word [SI+curdir.ID],0
 15383                                  ;	JZ	short GetDst
 15384                                  DoCheck:
 15385                                  	;MOV	byte [cs:NoSetDir],0	; interested only in contents

 15392

 15397 00002238 57                      	push	di

 15399 0000223A 1F                      	pop	ds

 15402 0000223C 07                      	pop	es			; get real destination
 15403 0000223D 72CB                    	JC	short CurdirErr
 15404                                  	;ADD	SI,curdir.text ; add si,0 ; 09/08/2018
 15405                                  	;
 15406                                  	; 09/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 15407                                  	; DOSCODE:5FE2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 15408                                  	; 16/12/2022

 15414 00002245 7501                    	JNZ	short CurrentCopy

 15416                                  CurrentCopy:
 15417                                  ;	call	FStrCpy
 15418                                  ;; 10/29/86 E5 char

 15420 00002249 AC                      	LODSB				; get char
 15421 0000224A 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 15422 0000224C 7413                    	JZ	short FOK
 15423 0000224E 3C05                    	CMP	AL,05H

 15446 0000226C E901E4                  	jmp	SYS_RET_OK		; no more, bye!

 15448                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 15450                                  ; DOSCODE:6029h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)

 15452                                  ;BREAK <$RmDir -- Remove a directory>
 15453                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15454                                  ;
 15455                                  ; Procedure Name : $RmDir
 15456                                  ;
 15457                                  ; Inputs:
 15458                                  ;	DS:DX Points to asciz name
 15459                                  ; Function:
 15460                                  ;	Delete directory if empty
 15461                                  ; Returns:
 15462                                  ;	STD XENIX Return
 15463                                  ;	AX = error_path_not_found If path bad
 15464                                  ;	AX = error_access_denied If
 15465                                  ;		Directory not empty
 15466                                  ;		Path not directory
 15467                                  ;		Root directory specified
 15468                                  ;		Directory malformed (. and .. not first two entries)
 15469                                  ;		User tries to delete a current directory
 15470                                  ;	AX = error_current_directory
 15471                                  ;
 15472                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15473                                  
 15474                                  	; 10/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 15475                                  	; DOSCODE:6015h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 15476                                  
 15477                                  _$RMDIR:
 15478 0000226F 52                      	push	dx			; Save ptr to name
 15479 00002270 1E                      	push	ds
 15480 00002271 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; Load ptr into si
 15481 00002273 BF[BE03]                	mov	di,OPENBUF		; di = ptr to buf for trans name
 15482 00002276 57                      	push	di
 15483 00002277 E83B4A                  	call	TransPathNoSet		; Translate the name
 15484 0000227A 5F                      	pop	di			; di = ptr to buf for trans name
 15485 0000227B 7306                    	jnc	short rmlset		; If transpath succeeded, continue
 15486 0000227D 1F                      	pop	ds
 15487 0000227E 5A                      	pop	dx			; Restore the name
 15488                                  	;mov	al,3
 15489 0000227F B003                    	mov	al,error_path_not_found ; Otherwise, return an error
 15490                                  	; 16/12/2022
 15491                                  rmdir_errj: ; 10/08/2018

 15494                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR
 15495                                  rmlset:

 15501                                  rmloop:

 15507 0000229B EBF2                    	jmp	short rmloop		; Go check next drive.

 15524                                  
 15525                                  ; DOSCODE:6065h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 15526                                  
 15527                                  ;BREAK <$ChDir -- Change current directory on a drive>
 15528                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15529                                  ;
 15530                                  ; $ChDir - Top-level change directory system call.  This call is responsible
 15531                                  ; for setting up the CDS for the specified drive appropriately.  There are
 15532                                  ; several cases to consider:
 15533                                  ;
 15534                                  ;   o	Local, simple CDS.  In this case, we take the input path and convert
 15535                                  ;	it into a WFP.	We verify the existance of this directory and then
 15536                                  ;	copy the WFP into the CDS and set up the ID field to point to the
 15537                                  ;	directory cluster.
 15538                                  ;   o	Net CDS.  We form the path from the root (including network prefix)
 15539                                  ;	and verify its existance (via DOS_Chdir).  If successful, we copy the
 15540                                  ;	WFP back into the CDS.
 15541                                  ;   o	SUBST'ed CDS.  This is no different than the local, simple CDS.
 15542                                  ;   o	JOIN'ed CDS.  This is trouble as there are two CDS's at work.  If we
 15543                                  ;	call TransPath, we will get the PHYSICAL CDS that the path refers to
 15544                                  ;	and the PHYSICAL WFP that the input path refers to.  This is perfectly
 15545                                  ;	good for the validation but not for currency.  We call TransPathNoSet
 15546                                  ;	to process the path but to return the logical CDS and the logical
 15547                                  ;	path.  We then copy the logical path into the logical CDS.
 15548                                  ;
 15549                                  ; Inputs:
 15550                                  ;	DS:DX Points to asciz name
 15551                                  ; Returns:
 15552                                  ;	STD XENIX Return
 15553                                  ;	AX = chdir_path_not_found if error
 15554                                  ;
 15555                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15556                                  
 15557                                  _$CHDIR:
 15558 000022AA BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		; spot for translated name
 15559 000022AD 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; get source
 15560 000022AF E8F749                  	call	TransPath		; go munge the path and get real CDS
 15561 000022B2 7304                    	JNC	short ChDirCrack	; no errors, try path
 15562                                  ChDirErrP:
 15563                                  	;mov	al,3
 15564 000022B4 B003                    	MOV	AL,error_path_not_found
 15565                                  ChDirErr:
 15566                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR 	; oops!
 15567                                  	; 10/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 15568 000022B6 EBC9                    	jmp	short chdir_errj
 15569                                  
 15570                                  ChDirCrack:
 15571 000022B8 803E[7A05]FF            	CMP	byte [CMETA],-1		; No meta chars allowed.
 15572 000022BD 75F5                    	JNZ	short ChDirErrP
 15573                                  
 15574                                  ; We cannot do a ChDir (yet) on a raw CDS. This is treated as a path not
 15575                                  ; found.
 15576                                  
 15577 000022BF C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 15578 000022C3 83FFFF                  	CMP	DI,-1			;   if (ThisCDS == NULL)
 15579 000022C6 74EC                    	JZ	short ChDirErrP		;	error ();
 15580                                  
 15581                                  ; Find out if the directory exists.
 15582                                  
 15583 000022C8 E80310                  	call	DOS_CHDIR
 15584                                  	;Jc	short ChDirErr
 15585                                  	; 16/12/2022
 15586 000022CB 72B4                    	jc	short chdir_errj
 15587                                  ;
 15588                                  ; Get back CDS to see if a join as seen. Set the currency pointer (only if
 15589                                  ; not network). If one was seen, all we need to do is copy in the text
 15590                                  ;
 15591 000022CD C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 15592                                  	;test	word [es:di+43h],2000h
 15593                                  	; 17/12/2022
 15594 000022D1 26F6454420              	test	byte [ES:DI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_splice>>8
 15595                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+curdir.flags],curdir_splice
 15596 000022D6 7425                    	JZ	short GotCDS
 15597                                  
 15598                                  ; The CDS was joined. Let's go back and grab the logical CDS.
 15599                                  
 15600 000022D8 06                      	push	es	
 15601 000022D9 57                      	push	di
 15602 000022DA 51                      	push	cx			; save CDS and cluster...
 15603 000022DB E899E1                  	call	Get_User_Stack		; get original text
 15604                                  	
 15605                                  	;mov	di,[si+6]
 15606 000022DE 8B7C06                  	MOV	DI,[SI+user_env.user_DX]
 15607                                  	;mov	ds,[si+0Eh]
 15608 000022E1 8E5C0E                  	MOV	DS,[SI+user_env.user_DS]
 15609                                  	
 15610 000022E4 BE[BE03]                	MOV	SI,OPENBUF		; spot for translated name
 15611 000022E7 87F7                    	XCHG	SI,DI
 15612 000022E9 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL			; do no splicing
 15613 000022EB 57                      	push	di
 15614 000022EC E8C649                  	call	TransPathNoSet		; Munge path
 15615 000022EF 5E                      	pop	si
 15616                                  
 15617                                  ; There should NEVER be an error here.
 15618                                  
 15619                                  ;IF FALSE
 15620                                  ;	JNC SKipErr
 15621                                  ;	fmt <>,<>,<"$p: Internal CHDIR error\n">
 15622                                  ;SkipErr:
 15623                                  ;ENDIF
 15624 000022F0 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]		; get new CDS
 15625                                  	;mov	word [es:di+49h],-1
 15626 000022F4 26C74549FFFF            	MOV	word [ES:DI+curdir.ID],-1
 15627                                  					; no valid cluster here...
 15628 000022FA 59                      	pop	cx
 15629 000022FB 5F                      	pop	di
 15630 000022FC 07                      	pop	es
 15631                                  
 15632                                  ; ES:DI point to the physical CDS, CX is the ID (local only)
 15633                                  
 15634                                  GotCDS:
 15635                                  
 15636                                  ; wfp_start points to the text. See if it is long enough
 15637                                  
 15638                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 15639                                  	;push	ss
 15640                                  	;pop	ds
 15641                                  	;mov	si,[WFP_START]
 15642                                  	;push	cx
 15643                                  	;call	DStrLen
 15644                                  	;cmp	cx,67 ; cmp cx,DIRSTRLEN
 15645                                  	;pop	cx
 15646                                  	;ja	short ChDirErrP
 15647                                  
 15648                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 15649 000022FD E85000                  	CALL	Check_PathLen		;PTM.		;AN000;
 15650 00002300 77B2                    	JA	short ChDirErrP
 15651                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 15652                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet ; 8000h
 15653                                  	; 17/12/2022
 15654 00002302 26F6454480              	test	byte [ES:DI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_isnet>>8
 15655 00002307 7512                    	JNZ	short SkipRecency
 15656                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 15657                                  	;test	word [es:di+43h],2000h
 15658                                  	; 17/12/2022
 15659 00002309 26F6454420              	test	byte [ES:DI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_splice>>8
 15660                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+curdir.flags],curdir_splice 
 15661                                  					;PTM. for Join and Subst ;AN000;
 15662 0000230E 7403                    	JZ	short setdirclus	;PTM.		;AN000;
 15663 00002310 B9FFFF                  	MOV	CX,-1			;PTM.		;AN000;
 15664                                  setdirclus:
 15665                                  	;mov	[es:di+49h],cx
 15666 00002313 26894D49                	MOV	[ES:DI+curdir.ID],CX
 15667 00002317 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]		; get logical CDS
 15668                                  SkipRecency:
 15669 0000231B E8B3EF                  	call	FStrCpy
 15670 0000231E 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL
 15671                                  mkdir_ok:
 15672 00002320 E94DE3                  	jmp	SYS_RET_OK
 15673

 15675

 15681                                  ; Procedure Name : $MkDir
 15682                                  ; Inputs:

 15684                                  ; Function:

 15698                                  _$MKDIR:
 15699 00002323 BE[DE31]                	MOV	SI,DOS_MKDIR
 15700                                  DoDirCall:

 15702                                  
 15703 00002329 56                      	push	si
 15704 0000232A 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; get source
 15705 0000232C E87A49                  	call	TransPath		; go munge the path
 15706 0000232F 5E                      	pop	si
 15707 00002330 7305                    	JNC	short MkDirCrack	; no errors, try path
 15708                                  MkErrP:
 15709 00002332 B003                    	MOV	AL,error_path_not_found	; oops!
 15710                                  MkErr:
 15711 00002334 E943E3                  	jmp	SYS_RET_ERR
 15712                                  MkDirCrack:
 15713 00002337 36803E[7A05]FF          	CMP	byte [SS:CMETA],-1
 15714 0000233D 75F3                    	JNZ	short MkErrP
 15715

 15717                                  	;push	ss
 15718                                  	;pop	ds
 15719                                  	;call	si
 15720                                  	;jb	short MkErr
 15721                                  	;;jmp	short mkdir_ok
 15722                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_OK
 15723

 15726 00002340 E80D00                  	CALL	Check_PathLen		;PTM. check path len > 67 ? ;AN000;
 15727 00002343 5E                      	POP	SI			;PTM.			;AN000;
 15728 00002344 7604                    	JBE	short pathok		;PTM.			;AN000;
 15729                                  	;mov	al,5
 15730 00002346 B005                    	MOV	AL,error_access_denied	;PTM. ops!
 15731                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR		;PTM.
 15732 00002348 EBEA                    	jmp	short MkErr
 15733                                  pathok:
 15734 0000234A FFD6                    	CALL	SI			; go get file
 15735 0000234C 72E6                    	JC	short MkErr		; no errors
 15736                                  	; 16/12/2022
 15737                                  	; 10/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 15738 0000234E EBD0                    	jmp	short mkdir_ok
 15739                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_OK

 15758                                  Check_PathLen2:
