 18029 00002AE5 EBC4                    	JMP	short _BAD_ACC 		; device
 18030                                  
 18031                                  set_check_share:
 18032 00002AE7 58                      	POP	AX			; Get new attributes
 18033                                  
 18034                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18035 00002AE8 833E[E205]FF            	cmp	word [CURBUF], -1	; M025: Q: is this the root dir
 18036 00002AED 740A                    	je	short cannot_set_root	; M025: Y: return error
 18037                                  
 18038                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 18039 00002AEF E878FC                  	call	REN_DEL_Check
 18040 00002AF2 730B                    	JNC	short set_do
 18041 00002AF4 B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation ; 32
 18042 00002AF7 EB3A                    	jmp	short OK_BYE
 18043                                  
 18044                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18045                                  cannot_set_root:			; M025:
 18046 00002AF9 B80500                  	mov	ax,error_access_denied	; M025: return error is attempting
 18047 00002AFC F9                      	stc				; M025: to set attr. of root
 18048 00002AFD EB34                    	jmp	short OK_BYE		; M025:
 18049                                  
 18050                                  set_do:
 18051                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 18052 00002AFF C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 18053 00002B03 2680670BD8              	AND	BYTE [ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],~attr_changeable ; 0D8h
 18054 00002B08 2608470B                	OR	BYTE [ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],AL
 18055                                  
 18056                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18057 00002B0C 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 18058                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 18059 00002B11 7508                    	JNZ	short yesdirty3		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 18060 00002B13 E87731                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT 	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 18061                                  	
 18062 00002B16 26804D0540              	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 18063                                  yesdirty3:
 18064 00002B1B A0[7605]                	MOV	AL,[THISDRV]
 18065                                  ;;;; 10/1/86 F.C update fastopen cache
 18066 00002B1E 52                      	PUSH	DX
 18067 00002B1F 57                      	PUSH	DI
 18068 00002B20 B400                    	MOV	AH,0		  ; dir entry update
 18069 00002B22 88C2                    	MOV	DL,AL		  ; drive number A=0,B=1,,
 18070 00002B24 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX		  ; ES:DI -> dir entry
 18071 00002B26 E8DEFC                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 18072 00002B29 5F                      	POP	DI
 18073 00002B2A 5A                      	POP	DX
 18074                                  ;;;; 9/11/86 F.C update fastopen cache
 18075 00002B2B E85A30                  	call	FLUSHBUF
 18076 00002B2E 7303                    	JNC	short OK_BYE
 18077 00002B30 B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found
 18078                                  OK_BYE:
 18079                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 18080                                  	;retn
 18081                                  	; 16/12/2022

 18083

 18085

 18090                                  					;FO. trigger fastopen	;AN000;

 18098                                  ;============================================================================
 18099                                  ; DUP.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 18100                                  ;============================================================================
 18101                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 18102                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18103                                  
 18104                                  ;** 	Low level DUP routine for use by EXEC when creating a new process.
 18105                                  ;   	Exports the DUP to the server machine and increments the SFT ref count
 18106                                  ;
 18107                                  ;	DOS_DUP
 18108                                  ;
 18109                                  ;	Modification history:
 18110                                  ;
 18111                                  ;	  Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 18112                                  
 18113                                  ;BREAK <DOS_DUP -- DUP SFT across network>
 18114                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18115                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DUP
 18116                                  ;
 18117                                  ; Inputs:
 18118                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being DUPed
 18119                                  ;		(a non net SFT is OK, in this case the ref
 18120                                  ;		 count is simply incremented)
 18121                                  ; Function:
 18122                                  ;	Signal to the devices that a logical open is occurring
 18123                                  ; Returns:
 18124                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 18125                                  ;    Carry clear
 18126                                  ;	SFT ref_count is incremented
 18127                                  ; Registers modified: None.
 18128                                  ; NOTE:
 18129                                  ;	This routine is called from $CREATE_PROCESS_DATA_BLOCK at DOSINIT
 18130                                  ;	time with SS NOT DOSGROUP. There will be no Network handles at
 18131                                  ;	that time.
 18132                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18133                                  
 18134                                  DOS_DUP:
 18135                                  	;LES	DI,[CS:THISSFT]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 18136                                  
 18137                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18138 00002B48 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 18139 00002B4D 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]
 18140                                  
 18141                                  	;Entry	Dos_Dup_Direct
 18142                                  DOS_Dup_Direct:
 18143 00002B52 E8FEE7                  	call	IsSFTNet
 18144 00002B55 7503                    	JNZ	short DO_INC
 18145 00002B57 E8A01B                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 18146                                  DO_INC:
 18147                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 18148 00002B5A 26FF05                  	inc	word [ES:DI]		; Clears carry (if this ever wraps
 18149                                  					;   we're in big trouble anyway)
 18150 00002B5D C3                      	retn
 18151                                  
 18152                                  ;============================================================================
 18153                                  ; CREATE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 18154                                  ;============================================================================
 18155                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 18156                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18157                                  
 18158                                  ;TITLE	DOS_CREATE/DOS_CREATE_NEW - Internal CREATE calls for MS-DOS
 18159                                  ;NAME	DOS_CREATE
 18160                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18161                                  ;**	Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 18162                                  ;
 18163                                  ;	DOS_CREATE
 18164                                  ;	DOS_CREATE_NEW
 18165                                  ;	SET_MKND_ERR
 18166                                  ;	SET_Media_ID
 18167                                  ;	SET_EXT_Mode
 18168                                  ;
 18169                                  ;	Revision history:
 18170                                  ;
 18171                                  ;	    A000 version 4.00	  Jan. 1988
 18172                                  ;	    A001  D490 -- Change IOCTL subfunctios from 63h,43h to 66h, 46h
 18173                                  
 18174                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 18175                                  
 18176                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 18177                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 18178                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD
 18179                                  ;	I_Need	ExtErr_locus,BYTE
 18180                                  ;	I_need	JShare,DWORD
 18181                                  ;	I_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 18182                                  ;	I_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 18183                                  ;	I_need	CALLVIDM,DWORD
 18184                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000; extended open
 18185                                  ;	I_need	NAME1,BYTE			  ;AN000;
 18186                                  ;	I_need	NO_NAME_ID,BYTE 		  ;AN000;
 18187                                  ;	I_need	Packet_Temp,WORD		  ;AN000;
 18188                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD 		  ;AN000;
 18189                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;AN000;
 18190                                  
 18191                                  ;***	DOS_CREATE - Create a File
 18192                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18193                                  ;	DOS_Create is called to create the specified file, truncating
 18194                                  ;	the old one if it exists.
 18195                                  ;
 18196                                  ;	ENTRY	AX is Attribute to create
 18197                                  ;		(ds) = DOSDATA
 18198                                  ;		[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 18199                                  ;			terminated)
 18200                                  ;		[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 18201                                  ;			( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 18202                                  ;			 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 18203                                  ;		[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 18204                                  ;			(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 18205                                  ;		[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 18206                                  ;			(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 18207                                  ;		[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 18208                                  ;
 18209                                  ;	EXIT	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 18210                                  ;		CARRY CLEAR
 18211                                  ;		    THISSFT filled in.
 18212                                  ;			sf_mode = unchanged for FCB, sharing_compat + open_for_both
 18213                                  ;		CARRY SET
 18214                                  ;		    AX is error code
 18215                                  ;			error_path_not_found
 18216                                  ;				Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 18217                                  ;			error_bad_curr_dir
 18218                                  ;				Bad path in current directory part of path
 18219                                  ;			error_access_denied
 18220                                  ;				Attempt to re-create read only file , or
 18221                                  ;				create a second volume id or create a dir
 18222                                  ;			error_sharing_violation
 18223                                  ;				The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 18224                                  ;				generates an INT 24
 18225                                  ;	USES	all but DS
 18226                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18227                                  
 18228                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 18229                                  	; DOSCODE:6920h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 18230                                  
 18231                                  DOS_CREATE:
 18232                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18233                                  	; DOSCODE:6934h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 18234                                  
 18235                                  ;hkn; dispatched to from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS set up to DOSDATA at 
 18236                                  ;hkn; this point.
 18237                                  
 18238 00002B5E 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH		; Truncate is OK
 18239                                  
 18240                                  ;	Enter here from Dos_Create_New
 18241                                  ;
 18242                                  ;	(ah) = 0 iff truncate OK
 18243                                  
 18244                                  Create_inter:
 18245 00002B60 A8C0                    	TEST	AL,~(attr_all+attr_ignore+attr_volume_id) ; 80h
 18246                                  				; Mask out any meaningless bits
 18247 00002B62 7511                    	JNZ	short AttErr
 18248 00002B64 A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id
 18249 00002B66 7407                    	JZ	short NoReset
 18250                                  	
 18251                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18252                                  	; 16/12/2022
 18253 00002B68 800E[1106]80            	OR	byte [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h ;AN000;FOR dbcs volid
 18254                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 18255                                  	;or	word [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h 
 18256                                  	
 18257 00002B6D B008                    	MOV	AL,attr_volume_id ; 8
 18258                                  NoReset:
 18259 00002B6F 0C20                    	OR	AL,attr_archive ; File changed  ; 20 h
 18260 00002B71 A850                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory+attr_device ; 50h
 18261 00002B73 740A                    	JZ	short ATT_OK

 18405

 18412 00002BEC 00                      	DB	0			; none
 18413 00002BED 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 1
 18414 00002BEE 52                      	DB	error_cannot_make	; MakeNode error 2
 18415 00002BEF 50                      	DB	error_file_exists	; MakeNode error 3
 18416 00002BF0 03                      	DB	error_path_not_found	; MakeNode error 4
 18417 00002BF1 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 5
 18418 00002BF2 20                      	DB	error_sharing_violation ; MakeNode error 6
 18419                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18420 00002BF3 02                      	DB	error_file_not_found	; MakeNode error 7

 18423                                  
 18424                                  ; We have just created a new file. This results in the truncation of old
 18425                                  ; files. We must inform the sharer to slash all the open SFT's for this
 18426                                  ; file to the current size.

 18466                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18467                                  ; Procedure Name : Dos_Create_New
 18468                                  ;
 18469                                  ; Inputs:
 18470                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 18471                                  ;		terminated)
 18472                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 18473                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 18474                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 18475                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 18476                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 18477                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 18478                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 18479                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 18480                                  ;	AX is Attribute to create
 18481                                  ; Function:
 18482                                  ;	Try to create the specified file truncating an old one that exists
 18483                                  ; Outputs:
 18484                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 18485                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 18486                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 18487                                  ;		sf_mode = sharing_compat + open_for_both for Non-FCB SFT
 18488                                  ;	CARRY SET
 18489                                  ;	    AX is error code
 18490                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 18491                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 18492                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 18493                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 18494                                  ;		error_access_denied
 18495                                  ;			Create a second volume id or create a dir
 18496                                  ;		error_file_exists
 18497                                  ;			Already a file by this name
 18498                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 18499                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18500                                  
 18501                                  DOS_Create_New:
 18502 00002C2B B401                    	MOV	AH,1		; Truncate is NOT OK
 18503 00002C2D E930FF                  	JMP	Create_inter
 18504                                  
 18505                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 18506                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18507                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_Media_ID
 18508                                  ;
 18509                                  ; Inputs:
 18510                                  ;	NAME1= Volume ID
 18511                                  ;	BH= 0, delete volume id
 18512                                  ;	    1, set new volume id
 18513                                  ;	DS= DOSGROUP
 18514                                  ; Function:
 18515                                  ;	Set Volume ID to DOS 4.00 Boot record.
 18516                                  ; Outputs:
 18517                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 18518                                  ;	    volume id set
 18519                                  ;	CARRY SET
 18520                                  ;	    AX is error code
 18521                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18522                                  
 18523                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18524                                  Set_Media_ID:
 18525 00002C30 50                      	PUSH	AX		;AN000;;>32mb
 18526 00002C31 06                      	PUSH	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 18527 00002C32 57                      	PUSH	DI		;AN000;;>32mb
 18528                                  
 18529 00002C33 FEC4                    	INC	AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive #
 18530 00002C35 88E3                    	MOV	BL,AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive # (A=1,B=2,,,)
 18531 00002C37 B00D                    	MOV	AL,0DH		;AN000;;>32mb  generic IOCTL
 18532 00002C39 B96608                  	MOV	CX,0866H	;AN001;;>32mb  get media id
 18533                                  
 18534                                  ;hkn; PACKET_TEMP is in DOSDATA
 18535 00002C3C BA[C00D]                	MOV	DX,Packet_Temp	;AN000;>32mb
 18536                                  
 18537 00002C3F 53                      	PUSH	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 18538 00002C40 52                      	PUSH	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 18539 00002C41 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb
 18540                                  
 18541                                  	;invoke	$IOCTL		;AN000;;>32mb
 18542 00002C43 E83EF7                  	call	_$IOCTL	
 18543                                  
 18544 00002C46 5A                      	POP	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 18545 00002C47 5B                      	POP	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 18546 00002C48 7224                    	JC	short geterr	;AN000;;>32mb
 18547                                  
 18548 00002C4A 08FF                    	OR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb delete volume id
 18549 00002C4C 7405                    	JZ	short NoName	;AN000;>32mb yes
 18550                                  
 18551                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 18552 00002C4E BE[4B05]                	MOV	SI,NAME1	;AN000;>32mb
 18553                                  
 18554 00002C51 EB03                    	JMP	SHORT doset	;AN000;>32mb yes
 18555                                  NoName: 			;AN000;
 18556                                  
 18557                                  ;hkn; NO_NAME_ID is in DOSDATA
 18558 00002C53 BE[0E0E]                	MOV	SI,NO_NAME_ID	;AN000;>32mb
 18559                                  
 18560                                  doset:				;AN000;
 18561 00002C56 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 18562                                  	;add	di,6
 18563 00002C58 83C706                  	ADD	DI,MEDIA_ID_INFO.MEDIA_Label ;AN000;;>32mb
 18564                                  
 18565                                  ;hkn; ES & DS must point to SS
 18566                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;;>32mb  move new volume id to packet
 18567 00002C5B 16                      	PUSH	SS		;AN000;;>32mb  move new volume id to packet
 18568                                  
 18569 00002C5C 1F                      	POP	DS		;AN000;;>32mb
 18570                                  
 18571                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;;>32mb
 18572 00002C5D 16                      	PUSH	SS		;AN000;;>32mb
 18573                                  
 18574 00002C5E 07                      	POP	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 18575 00002C5F B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11		;AN000;;>32mb
 18576 00002C62 F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB		;AN000;;>32mb
 18577 00002C64 B94608                  	MOV	CX,0846H	;AN001;;>32mb
 18578 00002C67 B00D                    	MOV	AL,0DH		;AN000;;>32mb
 18579 00002C69 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb
 18580                                  	;invoke	$IOCTL		;AN000;;>32mb  set volume id
 18581 00002C6B E816F7                  	call	_$IOCTL	
 18582                                  geterr: 			;AN000;
 18583                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;>32mb
 18584 00002C6E 16                      	PUSH	SS		;AN000;>32mb
 18585                                  
 18586 00002C6F 1F                      	POP	DS		;AN000;>32mb   ds= dosgroup
 18587                                  
 18588 00002C70 5F                      	POP	DI		;AN000;;>32mb
 18589 00002C71 07                      	POP	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 18590 00002C72 58                      	POP	AX		;AN000;;>32mb
 18591 00002C73 C3                      	retn			;AN000;>32mb
 18592                                  
 18593                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 18594                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18595                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_EXT_mode
 18596                                  ;
 18597                                  ; Inputs:
 18598                                  ;	[EXTOPEN_ON]= flag for extended open
 18599                                  ;	SAVE_BX= mode specified in Extended Open
 18600                                  ; Function:
 18601                                  ;	Set mode in ThisSFT
 18602                                  ; Outputs:
 18603                                  ;	carry set,mode is set if from Extended Open
 18604                                  ;	carry clear, mode not set yet
 18605                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18606                                  
 18607                                  ; 13/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18608                                  
 18609                                  Set_EXT_mode:
 18610                                  
 18611                                  ;hkn; SS override
 18612 00002C74 36F606[F605]01          	TEST	byte [ss:EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 18613 00002C7A 740B                    	JZ	short NOTEX		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 18614 00002C7C 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 18615                                  
 18616                                  ;hkn; SS override
 18617 00002C7D 36A1[0106]              	MOV	AX,[ss:SAVE_BX]		    ;AN000;EO.
 18618                                  	;or	[es:di+2],ax
 18619 00002C81 26094502                	OR	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AX ;AN000;EO.
 18620 00002C85 58                      	POP	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 18621 00002C86 F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;EO.
 18622                                  NOTEX:					    ;AN000;
 18623 00002C87 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;EO.

 18626                                  ; OPEN.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 18627                                  ;============================================================================
 18628                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 18629                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18630                                  
 18631                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_OPEN - Internal OPEN call for MS-DOS
 18632                                  ;	NAME	DOS_OPEN
 18633                                  
 18634                                  ;**	OPEN.ASM - File Open
 18635                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18636                                  ;	Low level routines for openning a file from a file spec.
 18637                                  ;	Also misc routines for sharing errors
 18638                                  ;
 18639                                  ;	DOS_Open
 18640                                  ;	Check_Access_AX
 18641                                  ;	SHARE_ERROR
 18642                                  ;	SET_SFT_MODE
 18643                                  ;	Code_Page_Mismatched_Error		   ; DOS 4.00
 18644                                  ;
 18645                                  ;	Revision history:
 18646                                  ;
 18647                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 18648                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00   Jan. 1988
 18649                                  ;
 18650                                  ;	M034 - The value in save_bx must be pushed on to the stack for
 18651                                  ; 	       remote extended opens and not save_cx.
 18652                                  ;
 18653                                  ;	M035 - if open made from exec then we must set the appropriate bits
 18654                                  ;	       on the stack before calling off to the redir.
 18655                                  ;	M042 - Bit 11 of DOS34_FLAG set indicates that the redir knows how 
 18656                                  ;	       to handle open from exec. In this case set the appropriate bit
 18657                                  ;	       else do not.
 18658                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------	
 18659                                  
 18660                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 18661                                  
 18662                                  ;	i_need	NoSetDir,BYTE
 18663                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 18664                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 18665                                  ;	i_need	CURBUF,DWORD
 18666                                  ;	i_need	CurrentPDB,WORD
 18667                                  ;	i_need	CURR_DIR_END,WORD
 18668                                  ;	I_need	RetryCount,WORD
 18669                                  ;	I_need	Open_Access,BYTE
 18670                                  ;	I_need	fSharing,BYTE
 18671                                  ;	i_need	JShare,DWORD
 18672                                  ;	I_need	FastOpenFlg,byte
 18673                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 18674                                  ;	I_need	ALLOWED,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 18675                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 18676                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_LOCUS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 18677                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_ACTION,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 18678                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_CLASS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 18679                                  ;	I_need	CPSWFLAG,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 18680                                  ;	I_need	EXITHOLD,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 18681                                  ;	I_need	THISDPB,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 18682                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_CX,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 18683                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;M034
 18684                                  ;
 18685                                  ;	I_need	DOS_FLAG,BYTE
 18686                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD			  ;M042
 18687                                  
 18688                                  ;Break	<DOS_Open - internal file access>
 18689                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18690                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_Open
 18691                                  ;
 18692                                  ; Inputs:
 18693                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 18694                                  ;		terminated)
 18695                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 18696                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 18697                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 18698                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 18699                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 18700                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file found
 18701                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 18702                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 18703                                  ;	AX is Access and Sharing mode
 18704                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 18705                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 18706                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 18707                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 18708                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 18709                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 18710                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 18711                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 18712                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 18713                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 18714                                  ;
 18715                                  ;	  For FCB SFTs AL should = sharing_compat + open_for_both
 18716                                  ;		(not checked)
 18717                                  ; Function:
 18718                                  ;	Try to open the specified file
 18719                                  ; Outputs:
 18720                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 18721                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 18722                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 18723                                  ;	CARRY SET
 18724                                  ;	    AX is error code
 18725                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 18726                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 18727                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 18728                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 18729                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 18730                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 18731                                  ;		error_invalid_access
 18732                                  ;			Bad sharing mode or bad access mode or bad combination
 18733                                  ;		error_access_denied
 18734                                  ;			Attempt to open read only file for writting, or
 18735                                  ;			open a directory
 18736                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 18737                                  ;			The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 18738                                  ;			generates an INT 24 on compatibility mode SFTs
 18739                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 18740                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18741                                  
 18742                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18743                                  ; DOSCODE:6A60h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 18744                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 18745                                  ; DOSCODE:6A4Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 18746                                  
 18747                                  DOS_OPEN:
 18748                                  	; DS has been set up to DOSDATA in file.asm and fcbio2.asm. 
 18749                                  
 18750 00002C88 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 18751 00002C8D E83301                  	CALL	Check_Access_AX
 18752 00002C90 722B                    	JC	short do_ret_label	    ; retc
 18753                                  
 18754 00002C92 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 18755 00002C96 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 18756                                  
 18757                                  	; sleaze! move only access/sharing mode in. Leave sf_isFCB unchanged
 18758                                  
 18759 00002C98 26884502                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AL ; For moment do this on FCBs too
 18760 00002C9C 06                      	PUSH	ES
 18761 00002C9D C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 18762                                  	; 18/08/2018
 18763 00002CA1 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1
 18764 00002CA4 7530                    	JNZ	short TEST_RE_NET1
 18765 00002CA6 07                      	POP	ES
 18766                                  
 18767                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18768                                  ;Extended open hooks
 18769 00002CA7 F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;FT. from extnded open		;AN000;
 18770 00002CAC 7410                    	JZ	short _NOEXTOP 		    ;FT. no, do normal			;AN000;
 18771                                  _IFS_extopen:									;AN000;
 18772 00002CAE A0[0106]                	MOV	AL,[SAVE_BX]		    ; M034 - save_bx has original bx  
 18773                                  					    ; with which call was made. This
 18774                                  					    ; has the open access bits. 
 18775                                  	;;MOV	AL,[SAVE_CX]		    ; M034 - FT. al= create attribute
 18776                                  	
 18777 00002CB1 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;FT. pass create attr to IFS	;AN000;
 18778                                  	;mov	ax,112Eh
 18779                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;FT. issue extended open verb	;AN000;
 18780 00002CB2 B82E11                  	mov	ax,(MultNET*256)+46 
 18781 00002CB5 CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;FT.				;AN000;
 18782 00002CB7 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;FT. trash bx			;AN000;
 18783 00002CB8 C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;FT.				;AN000;
 18784                                  
 18785                                  do_ret_label:
 18786 00002CBD C3                      	retn				    ;FT.				;AN000;
 18787                                  _NOEXTOP:
 18788                                  ;Extended open hooks
 18789                                  	;
 18790                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 18791                                  	;transfer NET_SEQ_OPEN
 18792                                  ;ELSE
 18793                                  	
 18794                                  do_net_int2f:
 18795 00002CBE F606[8600]01            	test	byte [DOS_FLAG],EXECOPEN ; Q: was this open call made from exec
 18796 00002CC3 7409                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 18797                                  					; Y: check to see if redir is aware
 18798                                  					;    of this 
 18799                                  	
 18800                                  					; M042 - start
 18801                                  	;test	word [DOS34_FLAG],EXEC_AWARE_REDIR ; 800h
 18802 00002CC5 F606[1206]08            	test	byte [DOS34_FLAG+1],(EXEC_AWARE_REDIR>>8)
 18803                                  					; Q: does this redir know how to 
 18804                                  					;    this
 18805 00002CCA 7402                    	jz	short not_exec_open	; N: just do net open
 18806                                  					; Y: set bit 3 of access byte and 
 18807                                  					;    set sharing mode to DENY_WRITE
 18808                                  					; M042 - end
 18809                                  	
 18810                                  	; NOTE: This specific mode has not been set for the code assembled
 18811                                  	; under the "NOT Installed" conditional. Currently Installed is 
 18812                                  	; always one.
 18813                                  					; M035 - set the bits on the stack
 18814                                  	;mov	al,23h
 18815 00002CCC B023                    	mov	AL,SHARING_DENY_WRITE+EXEC_OPEN
 18816                                  	
 18817                                  not_exec_open:
 18818                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 18819 00002CCE 50                      	PUSH	AX
 18820                                  
 18821                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 22
 18822                                  	;INT	2FH
 18823                                  
 18824 00002CCF B81611                  	mov     ax,1116h
 18825 00002CD2 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - OPEN EXISTING REMOTE FILE
 18826                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 18827                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file to open
 18828                                  			; STACK: WORD file open mode
 18829                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 18830                                  
 18831 00002CD4 5B                      	POP	BX			; clean stack
 18832                                  ;do_ret_label: ; 09/08/2018
 18833 00002CD5 C3                      	retn
 18834                                  ;ENDIF
 18835                                  
 18836                                  TEST_RE_NET1:
 18837                                  	;TEST	word [ES:SI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 18838                                  	; 17/12/2022
 18839 00002CD6 26F6444480              	test	byte [ES:SI+curdir.flags+1],curdir_isnet>>8
 18840 00002CDB 07                      	POP	ES
 18841                                  	; 18/05/2019
 18842 00002CDC 7409                    	JZ	short LOCAL_OPEN
 18843                                  
 18844                                  ;Extended open hooks
 18845                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18846 00002CDE F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;FT. from extended open	;AN000;

 18848                                  ;Extended open hooks
 18849                                  
 18850                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 18851                                  ;	transfer NET_OPEN
 18852                                  ;ELSE
 18853 00002CE5 EBD7                    	jmp	short do_net_int2f

 18866

 18868                                  
 18869 00002CF2 731D                    	JNC	short Open_found
 18870 00002CF4 7511                    	JNZ	short bad_path2
 18871 00002CF6 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 18872 00002CF8 740D                    	JZ	short bad_path2
 18873                                  OpenFNF:

 18875                                  OpenBadRet:
 18876                                  ;hkn; FastOpenFlg is in DOSDATA use SS override
 18877                                  	; 12/08/2018
 18878                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FastOpenFlg],0 ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) offset 36CAh
 18879                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18880 00002CFD 368026[8E0D]80          	AND	BYTE [SS:FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes    ;; DOS 3.3
 18881 00002D03 F9                      	STC

 18883                                  	; 16/12/2022
 18884 00002D04 E912E7                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 18885                                  	;;JMP	Clear_FastOpen ; 10/08/2018
 18886                                  	;retn 	; 08/09/2018
 18887                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 18888                                  	;jmp	Clear_FastOpen
 18889                                  
 18890                                  bad_path2:
 18891 00002D07 B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found	; 3
 18892 00002D0A EBF1                    	JMP	short OpenBadRet
 18893                                  
 18894                                  Open_Bad_Access:
 18895 00002D0C B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied	; 5
 18896 00002D0F EBEC                    	JMP	short OpenBadRet
 18897                                  
 18898                                  Open_found:
 18899 00002D11 74F9                    	JZ	short Open_Bad_Access 	; test for directories
 18900 00002D13 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 18901 00002D15 783E                    	JS	short open_ok		; Devices don't have attributes
 18902 00002D17 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]		; get buffer location
 18903                                  	;mov	al,[es:bx+0Bh]
 18904 00002D1B 268A470B                	MOV	AL,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 18905 00002D1F A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id	; can't open volume ids
 18906 00002D21 75E9                    	JNZ	short Open_Bad_Access
 18907 00002D23 A801                    	TEST	AL,attr_read_only	; check write on read only
 18908 00002D25 742E                    	JZ	short open_ok
 18909                                  
 18910                                  ; The file is marked READ-ONLY. We verify that the open mode allows access to
 18911                                  ; the read-only file. Unfortunately, with FCB's and net-FCB's we cannot
 18912                                  ; determine at the OPEN time if such access is allowed. Thus, we defer such
 18913                                  ; processing until the actual write operation:
 18914                                  ;
 18915                                  ; If FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 18916                                  ; If net_FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 18917                                  ; If not open for read then error.
 18918                                  
 18919 00002D27 1E                      	push	ds
 18920 00002D28 56                      	push	si
 18921 00002D29 C536[9E05]              	LDS	SI,[THISSFT]
 18922                                  	;mov	cx,[si+2]
 18923 00002D2D 8B4C02                  	MOV	CX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 18924                                  	; 17/12/2022
 18925                                  	;test	ch,80h
 18926 00002D30 F6C580                  	test	ch,sf_isFCB>>8
 18927                                  	;TEST	CX,sf_isFCB ; 8000h	; is it FCB?
 18928 00002D33 750A                    	JNZ	short ResetAccess	; yes, reset the access
 18929 00002D35 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL
 18930 00002D37 80E2F0                  	AND	DL,SHARING_MASK	; 0F0h
 18931 00002D3A 80FA70                  	CMP	DL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h ; is it net FCB?
 18932 00002D3D 7508                    	JNZ	short NormalOpen	; no
 18933                                  ResetAccess:
 18934                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)	
 18935                                  	;AND	CX,~access_mask	; 0FFF0h ; clear access
 18936                                  	; 16/12/2022
 18937 00002D3F 80E1F0                  	and	cl,0F0h ; 18/05/2019
 18938                                  ;	OR	CX,open_for_read ; 0	; stick in open_for_read
 18939 00002D42 894C02                  	MOV	[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],CX
 18940 00002D45 EB0C                    	JMP	SHORT FillSFT
 18941                                  
 18942                                  ; The SFT is normal. See if the requested access is open_for_read
 18943                                  
 18944                                  NormalOpen:
 18945 00002D47 80E10F                  	AND	CL,access_mask	;0Fh	; remove extras
 18946 00002D4A 80F900                  	CMP	CL,open_for_read ; 0	; is it open for read?
 18947 00002D4D 7404                    	JZ	short FillSFT
 18948 00002D4F 5E                      	pop	si
 18949 00002D50 1F                      	pop	ds
 18950 00002D51 EBB9                    	JMP	short Open_Bad_Access
 18951                                  ;
 18952                                  ; All done, restore registers and fill the SFT.
 18953                                  ;
 18954                                  FillSFT:
 18955 00002D53 5E                      	pop	si
 18956 00002D54 1F                      	pop	ds
 18957                                  open_ok:
 18958 00002D55 E8FF1E                  	call	DOOPEN			; Fill in SFT
 18959                                  
 18960                                  ;hkn; FastOpenFlg is in DOSDATA. use SS override
 18961                                  	; 18/05/2019
 18962                                  	;and	byte [ss:FastOpenFlag],80h
 18963 00002D58 368026[8E0D]80          	AND	BYTE [SS:FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes	;; DOS 3.3
 18964                                  	; 12/08/2018
 18965                                  	;and	byte [FastOpenFlg],Fast_yes	
 18966                                  
 18967                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18968 00002D5E E84300                  	CALL	DO_SHARE_CHECK
 18969 00002D61 7303                    	JNC	short SHARE_OK
 18970                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 18971                                  	; 16/12/2022
 18972 00002D63 E9B3E6                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 18973                                  	;;JMP	short Clear_FastOpen
 18974                                  	;retn	; 18/05/2019
 18975                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 18976                                  	;jmp	short Clear_FastOpen	
 18977                                  
 18978                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 18979                                  ;DO_SHARE_CHECK:
 18980                                  ;	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 18981                                  ;OpenShareRetry:
 18982                                  ;	push	cx			; Save number left to do
 18983                                  ;	call	SHARE_CHECK		; Final Check
 18984                                  ;	pop	cx			; CX = # left
 18985                                  ;	JNC	short SHARE_OK		; No problem with access
 18986                                  ;	call	Idle
 18987                                  ;	LOOP	OpenShareRetry		; One more retry used up
 18988                                  ;OpenShareFail:
 18989                                  ;	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 18990                                  ;	call	SHARE_ERROR
 18991                                  ;	JNC	short DO_SHARE_CHECK	; User wants more retry
 18992                                  	
 18993                                  	;12/08/2018
 18994                                  	;mov	byte [ss:FastOpenFlg],0
 18995                                  	;08/09/2018
 18996                                  	;mov	byte [FastOpenFlg],0
 18997                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 18998                                  	;JMP	short Clear_FastOpen
 18999                                  	;retn
 19000                                  
 19001                                  SHARE_OK:
 19002                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19003 00002D66 B80300                  	MOV	AX,3
 19004 00002D69 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 19005                                  ;if installed
 19006                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 19007 00002D6D FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)]  ; 14 = ShSU
 19008                                  ;else
 19009                                  ;	Call	ShSU
 19010                                  ;endif
 19011 00002D71 E8A5E6                  	call	LCritDisk
 19012                                  	
 19013                                  	;FallThru Set_SFT_Mode
 19014                                  
 19015                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19016                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_SFT_MODE
 19017                                  ;
 19018                                  ; Finish SFT initialization for new reference. Set the correct mode.
 19019                                  ;
 19020                                  ;   Inputs:
 19021                                  ;	ThisSFT points to SFT
 19022                                  ;
 19023                                  ;   Outputs:
 19024                                  ;	Carry clear
 19025                                  ;   Registers modified: AX.
 19026                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19027                                  
 19028                                  ;hkn; called from create. DS already set up to DOSDATA.
 19029                                  
 19030                                  SET_SFT_MODE:
 19031 00002D74 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 19032 00002D78 E87F19                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 19033                                  	;test	word [es:di+2],8000h
 19034                                  	; 17/12/2022
 19035                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 19036 00002D7B 26F6450380              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],sf_isFCB>>8
 19037                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB ; Clears carry
 19038 00002D80 7407                    	JZ	short Clear_FastOpen	; sf_mode correct (retz)
 19039 00002D82 A1[3003]                	MOV	AX,[CurrentPDB]
 19040                                  	;mov	[es:di+31h],ax
 19041 00002D85 26894531                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_PID],AX ; For FCB sf_PID=PDB
 19042                                  
 19043                                  Clear_FastOpen:
 19044 00002D89 C3                      	retn			       ;;;;; DOS 3.3
 19045                                  
 19046                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19047                                  ; Procedure Name : SHARE_ERROR
 19048                                  ;
 19049                                  ; Called on sharing violations. ES:DI points to SFT. AX has error code
 19050                                  ; If SFT is FCB or compatibility mode gens INT 24 error.
 19051                                  ; Returns carry set AX=error_sharing_violation if user says ignore (can't
 19052                                  ; really ignore). Carry clear if user wants a retry. ES, DI, DS preserved
 19053                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19054                                  
 19055                                  SHARE_ERROR:
 19056                                  	; 17/12/2022
 19057                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 19058 00002D8A 26F6450380              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],sf_isFCB>>8 ; 80h
 19059                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB ; 8000h
 19060 00002D8F 7509                    	JNZ	short _HARD_ERR
 19061 00002D91 268A4D02                	MOV	CL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 19062 00002D95 80E1F0                  	AND	CL,SHARING_MASK  ; 0F0h
 19063                                  	;CMP	CL,SHARING_COMPAT ; 0
 19064                                  	;JNE	short _NO_HARD_ERR
 19065                                  	; 21/09/2023
 19066 00002D98 7505                    	jnz	short _NO_HARD_ERR
 19067                                  _HARD_ERR:
 19068 00002D9A E8E846                  	call	SHARE_VIOLATION
 19069                                  	;retnc				; User wants retry
 19070 00002D9D 73EA                    	jnc	short Clear_FastOpen
 19071                                  _NO_HARD_ERR:
 19072 00002D9F B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation  ; 20h
 19073 00002DA2 F9                      	STC
 19074 00002DA3 C3                      	retn
 19075                                  
 19076                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 19077                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19078                                  ; Procedure Name : DO_SHARE_CHECK
 19079                                  ;
 19080                                  ; Input: THISDPB, WFP_Start, THISSFT set
 19081                                  ; Functions: check file sharing mode is valid
 19082                                  ; Output: carry set, error
 19083                                  ;	  carry clear, share ok
 19084                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19085                                  
 19086                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19087                                  DO_SHARE_CHECK:
 19088 00002DA4 E857E6                  	call	ECritDisk		; enter critical section
 19089                                  OPN_RETRY:
 19090 00002DA7 8B0E[1A00]              	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 19091                                  OpenShareRetry:
 19092 00002DAB 51                      	push	cx			; Save number left to do
 19093 00002DAC E8D146                  	call	SHARE_CHECK		; Final Check
 19094 00002DAF 59                      	pop	cx			; CX = # left
 19095 00002DB0 730E                    	JNC	short Share_Ok2		; No problem with access
 19096 00002DB2 E840E5                  	call	Idle
 19097 00002DB5 E2F4                    	LOOP	OpenShareRetry		; One more retry used up
 19098                                  OpenShareFail:
 19099 00002DB7 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 19100 00002DBB E8CCFF                  	call	SHARE_ERROR
 19101 00002DBE 73E7                    	JNC	short OPN_RETRY		; User wants more retry
 19102                                  Share_Ok2:
 19103                                  	;call	LCritDisk		; leave critical section
 19104                                  	;retn
 19105                                  	; 18/12/2022
 19106 00002DC0 E956E6                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19107                                  
 19108                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19109                                  ; Procedure Name : Check_Access
 19110                                  ;
 19111                                  ; Inputs:
 19112                                  ;	AX is mode
 19113                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 19114                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 19115                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 19116                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 19117                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 19118                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 19119                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 19120                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 19121                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 19122                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 19123                                  ; Function:
 19124                                  ;	Check this access mode for correctness
 19125                                  ; Outputs:
 19126                                  ;	[open_access] = AL input
 19127                                  ;	Carry Clear
 19128                                  ;		Mode is correct
 19129                                  ;		AX unchanged
 19130                                  ;	Carry Set
 19131                                  ;		Mode is bad
 19132                                  ;		AX = error_invalid_access
 19133                                  ; No other registers effected
 19134                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19135                                  
 19136                                  Check_Access_AX:
 19137 00002DC3 A2[6E05]                	MOV	[OPEN_ACCESS],AL
 19138 00002DC6 53                      	PUSH	BX
 19139                                  
 19140                                  ;	If sharing, then test for special sharing mode for FCBs
 19141                                  
 19142 00002DC7 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 19143 00002DC9 80E3F0                  	AND	BL,SHARING_MASK ; 0F0h
 19144 00002DCC 803E[7205]FF            	CMP	byte [FSHARING],-1
 19145 00002DD1 7505                    	JNZ	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 19146 00002DD3 80FB70                  	CMP	BL,SHARING_NET_FCB
 19147 00002DD6 7405                    	JZ	short CheckAccessMode	; yes, we have an FCB
 19148                                  CheckShareMode:
 19149 00002DD8 80FB40                  	CMP	BL,40h			; is this a good sharing mode?
 19150 00002DDB 770D                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 19151                                  CheckAccessMode:
 19152 00002DDD 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 19153 00002DDF 80E30F                  	AND	BL,access_mask
 19154 00002DE2 80FB02                  	CMP	BL,2
 19155 00002DE5 7703                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 19156 00002DE7 5B                      	POP	BX
 19157 00002DE8 F8                      	CLC
 19158 00002DE9 C3                      	retn
 19159                                  
 19160                                  Make_Bad_Access:
 19161 00002DEA B80C00                  	MOV	AX,error_invalid_access ; 0Ch
 19162 00002DED 5B                      	POP	BX
 19163 00002DEE F9                      	STC
 19164 00002DEF C3                      	retn
 19165                                  
 19166                                  ;============================================================================
 19167                                  ; DINFO.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 19168                                  ;============================================================================
 19169                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19170                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19171                                  
 19172                                  ;**	Low level routine for returning disk drive information from a local
 19173                                  ;	  or NET device
 19174                                  ;
 19175                                  ;	DISK_INFO
 19176                                  ;
 19177                                  ;	  Modification history:
 19178                                  ;
 19179                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19180                                  
 19181                                  ;	Break	<DISK_INFO -- Get Disk Drive Information>
 19182                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19183                                  ; Procedure Name : DISK_INFO
 19184                                  ;
 19185                                  ; Inputs:
 19186                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to the Macro List Structure of interest
 19187                                  ;		(It MAY NOT be NUL, error not detected)
 19188                                  ; Function:
 19189                                  ;	Get Interesting Drive Information
 19190                                  ; Returns:
 19191                                  ;	DX = Number of free allocation units
 19192                                  ;	BX = Total Number of allocation units on disk
 19193                                  ;	CX = Sector size
 19194                                  ;	AL = Sectors per allocation unit
 19195                                  ;	AH = FAT ID BYTE
 19196                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 19197                                  ; Segs except ES preserved, others destroyed
 19198                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19199                                  
 19200                                  ;hkn; called from getset.asm and misc.asm. DS has already been set up to 
 19201                                  ;hkn; DOSDATA. 
 19202                                  
 19203                                  DISK_INFO:
 19204                                  	; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19205                                  	; IBM DOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 37C5h
 19206                                  
 19207 00002DF0 E847E5                  	call	TestNet
 19208 00002DF3 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_DSK_INFO
 19209                                  
 19210                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19211                                  ;	transfer NET_DISK_INFO
 19212                                  ;ELSE
 19213                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 12
 19214                                  	;INT	2FH
 19215                                  	;return
 19216                                  
 19217 00002DF5 B80C11                  	mov     ax,110Ch
 19218 00002DF8 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET DISK SPACE
 19219                                  			; ES:DI -> current directory
 19220                                  			; Return: AL = sectors per cluster, BX = total clusters
 19221                                  			; CX = bytes per sector, DX = number of available clusters
 19222 00002DFA C3                      	retn
 19223                                  ;ENDIF
 19224                                  
 19225                                  LOCAL_DSK_INFO:
 19226 00002DFB C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 19227 00002E00 E8FBE5                  	call	ECritDisk
 19228 00002E03 E8DC29                  	call	FATREAD_CDS		; perform media check.
 19229 00002E06 7241                    	JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 19230 00002E08 BB0200                  	MOV	BX,2
 19231 00002E0B E83D28                  	call	UNPACK			; Get first FAT sector into CURBUF
 19232 00002E0E 7239                    	JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 19233 00002E10 C536[E205]              	LDS	SI,[CURBUF]
 19234                                  	;mov	ah,[si+20]
 19235 00002E14 8A6418                  	MOV	AH,[SI+BUFINSIZ]	; get FAT ID BYTE
 19236                                  
 19237                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 19238 00002E17 16                      	push	ss
 19239 00002E18 1F                      	pop	ds
 19240                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 19241 00002E19 268B4E0D                	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 19242                                  
 19243                                  ; Examine the current free count. If it indicates that we have an invalid
 19244                                  ; count, do the expensive calculation.
 19245                                  
 19246                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+1Fh]
 19247 00002E1D 268B561F                	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; get free count
 19248 00002E21 83FAFF                  	CMP	DX,-1			; is it valid?
 19249 00002E24 7404                    	JZ	short DoScan
 19250                                  
 19251                                  ; Check to see if it is in a reasonable range. If so, trust it and return.
 19252                                  ; Otherwise, we need to blast out an internal error message and then recompute
 19253                                  ; the count.
 19254                                  
 19255 00002E26 39CA                    	CMP	DX,CX			; is it in a reasonable range?
 19256 00002E28 7222                    	JB	short GotVal		; yes, trust it.
 19257                                  DoScan:
 19258 00002E2A 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 19259 00002E2C 49                      	DEC	CX
 19260                                  SCANFREE:
 19261 00002E2D E81B28                  	call	UNPACK
 19262 00002E30 7217                    	JC	short CRIT_LEAVE
 19263 00002E32 7501                    	JNZ	short NOTFREECLUS
 19264 00002E34 42                      	INC	DX			; A free one
 19265                                  NOTFREECLUS:
 19266 00002E35 43                      	INC	BX			; Next cluster
 19267 00002E36 E2F5                    	LOOP	SCANFREE
 19268 00002E38 4B                      	DEC	BX			; BX was next cluster. Convert to
 19269                                  ReturnVals:
 19270 00002E39 4B                      	DEC	BX			; count
 19271                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 19272 00002E3A 268A4604                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 19273 00002E3E FEC0                    	INC	AL			; Sectors/cluster
 19274                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 19275 00002E40 268B4E02                	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Bytes/sector
 19276                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Fh],dx
 19277 00002E44 2689561F                	MOV	[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],DX
 19278 00002E48 F8                      	CLC
 19279                                  CRIT_LEAVE:
 19280                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 19281                                  	;retn
 19282                                  	; 17/12/2022
 19283 00002E49 E9CDE5                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19284                                  
 19285                                  ; We have correctly computed everything previously. Load up registers for
 19286                                  ; return.
 19287                                  
 19288                                  GotVal: 
 19289 00002E4C 89CB                    	MOV	BX,CX			; get cluster count
 19290 00002E4E EBE9                    	JMP	short ReturnVals

 19297                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_SEARCH - Internal SEARCH calls for MS-DOS
 19298                                  ;	NAME	DOS_SEARCH
 19299                                  
 19300                                  ;**	Low level routines for doing local and NET directory searches
 19301                                  ;
 19302                                  ;	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 19303                                  ;	DOS_SEARCH_NEXT
 19304                                  ;	RENAME_NEXT
 19305                                  ;
 19306                                  ;	Revision history:
 19307                                  ;
 19308                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19309                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 19310                                  ;	    A001	PTM 3564 -- search for fastopen
 19311                                  
 19312                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 19313                                  
 19314                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19315                                  ;
 19316                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 19317                                  ;
 19318                                  ; Inputs:
 19319                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19320                                  ;		terminated)
 19321                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19322                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19323                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19324                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19325                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19326                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19327                                  ;	[DMAADD] Points to 53 byte buffer
 19328                                  ; Function:
 19329                                  ;	Initiate a search for the given file spec
 19330                                  ; Outputs:
 19331                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19332                                  ;	    The 53 bytes ot DMAADD are filled in as follows:
 19333                                  ;
 19334                                  ;	LOCAL
 19335                                  ;	    Drive Byte (A=1, B=2, ...) High bit clear
 19336                                  ;		NEVER STORE DRIVE BYTE AFTER  found_it
 19337                                  ;	    11 byte search name with Meta chars in it
 19338                                  ;	    Search Attribute Byte, attribute of search
 19339                                  ;	    WORD LastEnt value
 19340                                  ;	    WORD DirStart
 19341                                  ;	    4 byte pad
 19342                                  ;	    32 bytes of the directory entry found
 19343                                  ;	NET
 19344                                  ;	    21 bytes First byte has high bit set
 19345                                  ;	    32 bytes of the directory entry found
 19346                                  ;
 19347                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19348                                  ;	    AX = error code
 19349                                  ;		error_no_more_files
 19350                                  ;			No match for this file
 19351                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19352                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19353                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19354                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19355                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19356                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19357                                  
 19358                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19359                                  	; DOSCODE:6C22h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 19360                                  
 19361                                  DOS_SEARCH_FIRST:
 19362                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3 kernel) - Offset 3826h
 19363                                  
 19364 00002E50 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]

 19366 00002E57 7506                    	JNZ	short TEST_RE_NET2
 19367                                  
 19368                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19369                                  ;	transfer NET_SEQ_SEARCH_FIRST

 19371                                  	;mov	ax,1119h

 19373 00002E5C CD2F                    	INT	2Fh
 19374 00002E5E C3                      	retn
 19375                                  ;ENDIF

 19550                                  ;BREAK <DOS_SEARCH_NEXT - scan for subsequent matches>
 19551                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19552                                  ;
 19553                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_SEARCH_NEXT
 19554                                  ;
 19555                                  ; Inputs:
 19556                                  ;	[DMAADD] Points to 53 byte buffer returned by DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 19557                                  ;	    (only first 21 bytes must have valid information)
 19558                                  ; Function:
 19559                                  ;	Look for subsequent matches
 19560                                  ; Outputs:
 19561                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19562                                  ;	    The 53 bytes at DMAADD are updated for next call
 19563                                  ;		(see DOS_SEARCH_FIRST)
 19564                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19565                                  ;	    AX = error code
 19566                                  ;		error_no_more_files
 19567                                  ;			No more files to find
 19568                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19569                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 19571                                  ;hkn; called from search.asm. DS already set up at this point.

 19577 00002F45 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_SEARCH_NEXT
 19578                                  ;IF NOT Installed

 19584                                  		     ; SS = DS = DOS CS, [DTA] = 21-byte findfirst search data
 19585                                  		     ; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 19586                                  		     ; CF clear if successful
 19587 00002F4C C3                      	retn
 19588                                  ;ENDIF
