 22191                                  
 22192                                  ;Break	<DSKREAD -- PHYSICAL DISK READ>
 22193                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22194                                  ;
 22195                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKREAD
 22196                                  ;
 22197                                  ; Inputs:
 22198                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 22199                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 22200                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 22201                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 22202                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 22203                                  ; Function:
 22204                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 22205                                  ; Outputs:
 22206                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 22207                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 22208                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 22209                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 22210                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 22211                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 22212                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22213                                  
 22214                                  DSKREAD:
 22215 0000386C 51                      	PUSH	CX
 22216                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 22217 0000386D 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 22218                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 22219 00003871 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 22220 00003875 53                      	PUSH	BX
 22221 00003876 06                      	PUSH	ES
 22222 00003877 E87A0F                  	call	SETREAD
 22223 0000387A EB27                    	JMP	short DODSKOP
 22224                                  
 22225                                  ;Break	<DWRITE -- SEE ABOUT WRITING>
 22226                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22227                                  ;
 22228                                  ; Procedure Name : DWRITE
 22229                                  ;
 22230                                  ; Inputs:
 22231                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 22232                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 22233                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 22234                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 22235                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 22236                                  ;	[ALLOWED] must be set in case HARDERR called
 22237                                  ; Function:
 22238                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform disk write. If BIOS reports
 22239                                  ;	errors, will call HARDERRRW for further action.
 22240                                  ; Output:
 22241                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently, user FAILed to I 24)
 22242                                  ; BP preserved. All other registers destroyed.
 22243                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22244                                  
 22245                                  	;entry	DWRITE
 22246                                  DWRITE:
 22247 0000387C E81600                  	CALL	DSKWRITE
 22248 0000387F 7413                    	jz	short dw_ret_label	; Carry clear (retz)
 22249                                  
 22250                                  ;hkn; SS override
 22251 00003881 36C606[7505]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:READOP],1
 22252 00003887 E83A00                  	call	HARDERRRW
 22253 0000388A 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1		; Check for retry
 22254 0000388C 74EE                    	JZ	short DWRITE
 22255 0000388E 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3		; Check for FAIL
 22256 00003890 F8                      	CLC
 22257 00003891 7501                    	JNZ	short NO_CAR2 	; Ignore
 22258 00003893 F9                      	STC
 22259                                  NO_CAR2:
 22260                                  dw_ret_label:
 22261 00003894 C3                      	retn
 22262                                  
 22263                                  ;Break	<DSKWRITE -- PHYSICAL DISK WRITE>
 22264                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22265                                  ;
 22266                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKWRITE
 22267                                  ;
 22268                                  ; Inputs:
 22269                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 22270                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 22271                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 22272                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 22273                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 22274                                  ; Function:
 22275                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 22276                                  ; Outputs:
 22277                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 22278                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 22279                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 22280                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 22281                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 22282                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 22283                                  ;
 22284                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22285                                  
 22286                                  	;entry	DSKWRITE
 22287                                  DSKWRITE:
 22288 00003895 51                      	PUSH	CX
 22289                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 22290 00003896 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 22291                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 22292 0000389A 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 22293 0000389E 53                      	PUSH	BX
 22294 0000389F 06                      	PUSH	ES
 22295 000038A0 E8840F                  	call	SETWRITE
 22296                                  DODSKOP:
 22297 000038A3 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS		; Save DS
 22298 000038A5 1F                      	POP	DS		; DS:BP points to DPB
 22299 000038A6 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 22300                                  
 22301                                  	;lds	si,[ds:bp+13h] ; 04/05/2019
 22302 000038A7 3EC57613                	LDS	SI,[ds:BP+DPB.DRIVER_ADDR] ; 07/09/2018
 22303 000038AB E8D00E                  	call	DEVIOCALL2
 22304                                  
 22305 000038AE 8ED9                    	MOV	DS,CX		; Restore DS
 22306 000038B0 07                      	POP	ES		; Restore ES
 22307 000038B1 5B                      	POP	BX
 22308                                  
 22309                                  ;hkn; SS override
 22310 000038B2 368B0E[6C03]            	MOV	CX,[SS:CALLSCNT] ; Number of sectors transferred
 22311 000038B7 5F                      	POP	DI
 22312 000038B8 29F9                    	SUB	CX,DI
 22313 000038BA F7D9                    	NEG	CX		; Number of sectors not transferred
 22314                                  
 22315                                  ;hkn; SS override
 22316 000038BC 36A1[5D03]              	MOV	AX,[SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 22317                                  	;test	ax,8000h
 22318                                  	; 17/12/2022
 22319                                  	;test	ah,80h
 22320 000038C0 F6C480                  	test	ah,(STERR>>8)
 22321                                  	;test	AX,STERR
 22322 000038C3 C3                      	retn
 22323                                  
 22324                                  ;Break	<HardErrRW - map extended errors and call harderr>
 22325                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22326                                  ;
 22327                                  ; Procedure Name : HardErrRW
 22328                                  ;
 22329                                  ; Inputs:
 22330                                  ;	AX is error code from read or write
 22331                                  ;	Other registers set as per HARDERR
 22332                                  ; Function:
 22333                                  ;	Checks the error code for special extended
 22334                                  ;	errors and maps them if needed. Then invokes
 22335                                  ;	Harderr
 22336                                  ; Outputs:
 22337                                  ;	Of HARDERR
 22338                                  ; AX may be modified prior to call to HARDERR.
 22339                                  ; No other registers altered.
 22340                                  ;
 22341                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22342

 22344                                  HARDERRRW:

 22346 000038C4 3C0F                    	CMP	AL,error_I24_wrong_disk

 22348

 22350                                  	;push	ds
 22351                                  	;push	si
 22352                                  	;lds	si,[ss:CALLVIDRW]

 22354                                  	;mov	[ss:EXTERRPT], si
 22355                                  	;pop	si
 22356                                  	;pop	ds
 22357

 22359 000038C8 50                      	push	ax
 22360 000038C9 36A1[7003]              	mov	ax,[SS:CALLVIDRW]		; get ptr lo  ;smr;SS Override
 22361 000038CD 36A3[2803]              	mov	[ss:EXTERRPT],ax		; set ext err ptr lo
 22362 000038D1 36A1[7203]              	mov	ax,[SS:CALLVIDRW+2]		; get ptr hi from dev
 22363 000038D5 36A3[2A03]              	mov	[ss:EXTERRPT+2],ax		; set ext err ptr hi
 22364 000038D9 58                      	pop	ax
 22365                                  DO_ERR:

 22372                                  	;call	HARDERR

 22375                                  ; 24/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 22376                                  
 22377                                  ;Break	<SETUP -- SETUP A DISK READ OR WRITE FROM USER>
 22378                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22379                                  ;
 22380                                  ; Procedure Name : SETUP
 22381                                  ;
 22382                                  ; Inputs:
 22383                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT (value also in THISSFT)
 22384                                  ;	DMAAdd contains transfer address
 22385                                  ;	CX = Byte count
 22386                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 22387                                  ;   WARNING Stack must be clean, two ret addrs on stack, 1st of caller,
 22388                                  ;		2nd of caller of caller.
 22389                                  ; Outputs:
 22390                                  ;	    CX = byte count
 22391                                  ;	    [THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters if file
 22392                                  ;		      = Pointer to device header if device or NET
 22393                                  ;	    ES:DI Points to SFT
 22394                                  ;	    [NEXTADD] = Displacement of disk transfer within segment
 22395                                  ;	    [TRANS] = 0 (No transfers yet)
 22396                                  ;	    BytPos = Byte position in file
 22397                                  ;
 22398                                  ;	The following fields are relevant to local files (not devices) only:
 22399                                  ;
 22400                                  ;	    SecPos = Position of first sector (local files only)
 22401                                  ;	    [BYTSECPOS] = Byte position in first sector (local files only)
 22402                                  ;	    [CLUSNUM] = First cluster (local files only)
 22403                                  ;	    [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector within first cluster (local files only)
 22404                                  ;	    [THISDRV] = Physical unit number (local files only)
 22405                                  ;
 22406                                  ;      RETURNS ONE LEVEL UP WITH:
 22407                                  ;	   CX = 0
 22408                                  ;	   CARRY = Clear
 22409                                  ;	IF AN ERROR IS DETECTED
 22410                                  ; All other registers destroyed
 22411                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22412                                  
 22413                                  ;hkn; called from disk.asm. DS has been set up to DOSDATA.
 22414                                  
 22415                                  ; DOSCODE:770Bh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 22416                                  
 22417                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 22418                                  ; DOSCODE:76F7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 22419                                  
 22420                                  SETUP:
 22421                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 411Bh
 22422                                  
 22423                                  	;lds 	si,[es:di+7]
 22424 000038DD 26C57507                	LDS	SI,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr]
 22425                                  
 22426                                  ;hkn; SS override
 22427 000038E1 368C1E[8C05]            	MOV	[SS:THISDPB+2],DS
 22428                                  
 22429                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 22430 000038E6 16                      	push	ss
 22431 000038E7 1F                      	pop	ds
 22432                                  
 22433 000038E8 8936[8A05]              	MOV	[THISDPB],SI
 22434                                  
 22435 000038EC 8B1E[2C03]              	MOV	BX,[DMAADD]
 22436 000038F0 891E[B805]              	MOV	[NEXTADD],BX		;Set NEXTADD to start of Xaddr
 22437 000038F4 C606[7405]00            	MOV	BYTE [TRANS],0		;No transferes
 22438                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+15h]
 22439 000038F9 268B4515                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position]
 22440                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+17h]
 22441 000038FD 268B5517                	MOV	DX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position+2]
 22442 00003901 8916[D005]              	MOV	[BYTPOS+2],DX		;Set it
 22443 00003905 A3[CE05]                	MOV	[BYTPOS],AX
 22444                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],8080h
 22445 00003908 26F745058080            	TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet+devid_device
 22446 0000390E 753C                    	JNZ	short NOSETSTUFF	;Following not done on devs or NET
 22447 00003910 06                      	PUSH	ES
 22448 00003911 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		;Point at the DPB
 22449                                  
 22450                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 22451                                  	;;mov	bl,[es:bp+0]
 22452                                  	;MOV	BL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 22453                                  	; 05/12/2022
 22454 00003915 268A5E00                	mov	bl,[es:bp]
 22455                                  	
 22456 00003919 881E[7605]              	MOV	[THISDRV],BL		;Set THISDRV
 22457                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 22458 0000391D 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 22459                                  
 22460                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3
 22461                                  	;cmp	dx,bx
 22462                                  	;jnb	short EOFERR
 22463                                  	;div	bx
 22464                                  	;mov	[SECPOS],ax
 22465                                  	;mov	[BYTSECPOS],dx
 22466                                  	;mov	dx,ax
 22467                                  	;;and	al,[es:bp+4]
 22468                                  	;AND	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 22469                                  	;mov	[SECCLUSPOS],al
 22470                                  	;mov	ax,cx
 22471                                  	;;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 22472                                  	;MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 22473                                  	;shr	dx,cl
 22474                                  	;mov	[CLUSNUM],dx
 22475                                  	;pop	es
 22476                                  	;mov	cx,ax
 22477                                  
 22478                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22479                                  
 22480                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 22481                                  ;M039: Optimized this section.
 22482 00003921 51                              PUSH    CX			;SHR32 and DIV32 use CX.
 22483 00003922 E83405                  	call	DIV32			;DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem)
 22484 00003925 8916[CC05]              	MOV	[BYTSECPOS],DX
 22485 00003929 A3[C405]                	MOV	[SECPOS],AX
 22486 0000392C 890E[C605]              	MOV	[SECPOS+2],CX
 22487 00003930 89CA                    	MOV	DX,CX
 22488                                  
 22489 00003932 89C3                    	MOV	BX,AX
 22490                                  	;and	bl,[es:bp+4]
 22491 00003934 26225E04                	AND	BL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 22492 00003938 881E[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],BL
 22493                                  
 22494 0000393C E84105                  	call	SHR32			;(DX:AX SHR dpb_cluster_shift)
 22495 0000393F 59                      	POP	CX			;CX = byte count.
 22496 00003940 751F                    	JNZ	short EOFERR		;cluster number above 64k
 22497                                  	;cmp	ax,[es:bp+0Dh]
 22498 00003942 263B460D                	CMP	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER] ;>32mb  if > disk size ;AN000;
 22499 00003946 7719                    	JA	short EOFERR		   ;>32mb  then EOF       ;AN000;
 22500                                  
 22501 00003948 A3[BC05]                	MOV	[CLUSNUM],AX
 22502 0000394B 07                      	POP	ES			; ES:DI point to SFT
 22503                                  ;M039
 22504                                  
 22505                                  NOSETSTUFF:
 22506 0000394C 89C8                    	MOV	AX,CX		; AX = Byte count.
 22507 0000394E 0306[2C03]              	ADD	AX,[DMAADD]	; See if it will fit in one segment
 22508 00003952 730C                    	JNC	short setup_OK	; Must be less than 64
 22509 00003954 A1[2C03]                	MOV	AX,[DMAADD]
 22510 00003957 F7D8                    	NEG	AX		; Amount of room left in segment (know
 22511                                  				;    less than 64K since max value of CX
 22512                                  				;    is FFFF).
 22513 00003959 7501                    	JNZ	short NoDec
 22514 0000395B 48                      	DEC	AX
 22515                                  NoDec:
 22516 0000395C 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX		; Can do this much
 22517 0000395E E304                    	JCXZ	NOROOM		; Silly user gave Xaddr of FFFF in segment
 22518                                  setup_OK:
 22519 00003960 C3                      	retn
 22520                                  
 22521                                  EOFERR:
 22522 00003961 07                      	POP	ES		; ES:DI point to SFT
 22523 00003962 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX		; No bytes read
 22524                                  ;;;;;;;;;;; 7/18/86
 22525                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 22526                                  	;MOV	BYTE [DISK_FULL],1 ; set disk full flag
 22527                                  ;;;;;;;;;;;
 22528                                  NOROOM:
 22529 00003964 5B                      	POP	BX		; Kill return address
 22530 00003965 F8                      	CLC
 22531 00003966 C3                      	retn			; RETURN TO CALLER OF CALLER

 22533                                  ;Break	<BREAKDOWN -- CUT A USER READ OR WRITE INTO PIECES>
 22534                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22535                                  ;
 22536                                  ; Procedure Name : BREAKDOWN
 22537                                  ;
 22538                                  ; Inputs:
 22539                                  ;	CX = Length of disk transfer in bytes
 22540                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 22541                                  ;	[BYTSECPOS] = Byte position within first sector
 22542                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 22543                                  ; Outputs:
 22544                                  ;	[BYTCNT1] = Bytes to transfer in first sector
 22545                                  ;	[SECCNT] = No. of whole sectors to transfer
 22546                                  ;	[BYTCNT2] = Bytes to transfer in last sector
 22547                                  ; AX, BX, DX destroyed. No other registers affected.
 22548                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22549                                  
 22550                                  BREAKDOWN:

 22561 0000397C 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX		; And no bytes are left

 22569 0000398C 8916[D405]              	MOV	[BYTCNT2],DX	; Bytes remaining for last sector

 22578                                  _RET45:

 23025                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 23026                                  ;
 23027                                  ; Function:
 23028                                  ;	The Buffer Queue is scanned: the contents of any dirty buffers are
 23029                                  ;	"read" into the transfer memory block, so that the transfer memory
 23030                                  ;	reflects the most recent data.
 23031                                  ;
 23032                                  ; Outputs:
 23033                                  ;       Transfer memory updated as required.
 23034                                  ;
 23035                                  ; Uses:
 23036                                  ;       DS,AX,BX,CX,SI,DI destroyed.
 23037                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 23038                                  ;
 23039                                  ; Notes:
 23040                                  ;       FIRST_BUFF_ADDR is set-up to contain the LAST buffer to check, rather
 23041                                  ;	than the FIRST.
 23042                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23043                                  ;M039: Created
 23044                                  
 23045                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23046                                  ; DOSCODE:78F0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23047                                  
 23048                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23049                                  ; DOSCODE:78DCh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 23050                                  
 23051                                  ;procedure DskRdBufScan,NEAR
 23052                                  ;
 23053                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 23054                                  
 23055                                  DskRdBufScan:
 23056 00003ABC 36833E[7100]00          	cmp	word [ss:DirtyBufferCount],0 ; Any dirty buffers?
 23057 00003AC2 743C                    	je	short bufx		     ; -no, skip all work.
 23058                                  
 23059 00003AC4 368B1E[0706]            	mov     bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 23060 00003AC9 89DE                    	mov     si,bx
 23061 00003ACB 01D1                    	add     cx,dx
 23062 00003ACD 83D600                  	adc     si,0
 23063                                  
 23064 00003AD0 E83F1F                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> 1st buf in queue.
 23065                                  	;mov	ax,[di+2]
 23066 00003AD3 8B4502                  	mov     ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_prev]
 23067 00003AD6 36A3[0E0F]              	mov     [ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR],ax
 23068                                  		
 23069                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 23070                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 23071                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 23072                                  	; 15/12/2022
 23073 00003ADA 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 23074                                  
 23075                                  ;       BX:DX = Extent start.
 23076                                  ;       SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 23077                                  ;          AL = Drive #.
 23078                                  ;       DS:DI-> 1st buffer in queue.
 23079                                  ;[FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] = Address offset of last buffer in queue.
 23080                                  
 23081                                  bufq:	
 23082                                  	;cmp	al,[di+4]
 23083 00003ADE 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 23084 00003AE1 7514                    	jne	short bufq1        	;  -no, jump.
 23085                                  
 23086                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 23087                                  ;       ja	short bufq1		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 23088                                  
 23089                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 23090 00003AE3 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 23091 00003AE6 7503                    	jne	short bufq01
 23092                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 23093 00003AE8 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 23094                                  bufq01:
 23095 00003AEB 770A                    	ja	short bufq1
 23096                                  
 23097                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 23098                                  ;       ja	short bufq2		;Jump if Extent end >= buffer sector.
 23099                                  
 23100                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 23101 00003AED 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 23102 00003AF0 7503                    	jne	short bufq02
 23103                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 23104 00003AF2 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 23105                                  bufq02:
 23106 00003AF5 770A                    	ja	short bufq2
 23107                                  bufq1:	
 23108 00003AF7 363B3E[0E0F]            	cmp     di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 23109 00003AFC 8B3D                    	mov	di,[di]
 23110                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next] ; Set-up for next buffer.
 23111 00003AFE 75DE                    	jne	short bufq		; -no, do next buffer
 23112                                  bufx:
 23113 00003B00 C3                      	retn				;Exit.
 23114                                  
 23115                                  ;       Buffer's sector is in Extent: if it is dirty, copy its contents to
 23116                                  ;	transfer memory; otherwise, just re-position it in the buffer queue
 23117                                  ;       as MRU (Most Recently Used).
 23118                                  
 23119                                  bufq2:	
 23120 00003B01 50                      	push	ax
 23121                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 23122 00003B02 F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 23123 00003B06 742D                    	jz	short bufq3                    ; -no, jump.
 23124                                  
 23125                                  ;       SaveReg <cx,dx,si,di,es>
 23126 00003B08 51                      	push	cx
 23127 00003B09 52                      	push	dx
 23128 00003B0A 56                      	push	si
 23129 00003B0B 57                      	push	di
 23130 00003B0C 06                      	push	es
 23131                                  
 23132 00003B0D 89D0                    	mov     ax,dx
 23133                                  	;sub	ax,[di+6]
 23134 00003B0F 2B4506                  	sub	ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 23135 00003B12 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 23136                                  
 23137                                  ;       AX = offset (in sectors) of buffer sector within Transfer memory
 23138                                  ;            block. (Note: the upper word of the sector # may be ignored
 23139                                  ;	     since no more than 64k bytes will ever be read. This 64k limit
 23140                                  ;            is imposed by the input parameters of the disk read operation.)
 23141                                  
 23142                                  	;lea	si,[di+20]
 23143 00003B14 8D7518                  	lea	si,[di+BUFINSIZ]	;DS:SI -> buffer data.
 23144                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 23145 00003B17 268B4E02                	mov     cx,[es:bp+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ;CX = sector size (in bytes).
 23146 00003B1B F7E1                    	mul     cx			;AX = offset (in bytes) of buf. sector
 23147 00003B1D 368B3E[0C06]            	mov     di,[ss:TEMP_VAR]
 23148 00003B22 01C7                    	add	di,ax
 23149 00003B24 368E06[0E06]            	mov	es,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]
 23150 00003B29 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 23151                                  
 23152                                  ;	   CX = sector size (in WORDs) ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 23153                                  ;       DS:SI-> Buffer sector data.
 23154                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 23155                                  
 23156 00003B2B F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy buffer sector to Transfer memory
 23157                                  	;; 04/05/2019
 23158                                  	;;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 23159                                  	;;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 23160                                  	;jnc	short bufq03	
 23161                                  	;movsb
 23162                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 23163                                  	;adc	cx,0
 23164                                  	;rep	movsb
 23165                                  	; 22/09/2023
 23166 00003B2D 7301                    	jnc	short bufq03
 23167 00003B2F A4                      	movsb
 23168                                  bufq03:
 23169                                  	;RestoreReg <es,di,si,dx,cx>
 23170 00003B30 07                      	pop	es
 23171 00003B31 5F                      	pop	di
 23172 00003B32 5E                      	pop	si
 23173 00003B33 5A                      	pop	dx
 23174 00003B34 59                      	pop	cx
 23175                                  
 23176                                  ;       DS:DI -> current buffer.
 23177                                  bufq3:	
 23178 00003B35 89F8                    	mov     ax,di			;DS:AX -> Current buffer.
 23179                                          ;invoke SCANPLACE
 23180 00003B37 E8EA1E                  	call	SCANPLACE
 23181 00003B3A 363B06[0E0F]            	cmp	ax,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] ;Last buffer?
 23182 00003B3F 58                      	pop	ax
 23183                                  	;jne	short bufq		; -no, jump.
 23184                                  	;;jmp	short bufx		; -yes, exit.
 23185                                  	;; 12/06/2019
 23186                                  	;retn
 23187                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compability)
 23188 00003B40 759C                    	jne	short bufq
 23189 00003B42 EBBC                    	jmp	short bufx
 23190                                  
 23191                                  ;EndProc DskRdBufScan
 23192

 23194                                  ; DISK3.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991

 23200                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23201                                  ;
 23202                                  ; Procedure Name : DISKWRITE
 23203                                  ;
 23204                                  ; Inputs:
 23205                                  ;       Outputs of SETUP
 23206                                  ; Function:
 23207                                  ;       Perform disk write
 23208                                  ; Outputs:
 23209                                  ;    Carry clear

 23213                                  ;    Carry set

 23215                                  ;       ES:DI point to SFT

 23339                                  
 23340                                  ;       AX = Last cluster to write.
 23341                                  ;       DX = # of bytes in last sector to write (the "tail").
 23342                                  ;       BX = [ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
