 23888                                  
 23889                                  ;Break   <DskWrtBufPurge -- Disk Write Buffer Purge>
 23890                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23891                                  ;
 23892                                  ; Procedure Name : DskWrtBufPurge
 23893                                  ;
 23894                                  ; Inputs:
 23895                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors to write. (These constitute a block of
 23896                                  ;	     sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 23897                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 23898                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 23899                                  ;
 23900                                  ; Function:
 23901                                  ;       Purge the Buffer Queue and the Secondary Cache of any buffers which
 23902                                  ;	are in Extent; they are being over-written.
 23903                                  ;
 23904                                  ; Outputs:
 23905                                  ;       (Same as Input.)
 23906                                  ; Uses:
 23907                                  ;       All registers except DS,AX,SI,DI preserved.
 23908                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 23909                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23910                                  ;M039: Created
 23911                                  
 23912                                  ;procedure   DskWrtBufPurge,NEAR
 23913                                  ;
 23914                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 23915                                  
 23916                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23917                                  ; DOSCODE:7C0Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23918                                  
 23919                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23920                                  ; DOSCODE:7BD4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 23921                                  
 23922                                  DskWrtBufPurge:
 23923                                  	;SaveReg <bx,cx>
 23924 00003DD3 53                      	push	bx
 23925 00003DD4 51                      	push	cx
 23926                                  
 23927 00003DD5 368B1E[0706]            	mov	bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	;BX:DX = Extent start (sector #).
 23928 00003DDA 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 23929 00003DDC 01D1                    	add	cx,dx
 23930 00003DDE 83D600                  	adc	si,0                    ;SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 23931                                  
 23932                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 23933                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 23934                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 23935                                  	; 15/12/2022
 23936 00003DE1 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 23937                                  
 23938                                  ;	BX:DX = Extent start.
 23939                                  ;	SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 23940                                  ;	AL = Drive #
 23941                                  
 23942 00003DE5 36833E[7700]00          	cmp	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0 ;Secondary cache in-use?
 23943 00003DEB 7431                    	je	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 23944                                  
 23945                                  ;	If any of the sectors to be written are in the secondary cache (SC),
 23946                                  ;	invalidate the entire SC. (This is an optimization; we really only
 23947                                  ;	need to invalidate those sectors which intersect, but that's slower.)
 23948                                  
 23949 00003DED 363A06[040E]            	cmp	al,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	;Same drive?
 23950 00003DF2 752A                    	jne	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 23951                                  
 23952 00003DF4 50                      	push    ax
 23953 00003DF5 36A1[050E]              	mov     ax,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]
 23954 00003DF9 368B3E[070E]            	mov     di,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]	;DI:AX = SC start.
 23955                                  
 23956                                  	;Cmp32	si,cx,di,ax		;Extent end < SC start?
 23957                                  	;jbe	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 23958                                  
 23959 00003DFE 39FE                    	cmp	si,di
 23960 00003E00 7502                    	jne	short sc01
 23961 00003E02 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 23962                                  sc01: 
 23963 00003E04 7617                    	jbe	short sc5	
 23964                                  
 23965 00003E06 360306[7700]            	add	ax,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]
 23966 00003E0B 83D700                  	adc	di,0                    ;DI:AX = SC end + 1.
 23967                                  	
 23968                                  	;Cmp32	bx,dx,di,ax             ;Extent start > SC end?
 23969                                  	;jae	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 23970                                  
 23971 00003E0E 39FB                    	cmp	bx,di
 23972 00003E10 7502                    	jne	short sc02
 23973 00003E12 39C2                    	cmp	dx,ax
 23974                                  sc02:
 23975 00003E14 7307                    	jnb	short sc5
 23976                                  
 23977 00003E16 36C706[090E]0000        	mov	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	;Extent intersects SC: invalidate SC.
 23978                                  sc5:	
 23979 00003E1D 58                      	pop     ax
 23980                                  
 23981                                  ;	Free any buffered sectors which are in Extent; they are being over-
 23982                                  ;	written.
 23983                                  
 23984                                  nosc:	
 23985 00003E1E E8F11B                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> first buffer in queue.
 23986                                  
 23987                                  _bufq:	
 23988                                  	;cmpo	al,[di+4]
 23989 00003E21 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 23990 00003E24 7527                    	jne	short bufq5		; -no, jump.
 23991                                  
 23992                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 23993                                  ;       ja	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 23994                                  
 23995                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 23996 00003E26 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 23997 00003E29 7503                    	jne	short bufq04
 23998                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 23999 00003E2B 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 24000                                  bufq04:
 24001 00003E2E 771D                    	ja	short bufq5
 24002                                  
 24003                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 24004                                  ;       jbe	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent end < buffer sector.
 24005                                  
 24006                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 24007 00003E30 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 24008 00003E33 7503                    	jne	short bufq05
 24009                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 24010 00003E35 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 24011                                  bufq05:
 24012 00003E38 7613                    	jbe	short bufq5
 24013                                  
 24014                                  ;	Buffer's sector is in Extent, so free it; it is being over-written.
 24015                                  
 24016                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 24017 00003E3A F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 24018 00003E3E 7403                    	jz	short bufq4		; -no, jump.
 24019 00003E40 E8501E                  	call	DEC_DIRTY_COUNT		; -yes, decrement dirty count.
 24020                                  bufq4:
 24021                                  	;mov	word [di+4],20FFh
 24022 00003E43 C74504FF20              	mov     word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID],((buf_visit<<8)|0FFh)
 24023                                  
 24024 00003E48 E8D91B                  	call	SCANPLACE
 24025 00003E4B EB02                    	jmp     short bufq6
 24026                                  bufq5: 
 24027 00003E4D 8B3D                    	mov     di,[di]
 24028                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next]
 24029                                  bufq6: 
 24030 00003E4F 363B3E[0E0F]            	cmp	di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 24031 00003E54 75CB                    	jne	short _bufq		; --no, go do next buffer.
 24032                                  	
 24033                                  	;RestoreReg <cx,bx>
 24034 00003E56 59                      	pop	cx
 24035 00003E57 5B                      	pop	bx
 24036 00003E58 C3                      	retn
 24037                                  
 24038                                  ;EndProc DskWrtBufPurge
 24039                                  
 24040                                  ;Break   <DIV32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT DIVIDE>
 24041                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24042                                  ;
 24043                                  ; Procedure Name : DIV32
 24044                                  ;
 24045                                  ; Inputs:
 24046                                  ;       DX:AX = 32 bit dividend   BX= divisor
 24047                                  ; Function:
 24048                                  ;       Perform 32 bit division:  DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem.)
 24049                                  ; Outputs:
 24050                                  ;       CX:AX = quotient , DX= remainder
 24051                                  ; Uses:
 24052                                  ;       All registers except AX,CX,DX preserved.
 24053                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24054                                  ;M039: DIV32 optimized for divisor of 512 (common sector size).
 24055                                  
 24056                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24057                                  ; DOSCODE:7C94h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24058                                  
 24059                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24060                                  ; DOSCODE:7C5Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 24061                                  
 24062                                  DIV32:
 24063 00003E59 81FB0002                	cmp	bx,512
 24064 00003E5D 7515                    	jne	short div5
 24065                                  
 24066 00003E5F 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 24067 00003E61 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax           ; CX:AX = Dividend
 24068 00003E63 81E2FF01                	and	dx,(512-1)      ; DX = Remainder
 24069 00003E67 88E0                    	mov	al,ah
 24070 00003E69 88CC                    	mov	ah,cl
 24071 00003E6B 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 24072 00003E6D 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch
 24073 00003E6F D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 24074 00003E71 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 24075 00003E73 C3                      	retn
 24076                                  div5:	
 24077 00003E74 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 24078 00003E76 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 24079 00003E78 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 24080 00003E7A F7F3                    	div	bx              ; 0:AX/BX
 24081 00003E7C 91                      	xchg	cx,ax
 24082 00003E7D F7F3                    	div	bx              ; DX:AX/BX
 24083 00003E7F C3                      	retn
 24084                                  
 24085                                  ;Break   <SHR32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT SHIFT RIGHT>
 24086                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24087                                  ;
 24088                                  ; Procedure Name : SHR32
 24089                                  ;
 24090                                  ; Inputs:
 24091                                  ;	DX:AX = 32 bit sector number
 24092                                  ; Function:
 24093                                  ;       Perform 32 bit shift right
 24094                                  ; Outputs:
 24095                                  ;	AX = cluster number
 24096                                  ;	ZF = 1 if no error
 24097                                  ;	   = 0 if error (cluster number > 64k)
 24098                                  ; Uses:
 24099                                  ;       DX,CX
 24100                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24101                                  ; M017	- SHR32 rewritten for better performance
 24102                                  ; M039	- Additional optimization
 24103                                  
 24104                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24105                                  ; DOSCODE:7CBBh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24106                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24107                                  ; DOSCODE:7C81h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 24108                                  
 24109                                  SHR32:
 24110                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 24111 00003E80 268A4E05                	mov	cl,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 24112 00003E84 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch	    ;ZF=1
 24113 00003E86 E306                    	jcxz	norota
 24114                                  
 24115                                  rotashft2:
 24116 00003E88 D1EA                    	shr	dx,1	    ;ZF reflects state of DX.
 24117 00003E8A D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1	    ;ZF not affected.
 24118 00003E8C E2FA                    	loop	rotashft2
 24119                                  norota:
 24120 00003E8E C3                      	retn
 24121                                  
 24122                                  ;============================================================================
 24123                                  ; DIR.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 24124                                  ;============================================================================
 24125                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24126                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 24127                                  
 24128                                  ;	TITLE	DIR - Directory and path cracking
 24129                                  ;	NAME	Dir
 24130                                  
 24131                                  ;Break	<FINDENTRY -- LOOK FOR AN ENTRY>
 24132                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24133                                  ;
 24134                                  ; Procedure Name : FINDENTRY,SEARCH
 24135                                  ;
 24136                                  ; Inputs:
 24137                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 24138                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 24139                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Starting directory sector number
 24140                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster of directory
 24141                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 24142                                  ;	[NAME1] = Name to look for
 24143                                  ; Function:
 24144                                  ;	Find file name in disk directory.
 24145                                  ;	"?" matches any character.
 24146                                  ; Outputs:
 24147                                  ;	Carry set if name not found
 24148                                  ;	ELSE
 24149                                  ;	Zero set if attributes match (always except when creating)
 24150                                  ;	AH = Device ID (bit 7 set if not disk)
 24151                                  ;	[THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters
 24152                                  ;	DS = DOSGROUP
 24153                                  ;	ES = DOSGROUP
 24154                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer into directory buffer
 24155                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI = Pointer to First Cluster field in directory entry
 24156                                  ;	[CURBUF] has directory record with match
 24157                                  ;	[NAME1] has file name
 24158                                  ;	[LASTENT] is entry number of the entry
 24159                                  ; All other registers destroyed.
 24160                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24161                                  
 24162                                  ;hkn; called from rename.asm and dir2.asm. DS must be already set up at
 24163                                  ;hkn; this point.
 24164                                  
 24165                                  SEARCH:
 24166                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24167                                  	; DOSCODE:7C90h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 24168                                  
 24169                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24170                                  	; DOSCODE:7CCA (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24171                                  
 24172                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24173                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 45B3h 
 24174                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 24175                                  
 24176                                  	;entry	FindEntry
 24177                                  FINDENTRY:
 24178 00003E8F E82E04                  	call	STARTSRCH
 24179 00003E92 A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 24180                                  	;and	al,9Eh
 24181 00003E95 24DE                    	AND	AL,~attr_ignore		; Ignore useless bits
 24182                                  	;cmp	al,8
 24183 00003E97 3C08                    	CMP	AL,attr_volume_id	; Looking for vol ID only ?
 24184 00003E99 7503                    	JNZ	short NOTVOLSRCH	; No
 24185 00003E9B E86D01                  	CALL	SETROOTSRCH		; Yes force search of root
 24186                                  NOTVOLSRCH:
 24187 00003E9E E8FD00                  	CALL	GETENTRY
 24188 00003EA1 7303                    	JNC	short SRCH
 24189 00003EA3 E99100                  	JMP	SETESRET
 24190                                  
 24191                                  	;entry	Srch
 24192                                  SRCH:
 24193 00003EA6 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 24194 00003EA7 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 24195                                  
 24196                                  ;	(DS:BX) = directory entry address
 24197                                  
 24198 00003EAB 8A27                    	mov	ah,[BX]
 24199                                  	;MOV	AH,[BX+dir_entry.dir_name] ; mov ah,[bx+0]
 24200 00003EAD 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; End of directory?
 24201 00003EAF 7436                    	JZ	short FREE
 24202                                  
 24203                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24204 00003EB1 363A26[7F05]            	CMP	AH,[SS:DELALL]		; Free entry?
 24205 00003EB6 742F                    	JZ	short FREE
 24206                                  	;test	byte [bx+0Bh],8
 24207 00003EB8 F6470B08                	TEST	byte [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_volume_id
 24208                                  					; Volume ID file?
 24209 00003EBC 7405                    	JZ	short CHKFNAM 		; NO
 24210                                  
 24211                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24212 00003EBE 36FE06[7B05]            	INC	BYTE [SS:VOLID]
 24213                                  CHKFNAM:
 24214                                  ;	Context ES
 24215 00003EC3 8CD6                    	MOV	SI,SS
 24216 00003EC5 8EC6                    	MOV	ES,SI
 24217 00003EC7 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 24218                                  
 24219                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 24220 00003EC9 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 24221                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 24222                                  
 24223                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 24224                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SS:NAME1],0E5H	; special char check
 24225                                  	;JNZ	short NO_E5
 24226                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:NAME1],05H
 24227                                  	; 22/09/2023
 24228 00003ECC 26803DE5                	cmp	byte [es:di],0E5h
 24229 00003ED0 7504                    	jnz	short NO_E5
 24230 00003ED2 26C60505                	mov	byte [es:di],05h
 24231                                  NO_E5:
 24232                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 24233 00003ED6 E86100                  	CALL	MetaCompare
 24234 00003ED9 7428                    	JZ	short FOUND
 24235 00003EDB 1F                      	POP	DS
 24236                                  
 24237                                  	;entry	NEXTENT
 24238                                  NEXTENT:
 24239 00003EDC C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 24240 00003EE0 E86600                  	CALL	NEXTENTRY
 24241 00003EE3 73C1                    	JNC	short SRCH
 24242 00003EE5 EB50                    	JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 24243                                  
 24244                                  FREE:
 24245 00003EE7 1F                      	POP	DS
 24246 00003EE8 8B0E[4803]              	MOV	CX,[LASTENT]
 24247 00003EEC 3B0E[D805]              	CMP	CX,[ENTFREE]
 24248 00003EF0 7304                    	JAE	short TSTALL
 24249 00003EF2 890E[D805]              	MOV	[ENTFREE],CX
 24250                                  TSTALL:
 24251 00003EF6 3A26[7F05]              	CMP	AH,[DELALL]		; At end of directory?
 24252                                  NEXTENTJ:
 24253 00003EFA 74E0                    	je	short NEXTENT 		; No - continue search
 24254 00003EFC 890E[DA05]              	MOV	[ENTLAST],CX
 24255 00003F00 F9                      	STC
 24256 00003F01 EB34                    	JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 24257                                  
 24258                                  FOUND:
 24259                                  ; We have a file with a matching name. We must now consider the attributes:
 24260                                  ; ATTRIB	Action
 24261                                  ; ------	------
 24262                                  ; Volume_ID	Is Volume_ID in test?
 24263                                  ; Otherwise	If no create then Is ATTRIB+extra superset of test?
 24264                                  ;		If create then Is ATTRIB equal to test?
 24265                                  
 24266 00003F03 8A2C                    	MOV	CH,[SI] 		; Attributes of file
 24267 00003F05 1F                      	POP	DS
 24268 00003F06 8A26[6B05]              	MOV	AH,[ATTRIB]		; Attributes of search
 24269                                  	;and	ah,9Eh
 24270 00003F0A 80E4DE                  	AND	AH,~attr_ignore
 24271                                  	;lea	si,[si+15]
 24272 00003F0D 8D740F                  	LEA	SI,[SI+dir_entry.dir_first-dir_entry.dir_attr]
 24273                                  					; point to first cluster field
 24274                                  	;test	ch,8
 24275 00003F10 F6C508                  	TEST	CH,attr_volume_id	; Volume ID file?
 24276 00003F13 7409                    	JZ	short check_one_volume_id ; Nope check other attributes
 24277                                  	;test	ah,8
 24278 00003F15 F6C408                  	TEST	AH,attr_volume_id	; Can we find Volume ID?
 24279                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Nope, (not even $FCB_CREATE)
 24280                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24281 00003F18 74C2                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 24282                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24283                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 24284 00003F1A 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; Set zero flag for $FCB_CREATE
 24285 00003F1C EB11                    	JMP	SHORT RETFF		; Found Volume ID
 24286                                  check_one_volume_id:
 24287                                  	;CMP	ah,8
 24288 00003F1E 80FC08                  	CMP	AH,attr_volume_id	; Looking only for Volume ID?
 24289                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Yes, continue search
 24290                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24291 00003F21 74B9                    	je	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 24292                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 24293 00003F23 E8AE03                  	CALL	MatchAttributes
 24294 00003F26 7407                    	JZ	SHORT RETFF
 24295 00003F28 F606[7E05]FF            	TEST	BYTE [CREATING],-1	; Pass back mismatch if creating
 24296                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24297                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Otherwise continue searching
 24298 00003F2D 74AD                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 24299                                  RETFF:
 24300 00003F2F C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 24301                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24302                                  	;MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]  ; mov ah,[es:bp+0]
 24303                                  	; 15/12/2022
 24304 00003F33 268A6600                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP]
 24305                                  SETESRET:
 24306 00003F37 16                      	PUSH	SS
 24307 00003F38 07                      	POP	ES
 24308 00003F39 C3                      	retn
 24309                                  
 24310                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24311                                  ;
 24312                                  ; Procedure Name : MetaCompare
 24313                                  ;
 24314                                  ; Inputs:
 24315                                  ;	DS:SI -> 11 character FCB style name NO '?'
 24316                                  ;	    Typically this is a directory entry. It MUST be in upper case
 24317                                  ;	ES:DI -> 11 character FCB style name with possible '?'
 24318                                  ;	    Typically this is a FCB or SFT. It MUST be in upper case
 24319                                  ; Function:
 24320                                  ;	Compare FCB style names allowing for ? match to any char
 24321                                  ; Outputs:
 24322                                  ;	Zero if match else NZ
 24323                                  ; Destroys CX,SI,DI all others preserved
 24324                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24325                                  
 24326                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24327                                  	; DOSCODE:7D3Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 24328                                  
 24329                                  MetaCompare:
 24330 00003F3A B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 24331                                  WILDCRD:
 24332 00003F3D F3A6                    	REPE	CMPSB
 24333 00003F3F 7407                    	JZ	short MetaRet 		; most of the time we will fail.
 24334                                  CHECK_META:
 24335 00003F41 26807DFF3F              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1],"?"
 24336 00003F46 74F5                    	JZ	short WILDCRD
 24337                                  MetaRet:
 24338 00003F48 C3                       	retn				; Zero set, Match
 24339                                  
 24340                                  ;Break	<NEXTENTRY -- STEP THROUGH DIRECTORY>
 24341                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24342                                  ;
 24343                                  ; Procedure Name : NEXTENTRY
 24344                                  ;
 24345                                  ; Inputs:
 24346                                  ;	Same as outputs of GETENTRY, above
 24347                                  ; Function:
 24348                                  ;	Update BX, and [LASTENT] for next directory entry.
 24349                                  ;	Carry set if no more.
 24350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24351                                  
 24352                                  NEXTENTRY:
 24353                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24354                                  	; DOSCODE:7D4Eh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 24355                                  
 24356                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24357                                  	; DOSCODE:7D88h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24358                                  
 24359                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24360                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 4671h 
 24361                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 24362                                  
 24363 00003F49 A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 24364 00003F4C 3B06[DA05]              	CMP	AX,[ENTLAST]
 24365 00003F50 7422                    	JZ	short NONE
 24366 00003F52 40                      	INC	AX
 24367                                  	;ADD	BX,32
 24368 00003F53 8D5F20                  	LEA	BX,[BX+32]
 24369 00003F56 39D3                    	CMP	BX,DX
 24370                                  	; 21/11/2022 - MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS (DOSCODE:7D5Dh)
 24371                                  	;JB	short HAVIT ; MSDOS 6.0 src (dir.asm)
 24372                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24373 00003F58 751C                    	jne	short HAVIT ; MSDOS 6.21 (DOSCODE:7D97h)
 24374 00003F5A 8A1E[7305]              	MOV	BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 24375 00003F5E FEC3                    	INC	BL
 24376 00003F60 3A1E[7705]              	CMP	BL,[CLUSFAC]
 24377 00003F64 7215                    	JB	short SAMECLUS
 24378 00003F66 8B1E[DC05]              	MOV	BX,[NXTCLUSNUM]
 24379 00003F6A E8C716                  	call	IsEOF
 24380 00003F6D 7305                    	JAE	short NONE
 24381                                  	; 23/07/2019
 24382 00003F6F 83FB02                  	CMP	BX,2
 24383                                  	;JB	short NONE
 24384                                  	;JMP	short GETENT
 24385                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24386 00003F72 732D                    	jnb	short GETENT
 24387                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24388                                  	;JB	short NONE
 24389                                  	;JMP	short GETENT
 24390                                  NONE:
 24391 00003F74 F9                      	STC
 24392 00003F75 C3                      	retn
 24393                                  HAVIT:
 24394 00003F76 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 24395 00003F79 F8                      	CLC
 24396                                  nextentry_retn:
 24397 00003F7A C3                      	retn
 24398                                  SAMECLUS:
 24399 00003F7B 881E[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],BL
 24400 00003F7F A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 24401 00003F82 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 24402 00003F83 C53E[E205]              	LDS	DI,[CURBUF]
 24403                                  	; 19/05/2019
 24404                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24405                                  	;;mov	dx,[di+8]
 24406                                  	; 23/09/2023
 24407                                  	;MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]	;AN000; >32mb
 24408                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24409                                  	;MOV	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],DX 		;AN000; >32mb
 24410                                  	; 23/09/2023
 24411 00003F87 8B7508                  	mov	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]	
 24412                                  	
 24413                                  	;mov	dx,[di+6]
 24414 00003F8A 8B5506                  	MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]	;AN000; >32mb
 24415                                  	;inc	dx ; MSDOS 3.3
 24416                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24417                                  	;ADD	DX,1				;AN000; >32mb
 24418                                  	;ADC	word [SS:HIGH_SECTOR],0 	;AN000; >32mb
 24419                                  	; 23/09/2023
 24420 00003F8D 42                      	inc	dx
 24421 00003F8E 7501                    	jnz	short nextexntry_fc
 24422 00003F90 46                      	inc	si
 24423                                  	;inc	word [SS:HIGH_SECTOR]
 24424                                  nextexntry_fc:
 24425                                  	; 23/09/2023
 24426 00003F91 368936[0706]            	mov	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],si
 24427                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 24428 00003F96 1F                      	POP	DS
 24429 00003F97 E844F8                  	call	FIRSTCLUSTER
 24430 00003F9A 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX
 24431 00003F9C EB23                    	JMP	short SETENTRY
 24432                                  
 24433                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24434                                  ;
 24435                                  ; Procedure Name : GETENTRY
 24436                                  ;
 24437                                  ; Inputs:
 24438                                  ;	[LASTENT] has directory entry
 24439                                  ;	ES:BP points to drive parameters
 24440                                  ;	[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[ENTLAST] set for DIR involved
 24441                                  ; Function:
 24442                                  ;	Locates directory entry in preparation for search
 24443                                  ;	GETENT provides entry for passing desired entry in AX
 24444                                  ; Outputs:
 24445                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer to next directory entry in CURBUF
 24446                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:DX = Pointer to first byte after end of CURBUF
 24447                                  ;	[LASTENT] = New directory entry number
 24448                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS] set via DIRREAD
 24449                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 24450                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24451                                  
 24452                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24453                                  GETENTRY:
 24454                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24455 00003F9E A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 24456                                  
 24457                                  	;entry	GETENT
 24458                                  GETENT:
 24459 00003FA1 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 24460                                  ;
 24461                                  ; Convert the entry number in AX into a byte offset from the beginning of the
 24462                                  ; directory.
 24463                                  ;
 24464 00003FA4 B105                    	mov	cl,5			; shift left by 5 = mult by 32
 24465 00003FA6 D3C0                    	rol	ax,cl			; keep hight order bits
 24466 00003FA8 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax
 24467                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24468                                  	;and	ax,0FFE0h
 24469                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24470                                  	;and	ax,~(32-1)		; mask off high order bits
 24471                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24472 00003FAA 24E0                    	and	al,0E0h ; ~31
 24473 00003FAC 83E21F                  	and	dx,1Fh
 24474                                  	;and	dx,32-1			; mask off low order bits
 24475                                  ;
 24476                                  ; DX:AX contain the byte offset of the required directory entry from the
 24477                                  ; beginning of the directory. Convert this to a sector number. Round the
 24478                                  ; sector size down to a multiple of 32.
 24479                                  ;
 24480                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 24481 00003FAF 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 24482 00003FB3 80E3E0                  	and	bl,0E0h
 24483                                  	;AND	BL,255-31		; Must be multiple of 32
 24484 00003FB6 F7F3                    	DIV	BX
 24485 00003FB8 89D3                    	MOV	BX,DX			; Position within sector
 24486 00003FBA 53                      	PUSH	BX
 24487 00003FBB E8CCF7                  	call	DIRREAD
 24488 00003FBE 5B                      	POP	BX
 24489                                  	;retc
 24490 00003FBF 72B9                    	jc	short nextentry_retn	
 24491                                  SETENTRY:
 24492 00003FC1 8B16[E205]              	MOV	DX,[CURBUF]
 24493                                  	;add	dx,16 ; MSDOS 3.3
 24494                                  	;add	dx,20 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 24495 00003FC5 83C218                  	ADD	DX,BUFINSIZ
 24496 00003FC8 01D3                    	ADD	BX,DX
 24497                                  	;add	dx,[es:bp+2]
 24498 00003FCA 26035602                	ADD	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]  ; Always clears carry
 24499                                  	; 29/12/2022
 24500                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS contains a 'CLC' here, at DOSCODE:7E15h
 24501 00003FCE F8                      	clc
 24502 00003FCF C3                      	retn
 24503                                  
 24504                                  ;Break	<SETDIRSRCH SETROOTSRCH -- Set Search environments>
 24505                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24506                                  ;
 24507                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDIRSRCH,SETROOTSRCH
 24508                                  ;
 24509                                  ; Inputs:
 24510                                  ;	BX cluster number of start of directory
 24511                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 24512                                  ;	DI next cluster number from fastopen extended info. DOS 3.3 only
 24513                                  ; Function:
 24514                                  ;	Set up a directory search
 24515                                  ; Outputs:
 24516                                  ;	[DIRSTART] = BX
 24517                                  ;	[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC] set
 24518                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 24519                                  ; destroys AX,DX,BX
 24520                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24521                                  
 24522                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24523                                  SETDIRSRCH:
 24524 00003FD0 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX
 24525 00003FD2 7437                    	JZ	short SETROOTSRCH
 24526 00003FD4 891E[C205]              	MOV	[DIRSTART],BX
 24527                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 24528 00003FD8 268A4604                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 24529 00003FDC FEC0                    	INC	AL
 24530 00003FDE A2[7705]                	MOV	[CLUSFAC],AL
 24531                                  
 24532                                  ; DOS 3.3 for FastOPen	F.C. 6/12/86
 24533                                  	;SAVE	<SI>
 24534 00003FE1 56                      	push	si
 24535                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],2
 24536 00003FE2 F606[8E0D]02            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Success
 24537 00003FE7 7507                    	JNZ	short UNP_OK
 24538                                  
 24539                                  ; DOS 3.3 for FastOPen	F.C. 6/12/86
 24540                                  	;invoke	UNPACK
 24541 00003FE9 E85F16                  	call	UNPACK
 24542 00003FEC 7302                    	JNC	short UNP_OK
 24543                                  	;RESTORE <SI>
 24544 00003FEE 5E                      	pop	si
 24545                                  	;return
 24546 00003FEF C3                      	retn
 24547                                  
 24548                                  UNP_OK:
 24549 00003FF0 893E[BC05]              	MOV	[CLUSNUM],DI
 24550 00003FF4 89DA                    	MOV	DX,BX
 24551 00003FF6 30DB                    	XOR	BL,BL
 24552 00003FF8 881E[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],BL
 24553                                  	;invoke	FIGREC
 24554 00003FFC E8F50E                  	call	FIGREC
 24555                                  	;RESTORE <SI>
 24556 00003FFF 5E                      	pop	si
 24557                                  	
 24558                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24559                                  
 24560                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24561                                  	;PUSH	DX			   ;AN000; >32mb
 24562                                  	;MOV	DX,[HIGH_SECTOR]	   ;AN000; >32mb
 24563                                  	;MOV	[DIRSEC+2],DX		   ;AN000; >32mb
 24564                                  	;POP	DX			   ;AN000; >32mb
 24565                                  
 24566                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24567                                  	;push	dx
 24568                                  	;mov	dx,[HIGH_SECTOR]
 24569                                  	;mov	[DIRSEC+2],dx
 24570                                  	;pop	dx
 24571                                  	;MOV	[DIRSEC],dx
 24572                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24573 00004000 A1[0706]                	mov	ax,[HIGH_SECTOR]
 24574 00004003 A3[C005]                	mov	[DIRSEC+2],AX
 24575 00004006 8916[BE05]              	MOV	[DIRSEC],DX
 24576                                  
 24577                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24578                                  	; cf=0 (at the return of FIGREC)
 24579                                  	;CLC
 24580 0000400A C3                      	retn
 24581                                  
 24582                                  	;entry	SETROOTSRCH
 24583                                  SETROOTSRCH:
 24584 0000400B 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 24585 0000400D A3[C205]                	MOV	[DIRSTART],AX
 24586                                  	; 22/09/2023
 24587 00004010 A3[C005]                	mov	[DIRSEC+2],ax ; 0
 24588 00004013 A2[7305]                	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],AL
 24589 00004016 48                      	DEC	AX
 24590 00004017 A3[BC05]                	MOV	[CLUSNUM],AX
 24591                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+0Bh]
 24592 0000401A 268B460B                	MOV	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.FIRST_SECTOR]
 24593                                  	; 19/05/2019
 24594                                  	;;mov	dx,[es:bp+10h] ; MSDOS 3.3
 24595                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+11h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 24596 0000401E 268B5611                	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]
 24597 00004022 29D0                    	SUB	AX,DX
 24598 00004024 A2[7705]                	MOV	[CLUSFAC],AL
 24599 00004027 8916[BE05]              	MOV	[DIRSEC],DX		      ;F.C. >32mb
 24600                                  	; 22/09/2023
 24601                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24602                                  	;MOV	WORD [DIRSEC+2],0	      ;F.C. >32mb
 24603 0000402B F8                      	CLC
 24604 0000402C C3                      	retn

 24606                                  ;============================================================================
 24607                                  ; DIR2.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 24608                                  ;============================================================================
 24609                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24610                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 24611                                  
 24612                                  ;	TITLE	DIR2 - Directory and path cracking
 24613                                  ;	NAME	Dir2
 24614                                  
 24615                                  ;Break	<GETPATH -- PARSE A WFP>
 24616                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24617                                  ;
 24618                                  ; Procedure Name : GETPATH
 24619                                  ;
 24620                                  ; Inputs:
 24621                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:\" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 24622                                  ;		terminated; d:/ (note forward slash) indicates a real device).
 24623                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 24624                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 24625                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 24626                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 24627                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 24628                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 24629                                  ;	[THISDPB] set to DPB if disk otherwise garbage.
 24630                                  ; Function:
 24631                                  ;	Crack the path
 24632                                  ; Outputs:
 24633                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk if disk file
 24634                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Unk if char device
 24635                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 24636                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 24637                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 24638                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 24639                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 24640                                  ;	   Zero set
 24641                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 24642                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 24643                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 24644                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 24645                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 24646                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 24647                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 24648                                  ;	   Zero reset
 24649                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path or attribute mismatch
 24650                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 24651                                  ;	ELSE
 24652                                  ;	   [CurBuf] = -1 if root directory
 24653                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 24654                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 24655                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points into [CURBUF] to dir_first field for entry
 24656                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 24657                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 24658                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 24659                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 24660                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 24661                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 24662                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 24663                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it.
 24664                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 24665                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 24666                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 24667                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 24668                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 24669                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 24670                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 24671                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 24672                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 24673                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24674                                  
 24675                                  ;hkn; called from delete.asm, finfo.asm, mknode.asm and rename.asm.
 24676                                  ;hkn; DS already set up at this point.
 24677                                  
 24678                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24679                                  GETPATH:
 24680                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E500h
 24681 0000402D C706[7E05]00E5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0 ; Not Creating, not DEL *.*
 24682                                  
 24683                                  ; Same as GetPath only CREATING and DELALL already set
 24684                                  
 24685                                  	;entry	GetPathNoSet
 24686                                  GetPathNoSet:
 24687                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],2	
 24688 00004033 C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 24689 00004038 C706[E205]FFFF          	MOV	word [CURBUF],-1	; initial setting
 24690                                  
 24691                                  ; See if the input indicates a device that has already been detected. If so,
 24692                                  ; go build the guy quickly. Otherwise, let findpath find the device.
 24693                                  
 24694 0000403E 8B3E[B205]              	MOV	DI,[WFP_START]		; point to the beginning of the name
 24695                                  	;cmp	word [DI+1],5C3Ah
 24696                                  	;CMP	WORD [DI+1],'\' << 8 + ':'
 24697 00004042 817D013A5C              	cmp	word [DI+1],':\'
 24698 00004047 7438                    	JZ	short CrackIt
 24699                                  
 24700                                  ; Let ChkDev find it in the device list
 24701                                  
 24702 00004049 83C703                  	ADD	DI,3
 24703                                  	; 18/08/2018
 24704                                  	;MOV	SI,DI			; let CHKDEV see the original name
 24705                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24706                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24707                                  	;mov	si,di ; not required ! (it is written in CHKDEV proc already!)
 24708 0000404C E8AB00                  	CALL	CHKDEV
 24709 0000404F 722E                    	JC	short InternalError
 24710                                  
 24711                                  Build_devJ:
 24712 00004051 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 24713 00004054 A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 24714                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],1
 24715 00004057 C606[2303]01            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; In the particular case of
 24716                                  					; "finding" a char device
 24717                                  					; set LOCUS to Unknown. This makes
 24718                                  					; certain idiotic problems reported
 24719                                  					; by a certain 3 letter OEM go away.
 24720                                  
 24721                                  ; Take name in name1 and pack it back into where wfp_start points. This
 24722                                  ; guarantees wfp_start pointing to a canonical representation of a device.
 24723                                  ; We are allowed to do this as GetPath is *ALWAYS* called before entering a
 24724                                  ; wfp into the share set.
 24725                                  ;
 24726                                  ; We copy chars from name1 to wfp_start remembering the position of the last
 24727                                  ; non-space seen +1.  This position is kept in DX.
 24728                                  
 24729                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 24730 0000405C 16                      	push	ss
 24731 0000405D 07                      	pop	es
 24732                                  
 24733                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 24734 0000405E BE[4B05]                	mov	si,NAME1
 24735 00004061 8B3E[B205]              	mov	di,[WFP_START]
 24736 00004065 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 24737 00004067 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; 8 chars in device name
 24738                                  MoveLoop:
 24739 0000406A AC                      	lodsb
 24740 0000406B AA                      	stosb
 24741 0000406C 3C20                    	cmp	al," "
 24742 0000406E 7402                    	jz	short NoSave
 24743                                  
 24744 00004070 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 24745                                  NoSave:
 24746 00004072 E2F6                    	loop	MoveLoop
 24747                                  
 24748                                  ; DX is the position of the last seen non-space + 1. We terminate the name
 24749                                  ; at this point.
 24750                                  
 24751 00004074 89D7                    	mov	di,dx
 24752 00004076 C60500                  	mov	byte [di],0		; end of string
 24753 00004079 E8C402                  	call	Build_device_ent	; Clears carry sets zero
 24754 0000407C FEC0                    	INC	AL			; reset zero
 24755 0000407E C3                      	retn
 24756                                  
 24757                                  InternalError:
 24758                                  InternalError_loop:
 24759 0000407F EBFE                    	JMP	short InternalError_loop	; freeze
 24760                                  
 24761                                  ; Start off at the correct spot. Optimize if the current dir part is valid.
 24762                                  
 24763                                  CrackIt:
 24764 00004081 8B36[B605]              	MOV	SI,[CURR_DIR_END]	; get current directory pointer
 24765 00004085 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1			; valid?
 24766 00004088 7503                    	JNZ	short LOOK_SING		; Yes, use it.
 24767 0000408A 8D7503                  	LEA	SI,[DI+3]		; skip D:\.
 24768                                  LOOK_SING:
 24769                                  	;mov	byte [ATTRIB],16h
 24770 0000408D C606[6B05]16            	MOV	byte [ATTRIB],attr_directory+attr_system+attr_hidden
 24771                                  					; Attributes to search through Dirs
 24772 00004092 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 24773 00004096 B8FFFF                  	MOV	AX,-1
 24774                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+73]
 24775 00004099 268B5D49                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+curdir.ID]
 24776 0000409D 8B36[B605]              	MOV	SI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 24777                                  
 24778                                  ; AX = -1
 24779                                  ; BX = cluster number of current directory. THis number is -1 if the media
 24780                                  ;      has been uncertainly changed.
 24781                                  ; SI = offset in DOSGroup into path to end of current directory text. This
 24782                                  ;      may be -1 if no current directory part has been used.
 24783                                  
 24784 000040A1 39C6                    	CMP	SI,AX			; if Current directory is not part
 24785 000040A3 743B                    	JZ	short NO_CURR_D		; then we must crack from root
 24786 000040A5 39C3                    	CMP	BX,AX			; is the current directory cluster valid
 24787                                  
 24788                                  ; DOS 3.3  6/25/86
 24789 000040A7 7437                    	JZ	short NO_CURR_D		; no, crack form the root
 24790                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],1
 24791 000040A9 F606[8E0D]01            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],FastOpen_Set ; for fastopen ?
 24792 000040AE 743D                    	JZ	short GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER	; no
 24793 000040B0 06                      	PUSH	ES			; save registers
 24794 000040B1 57                      	PUSH	DI
 24795 000040B2 51                      	PUSH	CX
 24796 000040B3 FF74FF                  	PUSH	word [SI-1]		; save \ and 1st char of next element
 24797 000040B6 56                      	PUSH	SI
 24798 000040B7 53                      	PUSH	BX
 24799                                  
 24800 000040B8 C644FF00                	MOV	BYTE [SI-1],0		; call fastopen to look up cur dir info
 24801 000040BC 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 24802                                  
 24803                                  ;hkn; FastOpenTable, Dir_Info_Buff & FastOpen_Ext_Info are in DOSDATA
 24804 000040C0 BB[840D]                	MOV	BX,FastOpenTable
 24805 000040C3 BF[9A0D]                	MOV	DI,Dir_Info_Buff
 24806 000040C6 B9[8F0D]                	MOV	CX,FastOpen_Ext_Info
 24807                                  	;mov	al,1
 24808 000040C9 B001                    	MOV	AL,FONC_Look_up
 24809 000040CB 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 24810 000040CC 07                      	POP	ES
 24811                                  	;call	far [BX+2]
 24812 000040CD FF5F02                  	CALL	far [BX+fastopen_entry.name_caching]
 24813 000040D0 7203                    	JC	short GO_Chk_end1 	;fastopen not installed, or wrong drive.
 24814                                  					; Go to Got_Srch_cluster
 24815                                  	; 29/12/2022
 24816                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SI],0		;fastopen has current dir info?
 24817                                  	;JE	short GO_Chk_end	;yes. Go to got_search_cluster
 24818                                  	;stc
 24819                                  	;jmp	short GO_Chk_end	;Go to No_Curr_D
 24820                                  
 24821 000040D2 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1
 24822                                  GO_Chk_end1:	; 29/12/2022
 24823 000040D5 F5                      	cmc 
 24824                                  	; [si] = 0 -> cf = 0
 24825                                  	; [si] > 0 -> cf = 1
 24826                                  
 24827                                  ;GO_Chk_end1:
 24828                                  	; 29/12/2022
 24829                                  	;clc
 24830                                  
 24831                                  GO_Chk_end:				; restore registers
 24832 000040D6 5B                      	POP	BX
 24833 000040D7 5E                      	POP	SI
 24834 000040D8 8F44FF                  	POP	word [SI-1]
 24835 000040DB 59                      	POP	CX
 24836 000040DC 5F                      	POP	DI
 24837 000040DD 07                      	POP	ES
 24838 000040DE 730D                    	JNC	short GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER ; crack based on cur dir
 24839                                  
 24840                                  ; DOS 3.3  6/25/86
 24841                                  ;
 24842                                  ; We must cract the path beginning at the root. Advance pointer to beginning
 24843                                  ; of path and go crack from root.
 24844                                  
 24845                                  NO_CURR_D:
 24846 000040E0 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 24847 000040E4 8D7403                  	LEA	SI,[SI+3]		; Skip "d:/"
 24848 000040E7 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Get ES:BP
 24849 000040EB EB3B                    	JMP	short ROOTPATH
 24850                                  
 24851                                  ; We are able to crack from the current directory part. Go set up for search
 24852                                  ; of specified cluster.
 24853                                  
 24854                                  GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER:
 24855 000040ED C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Get ES:BP
 24856 000040F1 E8DCFE                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 24857                                  	;JC	short SETFERR
 24858                                  	;JMP	short FINDPATH
 24859                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24860 000040F4 7342                    	jnc	short FINDPATH ; 17/08/2018
 24861                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24862                                  	;JC	short SETFERR
 24863                                  	;JMP	short FINDPATH
 24864                                  SETFERR:
 24865 000040F6 30C9                    	XOR	CL,CL			; set zero
 24866 000040F8 F9                      	STC
 24867 000040F9 C3                      	retn
 24868                                  
 24869                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24870                                  ;
 24871                                  ; Procedure Name : ChkDev
 24872                                  ;
 24873                                  ; Check to see if the name at DS:DI is a device. Returns carry set if not a
 24874                                  ;   device.
 24875                                  ; Blasts CX,SI,DI,AX,BX
 24876                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24877                                  
 24878                                  CHKDEV:
 24879 000040FA 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 24880 000040FC 8CD7                    	MOV	DI,SS
 24881 000040FE 8EC7                    	MOV	ES,DI
 24882                                  
 24883 00004100 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 24884 00004103 B90900                  	MOV	CX,9
 24885                                  TESTLOOP:
 24886 00004106 E84910                  	call	GETLET
 24887                                  
 24888 00004109 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'
 24889 0000410B 740E                    	JZ	short TESTDEVICE
 24890 0000410D E89810                  	call	PATHCHRCMP
 24891 00004110 7407                    	JZ	short NOTDEV
 24892 00004112 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24893 00004114 7405                    	JZ	short TESTDEVICE
 24894                                  
 24895 00004116 AA                      	STOSB
 24896 00004117 E2ED                    	LOOP	TESTLOOP
 24897                                  NOTDEV:
 24898 00004119 F9                      	STC
 24899 0000411A C3                      	retn
 24900                                  
 24901                                  TESTDEVICE:
 24902                                  	;ADD	CX,2
 24903                                  	; 24/09/2023
 24904 0000411B 41                      	inc	cx
 24905 0000411C 41                      	inc	cx
 24906 0000411D B020                    	MOV	AL,' '
 24907 0000411F F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 24908 00004121 8CD0                    	MOV	AX,SS
 24909 00004123 8ED8                    	MOV	DS,AX
 24910                                  	;call	DEVNAME
 24911                                  	;retn
 24912                                  	; 18/12/2022
 24913 00004125 E9B901                  	jmp	DEVNAME
 24914                                  
 24915                                  ;Break	<ROOTPATH, FINDPATH -- PARSE A PATH>
 24916                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24917                                  ;
 24918                                  ; Procedure Name : ROOTPATH,FINDPATH
 24919                                  ;
 24920                                  ; Inputs:
 24921                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but,
 24922                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path which is assumed to start at
 24923                                  ;		the root (no leading '/').
 24924                                  ; Function:
 24925                                  ;	Search from root for path
 24926                                  ; Outputs:
 24927                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but:
 24928                                  ;	If root directory specified, [CURBUF] and [NAME1] are NOT set, and
 24929                                  ;	[NoSetDir] is ignored.
 24930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24931                                  
 24932                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24933                                  	; DOSCODE:7F47h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24934                                  
 24935                                  ROOTPATH:
 24936 00004128 E8E0FE                  	call	SETROOTSRCH
 24937                                  	; 24/09/2023
 24938 0000412B 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah
 24939                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SI],0
 24940 0000412D 3824                    	cmp	[si],ah ; 0
 24941 0000412F 7507                    	JNZ	short FINDPATH
 24942                                  
 24943                                  ; Root dir specified
 24944 00004131 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 24945 00004134 A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 24946                                  	; 24/09/2023
 24947                                  	;XOR	AH,AH			; Sets "device ID" byte, sets zero
 24948                                  					; (dir), clears carry.
 24949 00004137 C3                      	retn
 24950                                  
 24951                                  ; Inputs:
 24952                                  ;	[ATTRIB] Set to get through directories
 24953                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Set to find last element
 24954                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 24955                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path (no leading '/').
 24956                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 24957                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Phys sec # of first sector of directory
 24958                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Cluster # of next cluster
 24959                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors per cluster
 24960                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 24961                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 24962                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 24963                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 24964                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 24965                                  ;	[CREATING] and [DELALL] set
 24966                                  ; Function:
 24967                                  ;	Parse path name
 24968                                  ; Outputs:
 24969                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 24970                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 24971                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 24972                                  ;	[THISDPB] = ES:BP
 24973                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 24974                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 24975                                  ;	   Zero set
 24976                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 24977                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 24978                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 24979                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 24980                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 24981                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 24982                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 24983                                  ;	   Zero reset
 24984                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path
 24985                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 24986                                  ;	ELSE
 24987                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 24988                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 24989                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to fcb_FIRCLUS field for entry
 24990                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 24991                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 24992                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 24993                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 24994                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 24995                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 24996                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 24997                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it,
 24998                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 24999                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 25000                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 25001                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 25002                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 25003                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 25004                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 25005                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 25006                                  ; Destroys all other registers
 25007                                  
 25008                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25009                                  	; DOSCODE:7F58h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25010                                  
 25011                                      	;entry	FINDPATH
 25012                                  FINDPATH:
 25013 00004138 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 25014 00004139 56                      	PUSH	SI
 25015 0000413A 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 25016 0000413C 8B0E[C205]              	MOV	CX,[DIRSTART]		; Get start clus of dir being searched
 25017 00004140 833E[B605]FF            	CMP	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1
 25018 00004145 740E                    	JZ	short NOIDS		; No current dir part
 25019 00004147 3B3E[B605]              	CMP	DI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 25020 0000414B 7508                    	JNZ	short NOIDS		; Not to current dir end yet
 25021 0000414D C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 25022                                  	;mov	[es:di+73],cx
 25023 00004151 26894D49                	MOV	[ES:DI+curdir.ID],CX	; Set current directory currency
 25024                                  NOIDS:
 25025                                  
 25026                                  ; Parse the name off of DS:SI into NAME1. AL = 1 if there was a meta
 25027                                  ; character in the string. CX,DI may be destroyed.
 25028                                  ;
 25029                                  ;	invoke	NAMETRANS
 25030                                  ;	MOV	CL,AL
 25031                                  ;
 25032                                  ; The above is the slow method. The name has *already* been munged by
 25033                                  ; TransPath so no special casing needs to be done. All we do is try to copy
 25034                                  ; the name until ., \ or 0 is hit.
 25035                                  
 25036 00004155 8CD0                    	MOV	AX,SS
 25037 00004157 8EC0                    	MOV	ES,AX
 25038                                  
 25039                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 25040 00004159 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 25041 0000415C B82020                  	MOV	AX,'  ' ; 2020h
 25042 0000415F AA                      	STOSB
 25043 00004160 AB                      	STOSW
 25044 00004161 AB                      	STOSW
 25045 00004162 AB                      	STOSW
 25046 00004163 AB                      	STOSW
 25047 00004164 AB                      	STOSW
 25048                                  
 25049                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 25050 00004165 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 25051 00004168 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; bits for CL
 25052                                  GetNam:
 25053                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25054                                  	;INC	CL ; ?*! ; MSDOS 6.0	;AN000; KK increment volid count
 25055                                  
 25056                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25057                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25058                                  	;inc	cl ; not required !	
 25059                                  	
 25060 0000416A AC                      	LODSB
 25061 0000416B 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'	; 2Eh
 25062 0000416D 7412                    	JZ	short _SetExt
 25063 0000416F 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 25064 00004171 7424                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 25065 00004173 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'	; 5Ch
 25066 00004175 7420                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 25067 00004177 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'	; 3Fh
 25068 00004179 7503                    	JNZ	short StoNam
 25069 0000417B 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 25070                                  StoNam:

 25073                                  _SetExt:

 25075                                  GetExt:

 25082 0000418F 7503                    	JNZ	short StoExt
 25083 00004191 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 25084                                  StoExt:

 25086 00004195 EBED                    	JMP	short GetExt
 25087                                  _GetDone:
