 25089 00004198 88E1                    	MOV	CL,AH  ; 0 or 1 ; 29/12/2022
 25090 0000419A 80C980                  	OR	CL,80H
 25091 0000419D 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of this element
 25092 0000419E 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 25093 0000419F 39FE                    	CMP	SI,DI
 25094 000041A1 7503                    	JNZ	short check_device
 25095 000041A3 E9E200                  	JMP	_BADPATH		; NUL parse (two delims most likely)
 25096                                  check_device:
 25097 000041A6 56                      	PUSH	SI			; Start of next element
 25098                                  	;MOV	AL,[SI]
 25099                                  	;OR	AL,AL
 25100                                  	; 23/09/2023
 25101 000041A7 803C00                  	cmp	byte [si],0
 25102 000041AA 7508                    	JNZ	short NOT_LAST
 25103                                  
 25104                                  ; for last element of the path switch to the correct search attributes
 25105                                  
 25106 000041AC 8A3E[6D05]              	MOV	BH,[SATTRIB]
 25107 000041B0 883E[6B05]              	MOV	[ATTRIB],BH
 25108                                  
 25109                                  NOT_LAST:
 25110                                  
 25111                                  ; check name1 to see if we have a device...
 25112                                  
 25113 000041B4 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 25114                                  
 25115                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 25116                                  	;context ES
 25117 000041B5 16                      	push	ss
 25118 000041B6 07                      	pop	es

 25162

 25169

 25171                                  	;context DS

 25337                                  ;Break	<STARTSRCH -- INITIATE DIRECTORY SEARCH>
 25338                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25339                                  ;
 25340                                  ; Procedure Name : STARTSRCH
 25341                                  ;
 25342                                  ; Inputs:
 25343                                  ;	[THISDPB] Set
 25344                                  ; Function:
 25345                                  ;	Set up a search for GETENTRY and NEXTENTRY
 25346                                  ; Outputs:
 25347                                  ;	ES:BP = Drive parameters
 25348                                  ;	Sets up LASTENT, ENTFREE=ENTLAST=-1, VOLID=0
 25349                                  ; Destroys ES,BP,AX
 25350                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25351                                  
 25352                                  STARTSRCH:
 25353 000042C0 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 25354 000042C4 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 25355 000042C6 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 25356 000042C9 A2[7B05]                	MOV	[VOLID],AL		; No volume ID found
 25357 000042CC 48                      	DEC	AX
 25358 000042CD A3[D805]                	MOV	[ENTFREE],AX
 25359 000042D0 A3[DA05]                	MOV	[ENTLAST],AX
 25360 000042D3 C3                      	retn
 25361                                  
 25362                                  ;BREAK <MatchAttributes - the final check for attribute matching>
 25363                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25364                                  ; Procedure Name : MatchAttributes
 25365                                  ;
 25366                                  ; Input:    [Attrib] = attribute to search for
 25367                                  ;	    CH = found attribute
 25368                                  ; Output:   JZ <match>
 25369                                  ;	    JNZ <nomatch>
 25370                                  ; Registers modified: noneski
 25371                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25372                                  
 25373                                  MatchAttributes:
 25374 000042D4 50                      	PUSH	AX
 25375                                  
 25376                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25377 000042D5 36A0[6B05]              	MOV	AL,[ss:ATTRIB]		; AL <- SearchSet
 25378 000042D9 F6D0                    	NOT	AL			; AL <- SearchSet'
 25379 000042DB 20E8                    	AND	AL,CH			; AL <- SearchSet' and FoundSet
 25380                                  	;and	al,16h
 25381 000042DD 2416                    	AND	AL,attr_all	; AL <- SearchSet' and FoundSet and Important
 25382                                  ;
 25383                                  ; the result is non-zero if an attribute is not in the search set
 25384                                  ; and in the found set and in the important set. This means that we do not
 25385                                  ; have a match. Do a JNZ <nomatch> or JZ <match>
 25386                                  ;
 25387 000042DF 58                      	POP	AX
 25388 000042E0 C3                      	retn

 25390                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25391                                  ; DOSCODE:8148h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25392                                  
 25393                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25394                                  ; DOSCODE:810Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25395                                  
 25396                                  ;Break <DevName - Look for name of device>
 25397                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25398                                  ;
 25399                                  ; Procedure Name : DevName
 25400                                  ;
 25401                                  ; Inputs:
 25402                                  ;	DS,ES:DOSDATA
 25403                                  ;	Filename in NAME1
 25404                                  ;	ATTRIB set so that we can error out if looking for Volume IDs
 25405                                  ; Function:
 25406                                  ;	Determine if file is in list of I/O drivers
 25407                                  ; Outputs:
 25408                                  ;	Carry set if not a device
 25409                                  ;	ELSE
 25410                                  ;	Zero flag set
 25411                                  ;	BH = Bit 7,6 = 1, bit 5 = 0 (cooked mode)
 25412                                  ;	     bits 0-4 set from low byte of attribute word
 25413                                  ;	DEVPT = DWORD pointer to Device header of device
 25414                                  ; BX destroyed, others preserved
 25415                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25416                                  
 25417                                  DEVNAME:
 25418                                  	; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 25419                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 49FBh
 25420                                  
 25421 000042E1 56                      	PUSH	SI
 25422 000042E2 57                      	PUSH	DI

 25424 000042E4 50                      	PUSH	AX
 25425                                  
 25426                                  ; E5 special code

 25428 000042E9 803E[4B05]05            	CMP	byte [NAME1],5
 25429 000042EE 7505                    	JNZ	short NOKTR
 25430 000042F0 C606[4B05]E5            	MOV	byte [NAME1],0E5h
 25431                                  NOKTR:
 25432                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],8

 25434                                  					; If looking for VOL id don't find devs
 25435 000042FA 7521                    	JNZ	short RET31
 25436                                  
 25437                                  ;hkn; NULDEV is in DOSDATA
 25438 000042FC BE[4800]                	MOV	SI,NULDEV
 25439                                  LOOKIO:
 25440                                  	; 21/11/2022
 25441                                  	;test	byte [SI+SYSDEV.ATT+1],80h
 25442                                  	; 17/12/2022
 25443                                  	;test	byte [si+5],80h
 25444 000042FF F6440580                	test	byte [SI+SYSDEV.ATT+1],(DEVTYP>>8)
 25445                                  	;;test	word [si+4],8000h
 25446                                  	;TEST	word [SI+SYSDEV.ATT],DEVTYP
 25447 00004303 7411                    	JZ	short SKIPDEV 		; Skip block devices (NET and LOCAL)
 25448 00004305 89F0                    	MOV	AX,SI
 25449                                  	;add	si,10
 25450 00004307 83C60A                  	ADD	SI,SYSDEV.NAME
 25451                                  
 25452                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 25453 0000430A BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 25454 0000430D B90400                  	MOV	CX,4			; All devices are 8 letters

 25462                                  RET31:	
 25463 0000431D F9                      	STC				; Not found
 25464                                  RETNV:

 25467

 25469 00004326 58                      	POP	AX
 25470 00004327 59                      	POP	CX

 25472 00004329 5E                      	POP	SI

 25486                                  ;BREAK <Build_device_ent - Make a Directory entry>
 25487                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25488                                  ; Procedure Name : Build_device_ent
 25489                                  ;
 25490                                  ; Inputs:
 25491                                  ;	[NAME1] has name
 25492                                  ;	BH is attribute field (supplied by DEVNAME)
 25493                                  ;	[DEVPT] points to device header (supplied by DEVNAME)
 25494                                  ; Function:
 25495                                  ;	Build a directory entry for a device at DEVFCB
 25496                                  ; Outputs:
 25497                                  ;	BX points to DEVFCB
 25498                                  ;	SI points to dir_first field
 25499                                  ;	AH = input BH
 25500                                  ;	AL = 0
 25501                                  ;	dir_first = DEVPT
 25502                                  ;	Zero Set, Carry Clear
 25503                                  ; DS,ES,BP preserved, others destroyed
 25504                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25505                                  
 25506                                  Build_device_ent:
 25507 00004340 B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 25508                                  
 25509                                  ;hkn; DEVFCB is in DOSDATA
 25510 00004343 BF[5305]                	MOV	DI,DEVFCB+8		; Point to extent field
 25511                                  
 25512                                  ;	Fill dir_ext  BUGBUG - use ERRNZs for this stuff!
 25513                                  
 25514 00004346 AB                      	STOSW
 25515 00004347 AA                      	STOSB				; Blank out extent field

 25517 00004348 B040                    	MOV	AL,attr_device
 25518                                  
 25519                                  ;	Fill Dir_attr
 25520

 25522 0000434B 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 25523 0000434D B90A00                  	MOV	CX,10
 25524                                  
 25525                                  ; Fill dir_pad
 25526                                  
 25527 00004350 F3AB                    	REP	STOSW			; Fill rest with zeros
 25528 00004352 E817C8                  	call	DATE16
 25529                                  
 25530                                  ;hkn; DEVFCB is in DOSDATA
 25531 00004355 BF[6105]                	MOV	DI,DEVFCB+dir_entry.dir_time ; 09/08/2018
 25532 00004358 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 25533                                  
 25534                                  ; Fill dir_time
 25535                                  
 25536 00004359 AB                      	STOSW
 25537 0000435A 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 25538                                  
 25539                                  ; Fill dir_date
 25540                                  
 25541 0000435B AB                      	STOSW
 25542 0000435C 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI			; SI points to dir_first field
 25543 0000435E A1[9A05]                	MOV	AX,[DEVPT]
 25544                                  
 25545                                  ; Fill dir_first
 25546

 25548 00004362 A1[9C05]                	MOV	AX,[DEVPT+2]
 25549                                  ;
 25550                                  ; Fill dir_size_l
 25551                                  ;

 25553 00004366 88FC                    	MOV	AH,BH			; Put device atts in AH
 25554

 25558 0000436D C3                      	retn

 25560                                  ;Break	<ValidateCDS - given a CDS, validate the media and the current directory>
 25561                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25562                                  ;
 25563                                  ;   ValidateCDS - Get current CDS. Splice it. Call FatReadCDS to check
 25564                                  ;   media. If media has been changed, do DOS_Chdir to validate path.
 25565                                  ;   If invalid, reset original CDS to root.
 25566                                  ;

 25574                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 25575                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25576                                  
 25577                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 25579

 25581                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 25584                                     %define  Temp	[bp-2]	; word

 25587                                     %define  SaveCDSH	[bp-4]	; word

 25600                                  	;EnterCrit critDisk
 25601 00004382 E879D0                  	call	ECritDisk

 25622                                  
 25623                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 25624                                  	;Context DS
 25625 0000439D 16                      	push	ss
 25626 0000439E 1F                      	pop	ds	
 25627                                  	;Invoke	Splice
 25628 0000439F E88B2B                  	call	Splice
 25629                                  
 25630                                   ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 25631                                  	;Context DS			;   FatReadCDS (ThisCDS);

 25640                                  	;RESTORE <BP>
 25641 000043B0 5D                      	pop	bp
 25642 000043B1 726D                    	JC	short FatFail
 25643                                  
 25644 000043B3 C536[A205]              	LDS	SI,[THISCDS]		;   if (ThisCDS->ID == -1) {
 25645                                  	;cmp	word [si+73],-1
 25646 000043B7 837C49FF                	CMP	word [SI+curdir.ID],-1
 25647 000043BB 7555                    	JNZ	short RestoreCDS
 25648

 25650                                  	;Context ES

 25724                                  ; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 25725                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - offset 43BDh
 25726                                  
 25727                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 25728                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25729                                  ;
 25730                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 25731                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 25732                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 25733                                  ;
 25734                                  ;	[path]device
 25735                                  ;
 25736                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 25737                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 25738                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 25739                                  ;
 25740                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 25741                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 25742                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 25743                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 25744                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 25745                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 25746                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 25747                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25748                                  
 25749                                  CheckThisDevice:
 25750 0000442A 57                      	push	di
 25751 0000442B 56                      	push	si
 25752 0000442C 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 25753                                  
 25754                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 25755                                  
 25756 0000442E 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 25757 00004430 E8750D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 25758 00004433 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 25759 00004435 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 25760                                  
 25761                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 25762                                  
 25763 00004436 AD                      	LODSW
 25764 00004437 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 25765 0000443A 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 25766                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 25767 0000443D 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 25768 0000443F AC                      	LODSB
 25769 00004440 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 25770 00004442 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 25771 00004444 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 25772 00004446 AC                      	LODSB
 25773 00004447 E85E0D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 25774 0000444A 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 25775                                  
 25776                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 25777                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 25778                                  
 25779                                  ParseDev:
 25780 0000444C 1E                      	push	ds
 25781 0000444D 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 25782 0000444E E8950C                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 25783 00004451 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 25784 00004454 F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 25785 00004455 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 25786                                  
 25787                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 25788 00004457 16                      	push	ss
 25789 00004458 1F                      	pop	ds
 25790                                  
 25791                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 25792                                  ;
 25793                                  ; SR;
 25794                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 25795                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 25796                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 25797                                  
 25798 00004459 A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 25799 0000445C A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 25800                                  
 25801                                  ; M026 - end
 25802                                  
 25803 0000445F E87FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 25804                                  
 25805                                  SkipSearch:
 25806 00004462 5E                      	pop	si
 25807 00004463 1F                      	pop	ds
 25808                                  
 25809                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 25810                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 25811                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 25812                                  
 25813                                  CheckReturn:
 25814 00004464 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 25815 00004465 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 25816 00004467 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 25817                                  Check_Done:
 25818 00004469 5F                      	pop	di
 25819 0000446A F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 25820 0000446B C3                      	retn
 25821                                  NotDevice:
 25822 0000446C F9                      	STC
 25823 0000446D EBF5                    	JMP	short CheckReturn
 25824                                  
 25825                                  ;BREAK <LookupPath - call fastopen to get dir entry info>
 25826                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25827                                  ;
 25828                                  ; Procedure Name : LookupPath
 25829                                  ;
 25830                                  ; Output  DS:SI -> path name,
 25831                                  ;	  ES:DI -> dir entry info buffer
 25832                                  ;	  ES:CX -> extended dir info buffer
 25833                                  ;
 25834                                  ;	  carry flag clear : tables pointed by ES:DI and ES:CX are filled by
 25835                                  ;			     FastOpen, DS:SI points to char just one after
 25836                                  ;			     the last char of path name which is fully or
 25837                                  ;			     partially found in FastOPen
 25838                                  ;	  carry flag set : FastOpen not in memory or path name not found
 25839                                  ;
 25840                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25841                                  
 25842                                  LookupPath:
 25843                                  ;	PUSH	AX
 25844

 26084                                  CmdTab:
 26085 0000459D 8604                    	DB	86h, DEVRD	; 0 input

 26103                                  
 26104                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26105                                  ; DOSCODE:8413h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26106                                  
 26107                                  ;Break	<IOFUNC -- DO FUNCTION 1-12 I/O>
 26108                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26109                                  ;
 26110                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 26111                                  ;
 26112                                  ; Inputs:
 26113                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 26114                                  ;	AH is function code
 26115                                  ;		= 0 Input
 26116                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 26117                                  ;		= 2 Output
 26118                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 26119                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 26120                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 26121                                  ;				   present.
 26122                                  ;	AL = character if output
 26123                                  ; Function:
 26124                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 26125                                  ; Outputs:
 26126                                  ;	AL is character if input
 26127                                  ;	If a status call
 26128                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 26129                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 26130                                  ; For regular files:
 26131                                  ;	Input Status
 26132                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 26133                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 26134                                  ;	Input
 26135                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 26136                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 26137                                  ;	Output Status
 26138                                  ;		Always ready
 26139                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved
 26140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26141                                  
 26142                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26143                                  ; DOSCODE:83D8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26144

 26400                                  	; Main entry for device open and close. AL contains the function 
 26401                                  	; requested. Subtlety: if Sharing is NOT loaded then we do NOT issue 
 26402                                  	; open/close to block devices. This allows networks to function but 
 26403                                  	; does NOT hang up with bogus change-line code.

 26422                                  	; sharing then just short circuit to done.
 26423

 26613                                  ;Break	<SETREAD, SETWRITE -- SET UP HEADER BLOCK>
 26614                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26615                                  ;
 26616                                  ; Procedure Name : SETREAD, SETWRITE
 26617                                  ;
 26618                                  ; Inputs:
 26619                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer Address
 26620                                  ;	CX = Record Count
 26621                                  ;	DX = Starting Record
 26622                                  ;	AH = Media Byte
 26623                                  ;	AL = Unit Code
 26624                                  ; Function:
 26625                                  ;	Set up the device call header at DEVCALL
 26626                                  ; Output:
 26627                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 26628                                  ; No other registers effected
 26629                                  ;
 26630                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26631                                  
 26632                                  SETREAD:
 26633 000047F4 57                      	PUSH	DI
 26634 000047F5 51                      	PUSH	CX
 26635 000047F6 50                      	PUSH	AX
 26636 000047F7 B104                    	MOV	CL,DEVRD ; mov cl,4
 26637                                  SETCALLHEAD:

 26639 000047FB 16                      	PUSH	SS
 26640 000047FC 07                      	POP	ES
 26641                                  					; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA
 26642 000047FD BF[5A03]                	MOV	DI,DEVCALL
 26643                                  
 26644 00004800 AA                      	STOSB				; length
 26645 00004801 58                      	POP	AX			; 
 26646 00004802 AA                      	STOSB				; Unit
 26647 00004803 50                      	PUSH	AX

 26649 00004806 AA                      	STOSB				; Command code
 26650 00004807 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX

 26652 0000480A 83C708                  	ADD	DI,8			; Skip link fields
 26653 0000480D 58                      	POP	AX
 26654 0000480E 86E0                    	XCHG	AH,AL

 26656 00004811 86C4                    	XCHG	AL,AH

 26660

 26662 00004819 AB                      	STOSW				; Transfer addr
 26663

 26665 0000481B 58                      	POP	AX			; Real CX
 26666 0000481C AB                      	STOSW				; Count
 26667

 26699                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26700                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26701                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26702                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26703                                  
 26704                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 26705                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26706                                  ;
 26707                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 26708                                  ;
 26709                                  ; Inputs:
 26710                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 26711                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 26712                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 26713                                  ; Function:
 26714                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 26715                                  ; Output:
 26716                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 26717                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 26718                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 26719                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 26720                                  ;
 26721                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26722                                  
 26723                                  RW_SC:
 26724                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 26725                                  	
 26726 00004833 36833E[7700]00          	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 26727 00004839 7421                    	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 26728 0000483B 36833E[6C03]01          	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)

 26801                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 26802                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26803                                  ;
 26804                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 26805                                  ;
 26806                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 26807                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 26808                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 26809                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 26810                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 26811                                  ; Function:
 26812                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 26813                                  ; Output:
 26814                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 26815                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 26816                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 26817                                  ;
 26818                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26819                                  
 26820                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26821                                  IN_SC:
 26822                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 26823 000048EF 36A0[030E]              	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 26824 000048F3 363A06[040E]            	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 26825 000048F8 751B                    	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 26826 000048FA 36A1[0706]              	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 26827 000048FE 89D1                    	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 26828 00004900 362B0E[050E]            	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 26829 00004905 361B06[070E]            	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 26830                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26831                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 26832 0000490A 7509                    	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 26833 0000490C 363B0E[7700]            	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 26834 00004911 7302                    	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 26835 00004913 F8                      	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 26836                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 26837                                  	; 16/12/2022
 26838 00004914 C3                      	retn	; 30/04/2019
 26839                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26840                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 26841                                  
 26842                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 26843 00004915 F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 26844                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 26845 00004916 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.

 26847                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 26848                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26849                                  ;
 26850                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 26851                                  ;
 26852                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 26853                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 26854                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 26855                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 26856                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 26857                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 26858                                  ;
 26859                                  ; Function:
 26860                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 26861                                  ; Output:
 26862                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 26863                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26864                                  
 26865                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 26866                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 26867                                  
 26868 00004917 E8D5FF                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 26869 0000491A 720C                    	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 26870 0000491C B80100                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 26871 0000491F D3E0                    	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 26872 00004921 F7D0                    	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 26873 00004923 362106[090E]            	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 26874                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 26875 00004928 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.

 26878                                  ; 22/11/2022
 26879                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)

 26881                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 26882                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26883                                  ;
 26884                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 26885                                  ;
 26886                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 26887                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 26888                                  ; Function:
 26889                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 26890                                  ; Output:
 26891                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 26892                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 26893                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 26894                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 26895                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 26896                                  ;     
 26897                                  ;		       0 if failed

 26920 0000495B 51                      	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.

 26945                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 26946                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26947                                  ;
 26948                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 26949                                  ;
 26950                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 26951                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 26952                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 26953                                  ; Function:
 26954                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 26955                                  ; Output:
 26956                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 26957                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 26958                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26959                                  
 26960                                  SC2BUF:
 26961                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 26962 00004981 E86BFF                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 26963                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 26964                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26965 00004984 723D                    	jc	short sexit
 26966 00004986 B80100                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 26967 00004989 D3E0                    	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 26968 0000498B 368506[090E]            	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 26969 00004990 7430                    	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 26970                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 26971                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 26972                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 26973                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 26974                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26975 00004992 36A1[010E]              	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 26976 00004996 91                      	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 26977 00004997 F7E1                    	mul	cx
 26978 00004999 360306[7300]            	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 26979 0000499E 361316[7500]            	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 26980 000049A3 8EDA                    	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 26981 000049A5 89C6                    	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 26982 000049A7 368E06[6A03]            	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 26983 000049AC 368B3E[6803]            	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 26984                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26985                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 26986 000049B1 D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 26987                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 26988                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;

 26990 000049B9 7403                    	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 26991 000049BB D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 26992 000049BD 66                      	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move

 26995 000049C0 F8                      	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 26996 000049C1 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 26997                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 26998 000049C2 F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 26999                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
