 27008                                  ;	TITLE	MKNODE - Node maker
 27009                                  ;	NAME	MKNODE
 27010                                  
 27011                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 27012                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27013                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 27014                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 27015                                  ;
 27016                                  ;	BUILDDIR
 27017                                  ;	SETDOTENT
 27018                                  ;	MakeNode
 27019                                  ;	NEWENTRY
 27020                                  ;	FREEENT
 27021                                  ;	NEWDIR
 27022                                  ;	DOOPEN
 27023                                  ;	RENAME_MAKE
 27024                                  ;	CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 27025                                  ;
 27026                                  ;	Revision history:
 27027                                  ;
 27028                                  ;	 AN000	version 4.0  Jan. 1988
 27029                                  ;	 A004	PTM 3680  --- Make SFT NAME field offset same as 3.30
 27030                                  
 27031                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 27032                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27033                                  ;
 27034                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 27035                                  ;
 27036                                  ; Inputs:
 27037                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 27038                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 27039                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 27040                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 27041                                  ;               entries
 27042                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 27043                                  ; Function:
 27044                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 27045                                  ; Outputs:
 27046                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 27047                                  ;       ELSE
 27048                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 27049                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 27050                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 27051                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 27052                                  ;
 27053                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27054                                  
 27055                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27056                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27057                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27058                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27059                                  
 27060                                  ; 24/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS)
 27061                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.22, MSDOS.SYS)
 27062                                  
 27063                                  BUILDDIR:
 27064                                  	; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27065                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 4E66h
 27066                                  
 27067 000049C4 A1[D805]                        MOV     AX,[ENTFREE]
 27068 000049C7 83F8FF                          CMP     AX,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 27069                                  	;JZ	short CHECK_IF_ROOT
 27070                                          ;CLC
 27071                                          ;retn
 27072                                  	; 24/09/2023
 27073 000049CA 7507                    	jne	short builddir_cmc_retn  ; cf=1 (will be 0)
 27074                                  
 27075                                  CHECK_IF_ROOT:
 27076 000049CC 833E[C205]00                    CMP     word [DIRSTART],0
 27077 000049D1 7502                            JNZ	short NEWDIR
 27078                                          ;STC
 27079                                  	; 24/09/2023
 27080                                  	; [DIRSTART]=0, cf=0, zf=1 (cf will be 1 after cmc instruction)
 27081                                  builddir_cmc_retn:
 27082                                  	; 24/09/2023
 27083 000049D3 F5                      	cmc	; cf=1 <-> cf=0
 27084                                  builddir_retn:
 27085 000049D4 C3                              retn				; Can't grow root
 27086                                  
 27087                                  	;entry   NEWDIR
 27088                                  NEWDIR: 
 27089 000049D5 8B1E[C205]              	MOV     BX,[DIRSTART]
 27090 000049D9 09DB                            OR      BX,BX
 27091 000049DB 7405                            JZ	short NULLDIR
 27092 000049DD E82806                  	call	GETEOF
 27093 000049E0 72F2                            jc	short builddir_retn	; Screw up
 27094                                  NULLDIR:
 27095 000049E2 B90100                          MOV     CX,1
 27096 000049E5 E83905                  	call	ALLOCATE
 27097 000049E8 72EA                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 27098 000049EA 8B16[C205]                      MOV     DX,[DIRSTART]
 27099 000049EE 09D2                            OR      DX,DX
 27100 000049F0 750D                            JNZ	short ADDINGDIR
 27101 000049F2 E8DBF5                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 27102 000049F5 72DD                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 27103 000049F7 C706[4803]FFFF                  MOV     word [LASTENT],-1
 27104 000049FD EB29                            JMP     SHORT GOTDIRREC
 27105                                  ADDINGDIR:
 27106 000049FF 53                              PUSH    BX
 27107 00004A00 8B1E[BC05]                      MOV     BX,[CLUSNUM]
 27108 00004A04 E82D0C                          call	IsEOF
 27109 00004A07 5B                              POP     BX
 27110 00004A08 7217                            JB	short NOTFIRSTGROW
 27111                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 27112 00004A0A 891E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],BX
 27113                                  	; 24/09/2023
 27114                                  	;PUSH	CX ; (not necessary)
 27115 00004A0E 50                      	PUSH	AX
 27116 00004A0F 55                      	PUSH	BP
 27117 00004A10 B401                            MOV     AH,1			; CLUSNUM update
 27118                                  	; 15/12/2022
 27119 00004A12 268A5600                	mov	dl,[ES:BP] ; 09/09/2018
 27120                                          ; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27121                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]
 27122                                  	;MOV	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; drive #
 27123 00004A16 8B0E[C205]                      MOV     CX,[DIRSTART]		; first cluster #
 27124 00004A1A 89DD                            MOV     BP,BX 			; CLUSNUM
 27125 00004A1C E8E8DD                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 27126 00004A1F 5D                              POP     BP
 27127 00004A20 58                              POP     AX
 27128                                  	; 24/09/2023
 27129                                          ;POP	CX
 27130                                  
 27131                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 27132                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:
 27133 00004A21 89DA                            MOV     DX,BX
 27134 00004A23 30DB                            XOR     BL,BL
 27135 00004A25 E8CC04                  	call	FIGREC
 27136                                  GOTDIRREC:
 27137                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+4]
 27138 00004A28 268A4E04                        MOV     CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 27139 00004A2C FEC1                            INC     CL
 27140 00004A2E 30ED                            XOR     CH,CH
 27141                                  ZERODIR:
 27142 00004A30 51                              PUSH    CX
 27143                                  	; 22/09/2023
 27144                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 27145                                          ;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY ; *
 27146 00004A31 B0FF                            MOV     AL,0FFH
 27147                                          ;call	GETBUFFR
 27148 00004A33 E85010                          call	GETBUFFRD ; *
 27149 00004A36 7302                    	JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 27150 00004A38 59                              POP     CX
 27151 00004A39 C3                              retn
 27152                                  
 27153                                  GET_SSIZE:
 27154                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 27155 00004A3A 268B4E02                        MOV     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 27156 00004A3E 06                              PUSH    ES
 27157 00004A3F C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 27158                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 27159 00004A43 26804D0504                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 27160 00004A48 57                              PUSH    DI
 27161                                  	;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3
 27162                                  	;add	di,20	; MSDOS 6.0	
 27163 00004A49 83C718                          ADD     DI,BUFINSIZ
 27164 00004A4C 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 27165 00004A4E D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 27166 00004A50 F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 27167 00004A52 7301                            JNC	short EVENZ
 27168 00004A54 AA                              STOSB
 27169                                  EVENZ:
 27170 00004A55 5F                              POP     DI
 27171                                  
 27172                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27173 00004A56 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 27174                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 27175 00004A5B 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty7		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 27176 00004A5D E82D12                          call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 27177                                          
 27178                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 27179 00004A60 26804D0540              	OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 27180                                  yesdirty7:
 27181 00004A65 07                              POP	ES
 27182 00004A66 59                              POP	CX
 27183                                  
 27184                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27185                                  
 27186                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 27187                                  	;INC	DX
 27188                                  
 27189                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27190                                  	; 24/09/2023
 27191                                  	;add	dx,1
 27192                                  	;;adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 27193                                  	;; 24/09/2023
 27194                                  	;; ax=0
 27195                                  	;adc	[HIGH_SECTOR],ax ; 0
 27196                                  	; 24/09/2023
 27197 00004A67 42                      	inc	dx
 27198 00004A68 7504                    	jnz	short loop_zerodir
 27199 00004A6A FF06[0706]              	inc	word [HIGH_SECTOR]
 27200                                  loop_zerodir:
 27201 00004A6E E2C0                            LOOP    ZERODIR
 27202                                  
 27203 00004A70 A1[4803]                        MOV     AX,[LASTENT]
 27204 00004A73 40                              INC     AX
 27205                                  	; 24/09/2023
 27206                                  	; cf=0
 27207                                  	;CLC
 27208 00004A74 C3                              retn
 27209                                  
 27210                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27211                                  ;
 27212                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 27213                                  ;
 27214                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 27215                                  ;
 27216                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 27217                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 27218                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 27219                                  ;
 27220                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27221                                  
 27222                                  SETDOTENT:
 27223                                  ;	Fill in name field
 27224 00004A75 AB                              STOSW
 27225 00004A76 B90400                          MOV     CX,4
 27226 00004A79 B82020                          MOV     AX,"  " ; 2020h
 27227 00004A7C F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 27228 00004A7E AA                              STOSB
 27229                                  
 27230                                  ;	Set up attribute
 27231                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 27232 00004A7F B010                            MOV     AL,attr_directory
 27233 00004A81 AA                              STOSB
 27234                                  
 27235                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 27236 00004A82 83C70A                          ADD     DI,10
 27237 00004A85 8B36[9E05]                      MOV     SI,[THISSFT]
 27238                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 27239 00004A89 8B440D                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 27240 00004A8C AB                              STOSW
 27241                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 27242 00004A8D 8B440F                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 27243 00004A90 AB                      	STOSW
 27244                                  
 27245                                  ;	Set up first cluster field
 27246 00004A91 89D0                            MOV     AX,DX
 27247 00004A93 AB                              STOSW
 27248                                  
 27249                                  ;	0 file size
 27250 00004A94 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 27251 00004A96 AB                              STOSW
 27252 00004A97 AB                              STOSW
 27253 00004A98 C3                              retn
 27254                                  
 27255                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 27256                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27257                                  ;
 27258                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 27259                                  ;
 27260                                  ; Inputs:
 27261                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 27262                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 27263                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 27264                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 27265                                  ;
 27266                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 27267                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 27268                                  ;
 27269                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 27270                                  ;               terminated)
 27271                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 27272                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 27273                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 27274                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 27275                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 27276                                  ; Function:
 27277                                  ;       Make a new node
 27278                                  ; Outputs:
 27279                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 27280                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 27281                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 27282                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 27283                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 27284                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 27285                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 27286                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 27287                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 27288                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 27289                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 27290                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 27291                                  ;       ELSE
 27292                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 27293                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 27294                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 27295                                  ;               containing new node.
 27296                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 27297                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 27298                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 27299                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 27300                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 27301                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 27302                                  ;
 27303                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27304                                  
 27305                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27306                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27307                                  
 27308                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27309                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27310                                  
 27311                                  MakeNode:
 27312                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 27313 00004A99 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 27314 00004A9F 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save AH value
 27315 00004AA0 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 27316 00004AA5 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 27317 00004AA8 E888F5                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 27318 00004AAB 88CA                            MOV     DL,CL           ; Save CL info
 27319 00004AAD 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; Device ID to CH
 27320 00004AAF 58                              POP     AX              ; Get back AH
 27321 00004AB0 732E                            JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 27322 00004AB2 7505                            JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 27323 00004AB4 80FA80                          CMP     DL,80h          ; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 27324 00004AB7 7406                            JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 27325                                  make_err_4:
 27326 00004AB9 B004                            MOV     AL,4            ; case 1 bad path
 27327                                  make_err_ret:
 27328 00004ABB 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 27329 00004ABD F9                              STC
 27330                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 27331 00004ABE C3                              retn
 27332                                  
 27333                                          ;entry	RENAME_MAKE     ; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 27334                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 27335                                  make_type:
 27336                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 27337                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27338                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 27339 00004ABF F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 27340 00004AC4 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 27341 00004AC6 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 27342                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 27343                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 27344 00004ACB F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 27345 00004AD0 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 27346 00004AD2 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 27347 00004AD3 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 27348                                  	; 22/11/2022
 27349                                  make_retn:
 27350                                  	;return
 27351 00004AD6 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 27352                                  
 27353                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 27354                                  
 27355                                  make_type2:
 27356 00004AD7 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 27357 00004ADB 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX           ; nothing exists Disk Node
 27358 00004ADD F9                              STC                     ; Not found
 27359 00004ADE EB5A                            JMP     short make_new
 27360                                  
 27361                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 27362                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 27363                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 27364                                  ;   else => file
 27365                                  
 27366                                  make_exists:
 27367 00004AE0 7448                            JZ	short make_exists_dir
 27368 00004AE2 B003                            MOV     AL,3            ; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 27369                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 27370 00004AE4 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 27371 00004AE9 753B                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 27372                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 27373                                                                  ;       if making DIR or Volume ID
 27374 00004AEB 08ED                            OR      CH,CH
 27375 00004AED 781A                            JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 27376 00004AEF 08E4                            OR      AH,AH
 27377 00004AF1 75C8                            JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 27378 00004AF3 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save device ID
 27379 00004AF4 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 27380                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 27381 00004AF8 268A6F0B                        MOV     CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 27382                                  	;test	ch,1
 27383 00004AFC F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 27384 00004AFF 7524                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 27385 00004B01 E8D0F7                  	call	MatchAttributes
 27386 00004B04 59                              POP     CX              ; Devid back in CH
 27387 00004B05 751F                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 27388 00004B07 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL           ; AL = 0, Disk Node
 27389                                  make_share:
 27390 00004B09 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 27391 00004B0B 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save Disk or Device node
 27392 00004B0C 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save Device ID
 27393 00004B0D 88EC                            MOV     AH,CH           ; Device ID to AH
 27394 00004B0F E84501                          CALL    DOOPEN          ; Fill in SFT for share check
 27395 00004B12 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 27396 00004B16 56                      	push	si
 27397 00004B17 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 27398 00004B18 E89529                  	call	ShareEnter
 27399 00004B1B 735A                            jnc	short MakeEndShare
 27400                                  
 27401                                  ; User failed request.
 27402 00004B1D 5B                      	pop	bx
 27403 00004B1E 5E                      	pop	si
 27404 00004B1F 59                      	pop	cx
 27405 00004B20 58                      	pop	ax
 27406                                  
 27407                                  Make_Share_ret:
 27408 00004B21 B006                            MOV     AL,6
 27409 00004B23 EB96                            JMP	short make_err_ret
 27410                                  
 27411                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 27412 00004B25 59                              POP     CX              ; Get back device ID
 27413                                  make_err_ret_5:
 27414 00004B26 B005                            MOV     AL,5            ; Attribute mismatch
 27415                                          ; 22/11/2022
 27416 00004B28 EB91                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 27417                                  
 27418                                  make_exists_dir:
 27419 00004B2A B001                            MOV     AL,1            ; exists as directory, always an error
 27420                                  	; 22/11/2022
 27421 00004B2C EB8D                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 27422                                  
 27423                                  make_save:
 27424 00004B2E 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save whether Disk or File
 27425 00004B2F 89C8                            MOV     AX,CX           ; Device ID to AH
 27426 00004B31 E87400                          CALL    NEWENTRY
 27427 00004B34 58                              POP     AX              ; 0 if Disk, 3 if File
 27428 00004B35 739F                            jnc	short make_retn
 27429 00004B37 B002                            MOV     AL,2            ; create failed case 2
 27430                                  make_save_retn:
 27431 00004B39 C3                              retn
 27432                                  
 27433                                  make_new:
 27434 00004B3A E8F1FF                          call    make_save
 27435 00004B3D 72FA                            jc	short make_save_retn	; case 2 fail
 27436                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h
 27437 00004B3F F606[6B05]10            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_directory
 27438 00004B44 75F3                            jnz	short make_save_retn	; Don't "open" directories,
 27439                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them
 27440 00004B46 50                      	push	ax
 27441 00004B47 53                      	push	bx
 27442 00004B48 56                      	push	si		
 27443 00004B49 E86429                          call	ShareEnter
 27444 00004B4C 5E                      	pop	si
 27445 00004B4D 5B                      	pop	bx
 27446 00004B4E 58                      	pop	ax
 27447 00004B4F 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 27448                                  
 27449                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 27450                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 27451                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 27452                                  
 27453 00004B51 50                              PUSH    AX
 27454 00004B52 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 27455                                  	;mov	byte [es:bx],0E5h
 27456 00004B56 26C607E5                	MOV	BYTE [ES:BX],DIRFREE	; nuke newly created entry.
 27457                                  	
 27458                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27459                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 27460 00004B5A 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 27461                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 27462 00004B5F 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty8		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 27463                                  	; 22/11/2022
 27464 00004B61 E82911                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 27465                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 27466 00004B64 26804D0540                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 27467                                  yesdirty8:
 27468 00004B69 C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 27469                                  	; 15/12/2022
 27470 00004B6D 268A4600                        mov	al,[ES:BP]
 27471                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27472                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 27473                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 27474 00004B71 E81410                          call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 27475 00004B74 58                              POP     AX
 27476 00004B75 EBAA                            jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 27477                                  
 27478                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 27479                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 27480                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 27481                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 27482                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 27483                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 27484                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 27485                                  ;
 27486                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 27487                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 27488                                  
 27489                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27490                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27491                                  
 27492                                  MakeEndShare:
 27493 00004B77 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 27494 00004B7B 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 27495 00004B7D E87EC8                  	call	ECritSFT
 27496 00004B80 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 27497                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 27498 00004B83 50                      	push	ax
 27499 00004B84 57                      	push	di
 27500 00004B85 06                      	push	es
 27501 00004B86 9C                              PUSHF
 27502 00004B87 E82129                          call	ShareEnd                ; remove sharing
 27503 00004B8A 9D                              POPF
 27504 00004B8B 07                      	pop	es
 27505 00004B8C 5F                      	pop	di
 27506 00004B8D 268F05                          pop	word [ES:DI]	
 27507                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 27508 00004B90 E886C8                  	call	LCritSFT
 27509                                  	; 22/11/2022
 27510                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27511 00004B93 5B                      	pop	bx
 27512 00004B94 5E                      	pop	si
 27513 00004B95 59                      	pop	cx
 27514 00004B96 58                      	pop	ax
 27515 00004B97 E894FF                          CALL    make_save
 27516                                  
 27517                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 27518                                  
 27519 00004B9A 729D                            jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 27520 00004B9C 50                      	push	ax
 27521 00004B9D 53                      	push	bx
 27522 00004B9E 56                      	push	si
 27523 00004B9F 9C                              PUSHF
 27524 00004BA0 E80D29                          call	ShareEnter
 27525 00004BA3 9D                              POPF
 27526 00004BA4 5E                      	pop	si
 27527 00004BA5 5B                      	pop	bx
 27528 00004BA6 58                      	pop	ax
 27529                                  
 27530                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 27531                                  
 27532                                  makeendshare_retn:
 27533 00004BA7 C3                              retn
 27534                                  
 27535                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27536                                  ;
 27537                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 27538                                  ;
 27539                                  ; Inputs:
 27540                                  ;       [THISSFT] set
 27541                                  ;       [THISDPB] set
 27542                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 27543                                  ;               entries
 27544                                  ;       [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 27545                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 27546                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 27547                                  ;       CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 27548                                  ;               NC means file existed (device)
 27549                                  ;               C  means file did not exist
 27550                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 27551                                  ;       If FILE
 27552                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 27553                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 27554                                  ;       If device
 27555                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 27556                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 27557                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 27558                                  ; Function:
 27559                                  ;       Make a new directory entry
 27560                                  ;       If an old one existed it is truncated first
 27561                                  ; Outputs:
 27562                                  ;       Carry set if error
 27563                                  ;               Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 27564                                  ;               vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 27565                                  ;       else
 27566                                  ;               outputs of DOOPEN
 27567                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 27568                                  ;
 27569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27570                                  
 27571                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27572                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27573                                  
 27574                                  NEWENTRY:
 27575 00004BA8 C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 27576 00004BAC 7315                            JNC	short EXISTENT	
 27577 00004BAE 803E[4A03]00                    CMP     byte [FAILERR],0
 27578                                  	;STC
 27579                                          ;jnz	short makeendshare_retn	; User FAILed, node might exist
 27580                                          ; 24/09/2023
 27581 00004BB3 750C                    	jnz	short ERRRET3
 27582 00004BB5 E80CFE                  	CALL    BUILDDIR        ; Try to build dir
 27583 00004BB8 72ED                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed

 27701                                  ; DOSCODE:8AA9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27702                                  
 27703                                  ; DOOPEN
 27704                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27705                                  ;
 27706                                  ; Inputs:
 27707                                  ;       [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 27708                                  ;       [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 27709                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 27710                                  ;       If FILE
 27711                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 27712                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 27713                                  ;       If device
 27714                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 27715                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 27716                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 27717                                  ; Function:
 27718                                  ;       Fill in SFT from dir entry
 27719                                  ; Outputs:
 27720                                  ;       CARRY CLEAR
 27721                                  ;       sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 27722                                  ;       sf_flags high byte = 0
 27723                                  ;       sf_flags low byte = AH except
 27724                                  ;       sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 27725                                  ;       sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 27726                                  ;       sf_position = 0
 27727                                  ;       If device
 27728                                  ;           sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 27729                                  ;           sf_size = 0
 27730                                  ;       If file
 27731                                  ;           sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 27732                                  ;           sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 27733                                  ;           sf_cluspos = 0
 27734                                  ;           sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 27735                                  ;           sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 27736                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 27737                                  ;
 27738                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27739

 27935                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27936                                  ;
 27937                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 27938                                  ;
 27939                                  ; Inputs:
 27940                                  ;       ES:BP -> DPB
 27941                                  ;       [CURBUF] Set
 27942                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 27943                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 27944                                  ; Function:
 27945                                  ;       Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 27946                                  ; Outputs:
 27947                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 27948                                  ;       (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 27949                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 27950                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27951                                  
 27952                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27953                                  FREEENT:
 27954 00004CF6 1E                              PUSH    DS
 27955 00004CF7 C53E[E205]                      LDS     DI,[CURBUF]
 27956 00004CFB 8B0C                            MOV     CX,[SI]         ; Get pointer to clusters
 27957                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27958                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27959 00004CFD 8B5508                  	MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]  ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27960                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27961 00004D00 368916[0706]                    MOV	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],DX		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27962 00004D05 8B5506                          MOV     DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27963 00004D08 1F                              POP     DS
 27964 00004D09 83F902                  	CMP	CX,2
 27965 00004D0C 722E                            JB	short RET1	; Was 0 length file (or mucked Firclus if CX=1)
 27966                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 27967 00004D0E 263B4E0D                        CMP     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 27968 00004D12 7728                            JA	short RET1	; Treat like zero length file (firclus mucked)
 27969 00004D14 29FB                            SUB     BX,DI
 27970 00004D16 53                              PUSH    BX              ; Save offset
 27971 00004D17 FF36[0706]              	PUSH	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27972 00004D1B 52                              PUSH    DX              ; Save sector number
 27973 00004D1C 89CB                            MOV     BX,CX
 27974 00004D1E E8AC02                          call	RELEASE         ; Free any data allocated
 27975 00004D21 5A                              POP     DX
 27976 00004D22 8F06[0706]                      POP	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27977 00004D26 7302                            JNC	short GET_BUF_BACK
 27978 00004D28 5B                              POP     BX
 27979                                  freeent_retn:
 27980 00004D29 C3                              retn			; Screw up
 27981                                  
 27982                                  GET_BUF_BACK:
 27983                                  	; 22/09/2023
 27984                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 27985                                          ;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL ; *
 27986                                          ;XOR	AL,AL ; *
 27987                                  	;call	GETBUFFR        ; Get sector back
 27988 00004D2A E8570D                  	call	GETBUFFER ; * ; pre read      
 27989                                  
 27990 00004D2D 5B                      	POP     BX              ; Get offset back
 27991 00004D2E 72F9                            jc	short freeent_retn
 27992 00004D30 E8B0EA                  	call	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 27993 00004D33 031E[E205]                      ADD     BX,[CURBUF]	; Correct it for new buffer
 27994 00004D37 89DE                            MOV     SI,BX
 27995                                  	;add	si,1Ah
 27996 00004D39 83C61A                          ADD     SI,dir_entry.dir_first	; Get corrected SI
 27997                                  RET1:
 27998 00004D3C F8                              CLC
 27999 00004D3D C3                              retn
 28000                                  
 28001                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28002                                  ;
 28003                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 28004                                  ;
 28005                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 28006                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 28007                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 28008                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 28009                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 28010                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 28011                                  ;
 28012                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28013                                  
 28014                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 28015 00004D3E 50                      	PUSH    AX
 28016 00004D3F 9F                              lahf                    ; preserve flags
 28017 00004D40 803E[A20A]00                    CMP     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 28018 00004D45 7410                            JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 28019 00004D47 C606[A20A]00                    mov     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0	; reset flag
 28020 00004D4C 06                      	push	es
 28021 00004D4D 57                      	push	di
 28022 00004D4E C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 28023 00004D52 E8ADF9                          call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 28024 00004D55 5F                      	pop	di
 28025 00004D56 07                      	pop	es
 28026                                  
 28027                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 28028 00004D57 9E                              sahf                    ; restore flags
 28029 00004D58 58                              POP     AX
 28030 00004D59 C3                              retn
 28031

 28041                                  ;**	Misc Low level routines for doing simple FCB computations, Cache
 28042                                  ;       reads and writes, I/O optimization, and FAT allocation/deallocation
 28043                                  ;
 28044                                  ;	SKPCLP
