 28063                                  ;Break   <FNDCLUS -- Skip over allocation units>
 28064                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28065                                  ;
 28066                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 28067                                  ;
 28068                                  ; Inputs:
 28069                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters to skip
 28070                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 28071                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT
 28072                                  ; Outputs:
 28073                                  ;       BX = Last cluster skipped to
 28074                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters remaining (0 unless EOF)
 28075                                  ;       DX = Position of last cluster
 28076                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28077                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 28078                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28079                                  
 28080                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28081                                  ; DOSCODE:8BF2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 28082                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28083                                  ; DOSCODE:8BB7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28084                                  
 28085                                  FNDCLUS:
 28086 00004D5A 06                      	PUSH	ES
 28087 00004D5B C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; setup addressability to SFT
 28088                                  	;;mov	bx,[es:di+1Bh] ; MSDOS 3.3
 28089                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+35h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 28090 00004D5F 268B5D35                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_lstclus]
 28091                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+19h]
 28092 00004D63 268B5519                        MOV     DX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_cluspos]
 28093 00004D67 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX
 28094 00004D69 7424                    	JZ	short NOCLUS
 28095                                  
 28096 00004D6B 29D1                            SUB     CX,DX
 28097 00004D6D 7308                            JNB	short FINDIT
 28098                                  
 28099 00004D6F 01D1                            ADD     CX,DX
 28100 00004D71 31D2                            XOR     DX,DX
 28101                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+0Bh]
 28102 00004D73 268B5D0B                        MOV     BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_firclus]
 28103                                  FINDIT:
 28104 00004D77 07                              POP	ES
 28105 00004D78 E313                    	JCXZ	RET9
 28106                                  
 28107                                  	;entry	SKPCLP
 28108                                  SKPCLP:
 28109 00004D7A E8CE08                  	call	UNPACK
 28110 00004D7D 7214                            jc	short fndclus_retn	; retc
 28111                                  
 28112                                  	; 09/09/2018
 28113                                  
 28114                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 28115                                  	;push	bx
 28116                                  	;mov	bx,di
 28117                                  	;call	IsEOF
 28118                                  	;pop	bx	
 28119                                  	;jae	short RET9
 28120                                  
 28121                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28122                                  
 28123                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28124 00004D7F 87DF                    	xchg	bx,di
 28125 00004D81 E8B008                  	call	IsEOF
 28126 00004D84 87DF                    	xchg	bx,di
 28127 00004D86 7305                    	jae	short RET9
 28128                                  
 28129 00004D88 87DF                            XCHG    BX,DI
 28130 00004D8A 42                              INC     DX
 28131                                  
 28132 00004D8B E2ED                    	LOOP	SKPCLP			; RMFS
 28133                                  RET9:	
 28134 00004D8D F8                      	CLC
 28135 00004D8E C3                              retn
 28136                                  NOCLUS:
 28137 00004D8F 07                              POP	ES
 28138 00004D90 41                              INC	CX
 28139 00004D91 4A                              DEC	DX
 28140 00004D92 F8                              CLC
 28141                                  
 28142                                  fndclus_retn:
 28143 00004D93 C3                              retn
 28144                                  
 28145                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 28146                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28147                                  ;
 28148                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 28149                                  ;
 28150                                  ; Inputs:
 28151                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 28152                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 28153                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 28154                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 28155                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 28156                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 28157                                  ; Function:
 28158                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 28159                                  ;       read if necessary.
 28160                                  ; Outputs:
 28161                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 28162                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 28163                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 28164                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 28165                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 28166                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 28167                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28168                                  
 28169                                  BUFSEC:
 28170 00004D94 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 28171 00004D98 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 28172                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 28173 00004D9C C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 28174 00004DA1 E85001                          CALL    FIGREC
 28175 00004DA4 E8E40C                  	call	GETBUFFR
 28176 00004DA7 72EA                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 28177                                  
 28178 00004DA9 C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 28179 00004DAE 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 28180 00004DB2 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 28181 00004DB4 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 28182 00004DB8 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 28183 00004DBA 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 28184 00004DBE C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 28185                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 28186 00004DC2 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 28187                                  	;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 28188                                  	;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 28189 00004DC7 8D7D18                          LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 28190 00004DCA 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 28191 00004DCE F8                              CLC
 28192 00004DCF C3                              retn
 28193                                  
 28194                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 28195                                  
 28196                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28197                                  ;
 28198                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 28199                                  ;
 28200                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 28201                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 28202                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28203                                  ;
 28204                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 28205                                  ;
 28206                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28207                                  
 28208                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28209                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28210                                  BUFRD:
 28211 00004DD0 06                              PUSH	ES
 28212 00004DD1 31C0                            xor	ax, ax			; pre-read sector
 28213 00004DD3 E8BEFF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 28214 00004DD6 7303                            JNC	short BUF_OK
 28215                                  
 28216                                  BUF_IO_FAIL:				; this label used by BUFWRT also
 28217 00004DD8 07                              POP	ES
 28218 00004DD9 EB2B                            JMP     SHORT RBUFPLACED
 28219                                  
 28220                                  BUF_OK:
 28221 00004DDB 8CC3                            MOV     BX,ES
 28222 00004DDD 8E06[2E03]                      MOV     ES,[DMAADD+2]
 28223 00004DE1 8EDB                            MOV     DS,BX
 28224 00004DE3 87FE                    	XCHG    DI,SI
 28225 00004DE5 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 28226                                  ;M039
 28227                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 28228                                  	;JNC	short EVENRD
 28229                                  	;MOVSB
 28230                                  ;EVENRD:
 28231                                  	;REP     MOVSW
 28232                                  
 28233                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 28234                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Buffer.
 28235                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 28236                                  
 28237                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28238 00004DE7 F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Buffer to Transfer memory.
 28239                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 28240                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 28241                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28242 00004DE9 7301                    	jnc	short EVENRD ; **** 20/05/2019
 28243 00004DEB A4                      	movsb ; ****
 28244                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28245                                  	;adc	cx,0
 28246                                  	;rep	movsb
 28247                                  ;M039
 28248                                  EVENRD: ; ****
 28249 00004DEC 07                              POP	ES
 28250                                  ;hkn; SS override
 28251 00004DED 36C53E[E205]                    LDS     DI,[SS:CURBUF]
 28252                                  	;;lea	bx,[di+16]
 28253                                  	;lea	bx,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 28254 00004DF2 8D5D18                  	LEA     BX,[DI+BUFINSIZ]
 28255 00004DF5 29DE                            SUB     SI,BX                   ; Position in buffer
 28256 00004DF7 E8310C                          call	PLACEBUF
 28257                                  	;cmp	si,[es:bp+2]
 28258 00004DFA 263B7602                	CMP	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Read Last byte?
 28259 00004DFE 7205                            JB	short RBUFPLACEDC	; No, leave buf where it is
 28260                                  ;M039
 28261                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 28262                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 28263                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 28264                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 28265 00004E00 36893E[6D00]            	MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],DI	; Make it prime candidate for
 28266                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 28267                                  
 28268                                  RBUFPLACEDC:
 28269 00004E05 F8                              CLC
 28270                                  RBUFPLACED:
 28271 00004E06 16                      	push	ss
 28272 00004E07 1F                      	pop	ds
 28273 00004E08 C3                              retn
 28274                                  
 28275                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28276                                  ;
 28277                                  ; Procedure : BUFWRT
 28278                                  ;
 28279                                  ; Do a partial sector write via one of the system buffers
 28280                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 28281                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28282                                  ;
 28283                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 28284                                  ;
 28285                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28286                                  
 28287                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28288                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28289                                  BUFWRT:
 28290                                          ;MOV     AX,[SECPOS]
 28291                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 28292                                  	;ADD	AX,1            	; Set for next sector
 28293                                          ;MOV	[SECPOS],AX 		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 28294                                          ;ADC	word [SECPOS+2],0	;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 28295                                          ; 24/09/2023
 28296 00004E09 FF06[C405]              	inc	word [SECPOS]
 28297 00004E0D 7504                    	jnz	short bufw_secpos
 28298 00004E0F FF06[C605]              	inc	word [SECPOS+2]
 28299                                  bufw_secpos:
 28300 00004E13 A1[C605]                	MOV	AX,[SECPOS+2]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 28301 00004E16 3B06[CA05]                      CMP	AX,[VALSEC+2]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 28302 00004E1A B001                            MOV	AL,1			;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 28303 00004E1C 770F                            JA	short NOREAD		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 28304 00004E1E 720B                            JB	short _doread		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 28305 00004E20 A1[C405]                        MOV	AX,[SECPOS]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 28306                                  
 28307                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 28308                                  	;INC	AX
 28309                                  	;MOV	[SECPOS],AX ; 09/09/2018
 28310                                  
 28311                                  	; 20/05/2019
 28312                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 28313 00004E23 3B06[C805]                      CMP     AX,[VALSEC]		; Has sector been written before?
 28314 00004E27 B001                            MOV     AL,1
 28315 00004E29 7702                            JA	short NOREAD		; Skip preread if SECPOS>VALSEC
 28316                                  _doread:
 28317 00004E2B 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL
 28318                                  NOREAD:
 28319 00004E2D 06                              PUSH	ES
 28320 00004E2E E863FF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 28321 00004E31 72A5                    	JC	short BUF_IO_FAIL
 28322 00004E33 8E1E[2E03]                      MOV     DS,[DMAADD+2]
 28323 00004E37 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 28324                                  ;M039
 28325                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 28326                                  	;JNC	short EVENWRT ; 09/09/2018
 28327                                  	;MOVSB
 28328                                  ;EVENWRT:
 28329                                  	;REP	MOVSW
 28330                                  
 28331                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 28332                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Transfer memory block.
 28333                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Buffer.
 28334                                  
 28335                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28336 00004E39 F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Transfer memory to Buffer.
 28337                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 28338                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 28339                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28340 00004E3B 7301                    	jnc	short EVENWRT ; **** 20/05/2019
 28341 00004E3D A4                      	movsb ; ****
 28342                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28343                                  	;adc	cx,0
 28344                                  	;rep	movsb
 28345                                  ;M039
 28346                                  EVENWRT: ; ****
 28347 00004E3E 07                              POP	ES
 28348                                  
 28349                                  ;hkn; SS override
 28350 00004E3F 36C51E[E205]                    LDS     BX,[SS:CURBUF]
 28351                                  
 28352                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28353 00004E44 F6470540                        TEST	byte [BX+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 28354                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 28355 00004E48 7507                            JNZ	short yesdirty10	;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 28356 00004E4A E8400E                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 28357                                  	
 28358                                  	;or	byte [bx+5],40h
 28359 00004E4D 804F0540                        OR	byte [BX+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 28360                                  yesdirty10:
 28361                                  	;;lea	si,[bx+16]
 28362                                  	;lea	si,[bx+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 28363 00004E51 8D7718                          LEA     SI,[BX+BUFINSIZ]
 28364 00004E54 29F7                            SUB     DI,SI                   ; Position in buffer
 28365                                  ;M039
 28366                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 28367                                  	;MOV	SI,DI
 28368                                  	;MOV	DI,BX
 28369                                  	;call	PLACEBUF
 28370                                  	;;cmp	si,[es:bp+2]
 28371                                  	;CMP	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Written last byte?
 28372                                  	;JB	short WBUFPLACED	; No, leave buf where it is
 28373                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 28374                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 28375                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28376                                  	;cmp	di,[es:bp+2]
 28377 00004E56 263B7E02                	CMP	di,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Written last byte?
 28378 00004E5A 7205                            JB	short WBUFPLACED	; No, leave buf where it is
 28379 00004E5C 36891E[6D00]                    MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],BX	; Make it prime candidate for
 28380                                  					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 28381                                  ;M039
 28382                                  
 28383                                  WBUFPLACED:
 28384 00004E61 F8                              CLC
 28385 00004E62 16                      	push	ss
 28386 00004E63 1F                      	pop	ds
 28387 00004E64 C3                              retn
 28388                                  
 28389                                  ;Break   <NEXTSEC -- Compute next sector to read or write>
 28390                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28391                                  ;
 28392                                  ; Procedure Name : NEXTSEC
 28393                                  ;
 28394                                  ; Compute the next sector to read or write
 28395                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 28396                                  ;
 28397                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28398                                  
 28399                                  NEXTSEC:
 28400 00004E65 F606[7405]FF            	test	byte [TRANS],0FFh ; -1 
 28401 00004E6A 7426                            JZ	short CLRET
 28402                                  
 28403 00004E6C A0[7305]                        MOV     AL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 28404 00004E6F FEC0                            INC     AL
 28405                                  	;cmp	al,[es:bp+4]
 28406 00004E71 263A4604                        CMP     AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 28407 00004E75 7618                            JBE	short SAVPOS
 28408                                  
 28409 00004E77 8B1E[BC05]                      MOV     BX,[CLUSNUM]
 28410 00004E7B E8B607                          call	IsEOF
 28411 00004E7E 7314                            JAE	short NONEXT
 28412                                  
 28413 00004E80 E8C807                          call	UNPACK
 28414 00004E83 720F                            JC	short NONEXT
 28415                                  clusgot:
 28416 00004E85 893E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],DI
 28417 00004E89 FF06[BA05]                      INC     word [LASTPOS]
 28418 00004E8D B000                            MOV     AL,0
 28419                                  SAVPOS:
 28420 00004E8F A2[7305]                        MOV     [SECCLUSPOS],AL
 28421                                  CLRET:
 28422 00004E92 F8                              CLC
 28423 00004E93 C3                              retn
 28424                                  NONEXT:
 28425 00004E94 F9                              STC
 28426 00004E95 C3                              retn
 28427                                  
 28428                                  ;Break	<OPTIMIZE -- DO A USER DISK REQUEST WELL>
 28429                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28430                                  ;
 28431                                  ; Procedure Name : OPTIMIZE
 28432                                  ;
 28433                                  ; Inputs:
 28434                                  ;       BX = Physical cluster
 28435                                  ;       CX = No. of records
 28436                                  ;       DL = sector within cluster
 28437                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 28438                                  ;       [NEXTADD] = transfer address
 28439                                  ; Outputs:
 28440                                  ;       AX = No. of records remaining
 28441                                  ;       BX = Transfer address
 28442                                  ;       CX = No. or records to be transferred
 28443                                  ;       DX = Physical sector address            (LOW)
 28444                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR] = Physical sector address (HIGH)
 28445                                  ;       DI = Next cluster
 28446                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Last cluster accessed
 28447                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 28448                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28449                                  ; ES:BP unchanged. Note that segment of transfer not set.
 28450                                  ;
 28451                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28452                                  
 28453                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28454                                  OPTIMIZE:
 28455 00004E96 52                      	PUSH    DX
 28456 00004E97 53                              PUSH    BX
 28457                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 28458 00004E98 268A4604                        MOV     AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 28459 00004E9C FEC0                            INC     AL              ; Number of sectors per cluster
 28460 00004E9E 88C4                            MOV     AH,AL
 28461 00004EA0 28D0                            SUB     AL,DL           ; AL = Number of sectors left in first cluster
 28462 00004EA2 89CA                            MOV     DX,CX
 28463                                  	;MOV	CX,0
 28464                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28465                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28466 00004EA4 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx	; sub cx,cx
 28467                                  OPTCLUS:
 28468                                  ; AL has number of sectors available in current cluster
 28469                                  ; AH has number of sectors available in next cluster
 28470                                  ; BX has current physical cluster
 28471                                  ; CX has number of sequential sectors found so far
 28472                                  ; DX has number of sectors left to transfer
 28473                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 28474                                  ; ES:SI has FAT pointer
 28475                                  
 28476                                  do_norm3:
 28477 00004EA6 E8A207                          call	UNPACK
 28478 00004EA9 7236                            JC	short OP_ERR
 28479                                  clusgot2:
 28480 00004EAB 00C1                    	ADD	CL,AL
 28481 00004EAD 80D500                          ADC     CH,0
 28482 00004EB0 39D1                            CMP     CX,DX
 28483 00004EB2 7332                            JAE	short BLKDON
 28484 00004EB4 88E0                            MOV     AL,AH
 28485 00004EB6 43                              INC     BX
 28486 00004EB7 39DF                            CMP     DI,BX
 28487 00004EB9 74EB                            JZ	short OPTCLUS
 28488 00004EBB 4B                              DEC     BX
 28489                                  FINCLUS:
 28490 00004EBC 891E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],BX    ; Last cluster accessed
 28491 00004EC0 29CA                            SUB     DX,CX           ; Number of sectors still needed
 28492 00004EC2 52                              PUSH    DX
 28493 00004EC3 89C8                            MOV     AX,CX
 28494                                  	;mul	word[ES:BP+2]
 28495 00004EC5 26F76602                        MUL	word [ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] 
 28496                                  				; Number of sectors times sector size
 28497 00004EC9 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 28498 00004ECD 01F0                            ADD     AX,SI           ; Adjust by size of transfer
 28499 00004ECF A3[B805]                        MOV     [NEXTADD],AX
 28500 00004ED2 58                              POP     AX              ; Number of sectors still needed
 28501 00004ED3 5A                              POP     DX              ; Starting cluster
 28502 00004ED4 29D3                            SUB     BX,DX           ; Number of new clusters accessed
 28503 00004ED6 011E[BA05]                      ADD     [LASTPOS],BX
 28504 00004EDA 5B                              POP     BX              ; BL = sector position within cluster
 28505 00004EDB E81600                  	call	FIGREC
 28506 00004EDE 89F3                            MOV     BX,SI
 28507                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28508                                  	; cf=0 (at the return of FIGREC)
 28509                                  	;CLC
 28510 00004EE0 C3                              retn
 28511                                  OP_ERR:
 28512 00004EE1 83C404                          ADD     SP,4
 28513 00004EE4 F9                      	STC
 28514 00004EE5 C3                              retn
 28515                                  BLKDON:
 28516 00004EE6 29D1                            SUB     CX,DX           ; Number of sectors in cluster we don't want
 28517 00004EE8 28CC                            SUB     AH,CL           ; Number of sectors in cluster we accepted
 28518 00004EEA FECC                            DEC     AH              ; Adjust to mean position within cluster
 28519 00004EEC 8826[7305]                      MOV     [SECCLUSPOS],AH
 28520 00004EF0 89D1                            MOV     CX,DX           ; Anyway, make the total equal to the request
 28521 00004EF2 EBC8                            JMP     SHORT FINCLUS
 28522                                  
 28523                                  ;Break	<FIGREC -- Figure sector in allocation unit>
 28524                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28525                                  ;
 28526                                  ; Procedure Name : FIGREC
 28527                                  ;
 28528                                  ; Inputs:
 28529                                  ;       DX = Physical cluster number
 28530                                  ;       BL = Sector position within cluster
 28531                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 28532                                  ; Outputs:
 28533                                  ;       DX = physical sector number           (LOW)
 28534                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR] Physical sector address (HIGH)
 28535                                  ; No other registers affected.
 28536                                  ;
 28537                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28538                                  
 28539                                  	; 10/06/2019
 28540                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28541                                  	; DOSCODE:8D96h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 28542                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28543                                  	; DOSCODE:8D5Bh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)	
 28544                                  FIGREC:
 28545 00004EF4 51                              PUSH    CX
 28546                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]

 28548 00004EF9 4A                              DEC     DX
 28549 00004EFA 4A                              DEC     DX
 28550

 28553                                  
 28554                                  ;hkn; SS override HIGH_SECTOR
 28555                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28556 00004EFB 36C706[0706]0000        	MOV	word [SS:HIGH_SECTOR],0		;F.C. >32mb
 28557                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28558 00004F02 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch				;F.C. >32mb
 28559 00004F04 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL				;F.C. >32mb
 28560 00004F06 740C                    	JZ	short noshift			;F.C. >32mb
 28561 00004F08 30ED                    	XOR	CH,CH				;F.C. >32mb
 28562                                  rotleft:					;F.C. >32mb
 28563 00004F0A F8                      	CLC					;F.C. >32mb
 28564 00004F0B D1D2                    	RCL	DX,1				;F.C. >32mb
 28565                                  	; 10/06/2019
 28566 00004F0D 36D116[0706]            	RCL	word [ss:HIGH_SECTOR],1		;F.C. >32mb
 28567 00004F12 E2F6                    	LOOP	rotleft				;F.C. >32mb
 28568                                  noshift:
 28569                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 28570 00004F14 08DA                            OR      DL,BL
 28571                                  	;add	dx,[es:bp+0Bh]
 28572 00004F16 2603560B                        ADD     DX,[ES:BP+DPB.FIRST_SECTOR]

 28576                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28577                                  	; cx=0
 28578 00004F1A 36110E[0706]            	ADC	word [ss:HIGH_SECTOR],cx ; 0
 28579

 28582                                  figrec_retn:
