 40509                                  ; 14/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 40510                                  ; LOCK_CHECK
 40511                                  ;MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 40512                                  
 40513                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40514                                  ; Inputs:
 40515                                  ;	Outputs of SETUP
 40516                                  ;	[USER_ID] Set
 40517                                  ;	[PROC_ID] Set
 40518                                  ; Function:
 40519                                  ;	Check for lock violations on local I/O
 40520                                  ;	Retries are attempted with sleeps in between
 40521                                  ; Outputs:
 40522                                  ;    Carry clear
 40523                                  ;	Operation is OK
 40524                                  ;    Carry set
 40525                                  ;	A lock violation detected
 40526                                  ; Outputs of SETUP preserved
 40527                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40528                                  
 40529                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 40530                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 40531                                  LOCK_CHECK:
 40532 00007437 8B1E[1A00]              	MOV	BX,[RetryCount]	; Number retries
 40533                                  LockRetry:
 40534 0000743B 53                      	push	bx		; save regs
 40535 0000743C 50                      	push	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 40536                                  
 40537                                  	;MSDOS 3.3
 40538                                  	;Call	far [ss:JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 40539                                  	;MSDOS 6.0
 40540 0000743D FF1E[B000]              	Call	far [JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 40541                                  
 40542 00007441 58                      	pop	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 40543 00007442 5B                      	pop	bx		; restrore regs
 40544 00007443 7307                    	jnc	short lc_ret_label ; There are no locks (retnc)
 40545                                  LockN:
 40546 00007445 E8AD9E                  	call	Idle		; wait a while
 40547 00007448 4B                      	DEC	BX		; remember a retry
 40548 00007449 75F0                    	JNZ	short LockRetry	; more retries left...
 40549 0000744B F9                      	STC
 40550                                  lc_ret_label:
 40551 0000744C C3                      	retn
 40552                                  
 40553                                  ; 14/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 40554                                  ; LOCK_VIOLATION
 40555                                  ;MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 40556                                  
 40557                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40558                                  ; Inputs:
 40559                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 40560                                  ;	[READOP] indicates whether error on read or write
 40561                                  ; Function:
 40562                                  ;	Handle Lock violation on compatibility (FCB) mode SFTs
 40563                                  ; Outputs:
 40564                                  ;	Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_lock_violation
 40565                                  ;	Carry clear if user wants a retry
 40566                                  ;
 40567                                  ; DS, ES, DI, CX preserved, others destroyed
 40568                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40569                                  
 40570                                  LOCK_VIOLATION:
 40571 0000744D 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 40572 0000744E 06                      	PUSH	ES
 40573 0000744F 57                      	PUSH	DI
 40574 00007450 51                      	PUSH	CX
 40575                                  	;mov	ax,21h
 40576 00007451 B82100                  	MOV	AX,error_lock_violation
 40577                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 40578 00007454 C606[4B03]18            	MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 40579 00007459 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 40580 0000745D BF0100                  	MOV	DI,1		; Fake some registers
 40581 00007460 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 40582                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+11]
 40583 00007462 268B560B                	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.FIRST_SECTOR]
 40584 00007466 E8A8DF                  	call	HARDERR
 40585 00007469 59                      	POP	CX
 40586 0000746A 5F                      	POP	DI
 40587 0000746B 07                      	POP	ES
 40588 0000746C 1F                      	POP	DS
 40589 0000746D 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1
 40590 0000746F 74DB                    	jz	short lc_ret_label ; 1 = retry, carry clear
 40591 00007471 F9                      	STC
 40592 00007472 C3                      	retn
 40593                                  
 40594                                  ; 14/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 40595                                  
 40596                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40597                                  
 40598                                  ;	do a retz to return error
 40599                                  
 40600                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 40601                                  CheckShare:
 40602                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 40603                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:fShare],0
 40604                                  	;retn
 40605                                  
 40606                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 40607 00007473 1E                      	push	ds			;smr;
 40608                                  	;getdseg <ds>			; ds -> dosdata
 40609 00007474 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 40610 00007479 803E[0303]00            	cmp	byte [fShare],0
 40611 0000747E 1F                      	pop	ds			;smr;
 40612 0000747F C3                      	retn
 40613                                  	
 40614                                  ;============================================================================
 40615                                  ; SHARE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 40616                                  ;============================================================================
 40617                                  ; 14/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 40618                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 40619                                  
 40620                                  ; SHARE_CHECK
 40621                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40622                                  ; Inputs:
 40623                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to filled in local file/device SFT for new
 40624                                  ;               instance of file sf_mode ALWAYS has mode (even on FCB SFTs)
 40625                                  ;       [WFP_START] has full path of name
 40626                                  ;       [USER_ID] Set
 40627                                  ;       [PROC_ID] Set
 40628                                  ; Function:
 40629                                  ;       Check for sharing violations on local file/device access
 40630                                  ; Outputs:
 40631                                  ;    Carry clear
 40632                                  ;       Sharing approved
 40633                                  ;    Carry set
 40634                                  ;       A sharing violation detected
 40635                                  ;           AX is error code
 40636                                  ; USES    ALL but DS
 40637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40638                                  
 40639                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 40640                                  SHARE_CHECK:
 40641                                  	; 26/07/2019
 40642 00007480 FF1E[9400]              	call	far [JShare+(1*4)] 	; 1 = MFT_Enter
 40643                                  shchk_retn:
 40644 00007484 C3                      	retn
 40645                                  
 40646                                  ; SHARE_VIOLATION
 40647                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40648                                  ; Inputs:
 40649                                  ;       [THISDPB] Set
 40650                                  ;       AX has error code
 40651                                  ; Function:
 40652                                  ;       Handle Sharing errors
 40653                                  ; Outputs:
 40654                                  ;       Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_sharing_violation
 40655                                  ;       Carry clear if user wants a retry
 40656                                  ;
 40657                                  ; DS, ES, DI preserved, others destroyed
 40658                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40659                                  
 40660                                  SHARE_VIOLATION:
 40661 00007485 1E                      	PUSH    DS
 40662 00007486 06                      	PUSH	ES
 40663 00007487 57                      	PUSH    DI
 40664 00007488 C606[7505]00            	MOV     byte [READOP],0		; All share errors are reading
 40665                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 40666 0000748D C606[4B03]18            	MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 40667 00007492 C42E[8A05]              	LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 40668 00007496 BF0100                  	MOV     DI,1			; Fake some registers
 40669 00007499 89F9                    	MOV     CX,DI
 40670                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+17]
 40671 0000749B 268B5611                	MOV     DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]
 40672 0000749F E86FDF                  	call	HARDERR
 40673 000074A2 5F                      	POP     DI
 40674 000074A3 07                      	POP	ES
 40675 000074A4 1F                      	POP     DS
 40676 000074A5 3C01                    	CMP     AL,1
 40677 000074A7 74DB                    	jz	short shchk_retn	; 1 = retry, carry clear
 40678 000074A9 F9                      	STC
 40679 000074AA C3                      	retn
 40680                                  
 40681                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40682                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 40683                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 40684                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 40685                                  ;
 40686                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 40687                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 40688                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 40689                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40690                                  
 40691                                  ShareEnd:
 40692                                  	; 26/07/2019
 40693 000074AB FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 40694 000074AF C3                      	retn
 40695                                  
 40696                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 40697                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40698                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 40699                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 40700                                  ;
 40701                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 40702                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 40703                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 40704                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 40705                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 40706                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40707                                  
 40708                                  ShareEnter:
 40709 000074B0 51                      	push	cx
 40710                                  retry:
 40711 000074B1 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 40712                                  attempt:
 40713 000074B5 C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 40714 000074B9 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 40715                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],axfff
 40716 000074BB 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 40717 000074BF 51                      	push	cx
 40718 000074C0 E8BDFF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 40719 000074C3 59                      	pop	cx
 40720 000074C4 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 40721 000074C6 E82C9E                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 40722 000074C9 E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 40723 000074CB E8B7FF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 40724 000074CE 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 40725                                  done:
 40726 000074D0 59                      	pop	cx
 40727 000074D1 C3                      	retn
 40728

 40730                                  ; EXEPATCH.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 40731                                  ;============================================================================
 40732                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0
 40733                                  
 40734                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 40735                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40736                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 40737                                  ;
 40738                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 40739                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 40740                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code
 40741                                  ;
 40742                                  ;	Revision history:
 40743                                  ;
 40744                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90
 40745                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40746                                  
 40747                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40748                                  ;
 40749                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 40750                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 40751                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 40752                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 40753                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 40754                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 40755                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 40756                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 40757                                  ;
 40758                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40759                                  
 40760                                  PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	EQU	06CH
 40761                                  PATCH1_OFFSET		EQU	028H
 40762                                  PATCH1_CHKSUM		EQU	0EF4EH
 40763                                  CHKSUM1_LEN		EQU	11CH/2 ; 142
 40764                                  
 40765                                  PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	EQU	076H
 40766                                  PATCH2_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 40767                                  
 40768                                  	; The strings that start at offset 076h have two possible 
 40769                                  	; check sums that are defined as PATCH2_CHKSUM PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 40770                                  
 40771                                  PATCH2_CHKSUM		EQU	78B2H
 40772                                  CHKSUM2_LEN		EQU	119H/2
 40773                                  PATCH2A_CHKSUM		EQU	1C47H		; M046
 40774                                  CHKSUM2A_LEN		EQU	103H/2		; M046
 40775                                  
 40776                                  PATCH3_COM_OFFSET	EQU	074H
 40777                                  PATCH3_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 40778                                  PATCH3_CHKSUM		EQU	4EDEH
 40779                                  CHKSUM3_LEN		EQU	117H/2

 40782                                  ;
 40783                                  ;struc ERStruc
 40784                                  ; .ER_Reserved:	resw	1	; reserved, should be zero
 40785                                  ; .ER_Flags:	resw	1
 40786                                  ; .ER_ProgName:	resd	1	; ptr to ASCIIZ str of prog name
 40787                                  ; .ER_PSP:	resw	1	; PSP of the program
 40788                                  ; .ER_StartAddr: resd	1	; Start CS:IP of the program
 40789                                  ; .ER_ProgSize:	resd	1	; Program size including PSP
 40790                                  ; .size:
 40791                                  ;endstruc

 40797

 40799                                  	; DOSCODE:B37Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 40800                                  
 40801                                  ; M028 - BEGIN
 40802                                  
 40803                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40804                                  ;
 40805                                  ;	Procedure Name		: ExecReady
 40806                                  ;
 40807                                  ;	Input			: DS:DX -> ERStruc (see exe.inc)
 40808                                  ;

 40811                                  ExecReady:
 40812 000074D2 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; move the pointer into a friendly one
 40813                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 40814                                  	; 17/12/2022
 40815 000074D4 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 40816                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 40817 000074D8 7413                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 40818                                  
 40819                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 40820 000074DA 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 40821 000074DD 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 40822 000074E0 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 40823                                  
 40824                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 40825 000074E2 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 40826                                  	;mov	cx,[si+12]
 40827 000074E5 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 40828                                  
 40829                                  	;call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 40830 000074E8 36FF16[3912]            	call	word [ss:FixExePatch] ; 28/12/2022
 40831                                  	
 40832                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 40833                                  	;call	[ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 40834                                  
 40835                                  er_setver:
 40836                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 40837                                  	; 17/12/2022
 40838 000074ED F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 40839                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 40840 000074F1 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 40841                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 40842 000074F3 1E                      	push	ds
 40843 000074F4 56                      	push	si
 40844                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 40845 000074F5 C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 40846 000074F8 E876ED                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 40847 000074FB E887ED                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 40848 000074FE 5E                      	pop	si
 40849 000074FF 1F                      	pop	ds
 40850                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 40851 00007500 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 40852 00007503 36A1[100F]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 40853 00007507 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 40854                                  
 40855                                  er_chkdoshi:
 40856 0000750B 36803E[3812]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 40857 00007511 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 40858                                  
 40859                                  					; M068 - Start
 40860                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 40861 00007513 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 40862                                  
 40863                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 40864 00007516 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 40865                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 40866                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 40867                                  					; explanation
 40868                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 40869                                  	; 17/12/2022
 40870 0000751C F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 40871                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 40872 00007520 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 40873                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 40874 00007522 1E                         	push	ds
 40875 00007523 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 40876 00007525 E88E02                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 40877 00007528 1F                      	pop	ds
 40878                                  
 40879                                  er_setA20:
 40880                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 40881                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 40882                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 40883                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 40884                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 40885                                  
 40886 00007529 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 40887 0000752E 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 40888                                  					; turned OFF.
 40889                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 40890 00007532 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 40891 00007534 C3                      	retn
 40892

 40899                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40900                                  ;
 40901                                  ; procedure : Rational386Patch
 40902                                  ;
 40903                                  ; Older versions of the Rational DOS Extender have several bugs which trash
 40904                                  ; 386 registers (usually just the high word of 32 bit registers) during
 40905                                  ; interrupt processing. Lotus 123 3.1+ is a popular application that uses a
 40906                                  ; version of the Rational extender with the 32 bit register trashing bugs.
 40907                                  ;
 40908                                  ; This routine applies patches to the Rational DOS Extender to work around
 40909                                  ; most of the register trashing bugs.
 40910                                  ;
 40911                                  ; Note that there are additional register trashing bugs not fixed by these
 40912                                  ; patches. In particular, the high word of ESP and the FS and GS registers
 40913                                  ; may be modified on interrupts.
 40914                                  ;
 40915                                  ; There are two different Rational DOS Extender patchs in this module.
 40916                                  ; Rational386Patch is to correct 386 register trashing bugs on 386 or later
 40917                                  ; processors. This patch code is executed when MS-DOS is running on a 386
 40918                                  ; or later processor, regardless of whether MS-DOS is running in the HMA
 40919                                  ; or not.
 40920                                  ;
 40921                                  ; The other Rational patch routine (RationalPatch, below) fixes a register
 40922                                  ; trashing problem on 286 processors, and is only executed if MS-DOS is
 40923                                  ; running in the HMA.
 40924                                  ;
 40925                                  ; This patch detection and replacement is based on an example supplied by
 40926                                  ; Ben Williams at Rational.
 40927                                  ;
 40928                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40929                                  
 40930                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 40931                                  ; DOSCODE:B448h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 40932                                  
 40933                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40934                                  ;
 40935                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 40936                                  ;
 40937                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40938                                  
 40939                                  rpFind1:
 40940                                  	db	0FAh, 0E4h, 21h, 60h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 43h, 8Bh, 16h
 40941                                  
 40942                                  rpFind1Len equ	$ - rpFind1
 40943                                  
 40944                                  ;	cli
 40945                                  ;	in	al, 21h
 40946                                  ;	pusha
 40947                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 40948                                  ;	out	43h, al
 40949                                  ;	mov	dx, ...
 40950                                  
 40951                                  rpFind1a:
 40952                                  	db	0B0h, 0Eh, 0E6h, 37h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 0F2h
 40953                                  
 40954                                  rpFind1aLen equ	$ - rpFind1a
 40955                                  
 40956                                  ;	mov	al, 0Eh
 40957                                  ;	out	37h, al
 40958                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 40959                                  ;	out	0F2h, al
 40960                                  
 40961                                  ; bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 40962                                  
 40963                                  rpFind2:
 40964                                  	db	0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 40965                                  
 40966                                  rpFind2Len equ	$ - rpFind2
 40967                                  
 40968                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0	;may be preceeded by PUSH CX (51h)
 40969                                  
 40970                                  rpFind3:
 40971                                  	db	0Fh, 22h, 0C0h, 0EAh
 40972                                  
 40973                                  rpFind3Len equ	$ - rpFind3
 40974                                  
 40975                                  ;	mov	cr0, eax	;may be preceeded by POP CX (59h)
 40976                                  ;	jmp	far ptr xxx	;change far ptr to go to replace3
 40977                                  ;	mov	ss, bx		;8E D3 ... and come back at or after this
 40978                                  
 40979                                  ; note, there is no rpRepl1 string
 40980                                  
 40981                                  rpRepl2:
 40982                                   	db	66h, 50h, 51h, 0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 40983                                  
 40984                                  rpRepl2Len equ	$ - rpRepl2
 40985                                  
 40986                                  ;	push	eax
 40987                                  ;	push	cx
 40988                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0
 40989                                  
 40990                                  rpRepl3:
 40991                                  	db	8Eh, 0D3h, 59h, 66h, 58h
 40992                                  
 40993                                  rpRepl3Len equ	$ - rpRepl3
 40994                                  
 40995                                  ;	mov	ss, bx
 40996                                  ;	pop	cx
 40997                                  ;	pop	eax
 40998                                  
 40999                                  ; bug # 2 -- loss of high EAX and ESI on 386+ only if VCPI
 41000                                  
 41001                                  rpFind4:
 41002                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 41003                                  
 41004                                  rpFind4Len equ	$ - rpFind4
 41005                                  
 41006                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 41007                                  ;	pop	ax
 41008                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 41009                                  
 41010                                  rpFind5:
 41011                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 0CDh, 67h, 8Bh, 0E1h, 0FFh, 0E3h
 41012                                  
 41013                                  rpFind5Len equ	$ - rpFind5
 41014                                  
 41015                                  ;	mov	ax, DE0Ch
 41016                                  ;	int	67h
 41017                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 41018                                  ;	jmp	bx
 41019                                  
 41020                                  rpRepl4:
 41021                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 41022                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 0A3h
 41023                                  
 41024                                  rpRepl4o1Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 41025                                  
 41026                                  	db	00h, 00h
 41027                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 89h, 36h
 41028                                  
 41029                                  rpRepl4o2Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 41030                                  
 41031                                  	db	00h, 00h
 41032                                  
 41033                                  rpRepl4Len equ	$ - rpRepl4
 41034                                  
 41035                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 41036                                  ;	pop	ax
 41037                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 41038                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], eax
 41039                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], esi
 41040                                  
 41041                                  rpRepl5:
 41042                                  	db	8Bh, 0E1h
 41043                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 0A1h
 41044                                  
 41045                                  rpRepl5o1Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 41046                                  
 41047                                  	db	00h, 00h
 41048                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 8Bh, 36h
 41049                                  
 41050                                  rpRepl5o2Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 41051                                  
 41052                                  	db	00h, 00h
 41053                                  	db	0FFh, 0E3h
 41054                                  
 41055                                  rpRepl5Len equ	$ - rpRepl5
 41056                                  
 41057                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 41058                                  ;	mov	eax, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 41059                                  ;	mov	esi, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 41060                                  ;	jmp	bx
 41061                                  
 41062                                  ; bug # 3 -- loss of high EAX, EBX, ECX, EDX on 386+ only if VCPI
 41063                                  
 41064                                  rpFind6:
 41065                                  	db	0FAh, 52h, 51h
 41066                                  
 41067                                  rpFind6Len equ	$ - rpFind6
 41068                                  
 41069                                  ;	cli
 41070                                  ;	push	dx
 41071                                  ;	push	cx
 41072                                  
 41073                                  rpFind7a:
 41074                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 66h, 26h, 0FFh, 1Eh
 41075                                  
 41076                                  rpFind7aLen equ	$ - rpFind7a
 41077                                  
 41078                                  ;	mov	ax, 0DE0Ch
 41079                                  ;	call	fword ptr es:[xxxx]
 41080                                  
 41081                                  rpFind7b:
 41082                                  	db	59h, 5Ah, 5Bh
 41083                                  
 41084                                  rpFind7bLen equ	$ - rpFind7b
 41085                                  
 41086                                  ;	pop	cx
 41087                                  ;	pop	dx
 41088                                  ;	pop	bx
 41089                                  
 41090                                  rpRepl6 :
 41091                                  	db	0FAh, 66h, 50h, 66h, 53h, 66h, 51h, 66h, 52h
 41092                                  
 41093                                  rpRepl6Len equ	$ - rpRepl6
 41094                                  
 41095                                  ;	cli
 41096                                  ;	push	eax
 41097                                  ;	push	ebx
 41098                                  ;	push	ecx
 41099                                  ;	push	edx
 41100                                  
 41101                                  rpRepl7:
 41102                                  	db	66h, 5Ah, 66h, 59h, 66h, 5Bh, 66h, 58h, 5Bh
 41103                                  
 41104                                  rpRepl7Len equ	$ - rpRepl7
 41105                                  
 41106                                  ;	pop	edx
 41107                                  ;	pop	ecx
 41108                                  ;	pop	ebx
 41109                                  ;	pop	eax
 41110                                  ;	pop	bx
 41111                                  
 41112                                  ; bug # 4 -- loss of high EAX and EBX on 386+ only if VCPI
 41113                                  
 41114                                  rpFind8:
 41115                                   	db	60h, 06h, 1Eh, 0B8h, 00h, 00h, 8Eh, 0D8h
 41116                                  
 41117                                  rpFind8Len equ	$ - rpFind8
 41118                                  
 41119                                  ;	pusha
 41120                                  ;	push	es
 41121                                  ;	push	ds
 41122                                  ;	mov	ax, dgroup	;jump back to here from replace8
 41123                                  ;	mov	ds, ax
 41124                                  
 41125                                  rpFind9 :
 41126                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 61h
 41127                                  
 41128                                  rpFind9Len equ	$ - rpFind9
 41129                                  
 41130                                  ;	pop	ds
 41131                                  ;	pop	es
 41132                                  ;	popa
 41133                                  
 41134                                  rpRepl8:
 41135                                   	db	66h, 60h, 06h, 1Eh
 41136                                  
 41137                                  rpRepl8Len equ	$ - rpRepl8
 41138                                  
 41139                                  ;	pushad
 41140                                  ;	push	es
 41141                                  ;	push	ds
 41142                                  
 41143                                  rpRepl9:
 41144                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 66h, 61h, 0C3h
 41145                                  
 41146                                  rpRepl9Len equ	$ - rpRepl9
 41147                                  
 41148                                  ;	pop	ds
 41149                                  ;	pop	es
 41150                                  ;	popad
 41151                                  ;	retn			;no need to jmp back to main-line
 41152                                  
 41153                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41154                                  
 41155                                  struc SearchPair
 41156                                   .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 41157                                   .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 41158                                   .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 41159                                   .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 41160                                   .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 41161                                   .size:
 41162                                  endstruc
 41163                                  
 41164                                  ;rpBug1Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind2, rpFind2Len, offset rpFind3, rpFind3Len, 20h>
 41165                                  
 41166                                  rpBug1Strs:

 41168                                  	dw	rpFind2Len ; 3
 41169                                  	dw	rpFind3
 41170                                  	dw	rpFind3Len ; 4
 41171                                  	dw	20h
 41172

 41174

 41178                                  	dw	rpFind5
 41179                                  	dw	rpFind5Len ; 9

 41183

 41186                                  	dw	rpFind6Len ; 3
 41187                                  	dw	rpFind7a
 41188                                  	dw	rpFind7aLen ; 7
 41189                                  	dw	80h
 41190

 41200                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41201                                  
 41202                                  struc StackVars
 41203                                   .sv_wVersion:	resw 1		; Rational extender version #
 41204                                   .sv_cbCodeSeg: resw 1		; code seg size to scan
 41205                                   .sv_pPatch:	resw 1		; offset of next avail patch byte
 41206                                   .size:

 41209                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41210                                  
 41211                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 41212                                  
 41213                                  Rational386Patch:
 41214                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 41215                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 41216                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 41217                                  
 41218                                  	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 41219                                  	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 41220                                  
 41221                                  	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 41222                                  	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 41223                                  
 41224                                  	push	ax
 41225                                  
 41226                                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 41227                                  	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 41228                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 41229                                  	cmp	[es:28],ax
 41230                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 41231                                  	cmp	[es:36],ax
 41232                                  	je	short rp3Maybe
 41233                                  rp3QO_ax:
 41234                                  	pop	ax
 41235                                  rp3QuickOut:
 41236                                  	retn
 41237                                  
 41238                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 41239                                  
 41240                                  rp3Maybe:
 41241                                  	cld
 41242                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 41243                                  	push	cx
 41244                                  	push	dx
 41245                                  	push	si
 41246                                  	push	di
 41247                                  	push	es
 41248                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 41249                                  	push	bp
 41250                                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 41251                                  	mov	bp,sp
 41252                                  
 41253                                  	push	cs
 41254                                  	pop	ds
 41255                                  
 41256                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 41257                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 41258                                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 41259                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 41260                                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 41261                                  	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 41262                                  
 41263                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 41264                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 41265                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 41266                                  ; an 80286 system.
 41267                                  
 41268                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 41269                                  
 41270                                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 41271                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 41272                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 41273                                  
 41274                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 41275                                  
 41276                                  	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 41277                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 41278                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 41279                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 41280                                  
 41281                                  ; According to Rational, some very old versions of the extender may not
 41282                                  ; have the find1 code sequence. If the find1 code wasn't found above,
 41283                                  ; try an alternative patch area which is on top of NEC 98xx switching code.
 41284                                  
 41285                                  	mov	si,rpFind1a
 41286                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1aLen  ;8
 41287                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 41288                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 41289                                  
 41290                                  rp3Exit_j:
 41291                                  	jmp	rp3Exit
 41292                                  
 41293                                  ; Found the location to write patch code! DI = offset in code seg.
 41294                                  
 41295                                  rpGotPatch:
 41296                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 41297                                  	mov	[bp-StackVars.sv_pPatch],di	; save patch pointer
 41298                                  
 41299                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41300                                  ; Bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 41301                                  
 41302                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],381
 41303                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],381 ; only need bug 1 if version
 41304                                  	cmp	word [bp],381
 41305                                  	jae	short rpBug2			;   < 3.81
 41306                                  
 41307                                  	mov	bx,rpBug1Strs			; locate find2 & find3 code
 41308                                  	call	FindBadCode
 41309                                  	jc	short rpBug2
 41310                                  
 41311                                  ; si = rpFind2 offset, di = rpFind3 offset
 41312                                  
 41313                                  	push	di
 41314                                  	mov	di,si				; rpFind2 offset
 41315                                  	mov	dx,rpFind2Len ; 3
 41316                                  
 41317                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],51h	 	; find2 preceeded by push cx?
 41318                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx
 41319                                  
 41320                                  	dec	di				;   yes, gobble up push cx too
 41321                                  	inc	dx
 41322                                  rp_no_cx:
 41323                                  	mov	si,rpRepl2			; patch out find2 sequence
 41324                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl2Len  ; 6
 41325                                  	call	GenPatch
 41326                                  
 41327                                  	pop	di				; rpFind3 offset
 41328                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],59h 		; find3 preceeded by pop cx?
 41329                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx2
 41330                                  
 41331                                  	mov	byte [es:di-1],90h		;   yes, no-op it
 41332                                  rp_no_cx2:
 41333                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 41334                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; change offset of far jmp
 41335                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],ax
 41336                                  	mov	[es:di+rpFind3Len],ax		;   to go to patch code
 41337                                  
 41338                                  	push	di				; save find3 offset
 41339                                  	mov	si,rpRepl3			; copy repl3 to patch area
 41340                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl3Len ; 5
 41341                                  	call	CopyPatch
 41342                                  
 41343                                  	pop	bx				; find3 offset
 41344                                  	add	bx,rpFind3Len+4	 ; 8		; skip over find3 and far jmp
 41345                                  	call	GenJump 			; jmp back from patch area
 41346                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 41347                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch], di	;   to main-line, update patch
 41348                                  						;   area pointer
 41349                                  
 41350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41351                                  ; Bug # 2 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 41352                                  
 41353                                  rpBug2:
 41354                                  	mov	bx,rpBug2Strs			; locate find4 & find5 code
 41355                                  	call	FindBadCode
 41356                                  	jc	short rpBug3
 41357                                  
 41358                                  ; si = rpFind4 offset, di = rpFind5 offset
 41359                                  
 41360                                  	;push	word [bp+4]
 41361                                  	push	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; save current patch pointer
 41362                                  						;   (where repl4 goes)
 41363                                  	push	di				; save find5 offset
 41364                                  
 41365                                  	mov	di,si
 41366                                  	mov	dx,rpFind4Len ; 4
 41367                                  	mov	si,rpRepl4
 41368                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl4Len ; 15
 41369                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find4 code
 41370                                  
 41371                                  	pop	di				; find5 offset
 41372                                  	add	di,5				; keep 5 bytes of find5 code
 41373                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 41374                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; jump to patch area
 41375                                  	push	bx				; save repl5 location
 41376                                  	call	GenJump
 41377                                  
 41378                                  	mov	si,rpRepl5			; copy repl5 code to patch
 41379                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl5Len  ; 15		;   area -- it has a jmp bx
 41380                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no need to jmp back to
 41381                                  						;   main-line code
 41382                                  
 41383                                  ; patches have been made, now update the patch code to store/load dwords just
 41384                                  ; after the code in the patch area
 41385                                  
 41386                                  	pop	di				; repl5 location
 41387                                  	pop	si				; repl4 location
 41388                                  
 41389                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 41390                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; (where dwords go)
 41391                                  
 41392                                  	;mov	[es:si+7],ax
 41393                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o1Len],ax		; offset for EAX
 41394                                  	;mov	[es:di+5],ax
 41395                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o1Len],ax
 41396                                  	add	ax,4
 41397                                  	;mov	[es:si+0Dh],ax
 41398                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o2Len],ax		; offset for ESI
 41399                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Bh],ax
 41400                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o2Len],ax
 41401                                  
 41402                                  	;add	word [bp+4],8
 41403                                  	add	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],8	; reserve space for 2 dwords in
 41404                                  						; patch area
 41405                                  
 41406                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41407                                  ; Bug # 3 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 41408                                  
 41409                                  rpBug3:
 41410                                  	mov	bx,rpBug3Strs			; locate find6 & find7a code
 41411                                  	call	FindBadCode
 41412                                  	jc	short rpBug4
 41413                                  
 41414                                  	;add	di,9
 41415                                  	add	di,rpFind7aLen + 2		; skip over offset in find7a
 41416                                  	push	si				;   code and locate find7b
 41417                                  	mov	si,rpFind7b			;   sequence
 41418                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 41419                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di
 41420                                  	pop	si
 41421                                  	jnz	short rpBug4
 41422                                  
 41423                                  	push	di				; save find7b code offset
 41424                                  
 41425                                  	mov	di,si
 41426                                  	mov	dx,rpFind6Len ; 3
 41427                                  	mov	si,rpRepl6
 41428                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl6Len ; 9
 41429                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find6 code
 41430                                  
 41431                                  	pop	di
 41432                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 41433                                  	mov	si,rpRepl7
 41434                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl7Len ; 9
 41435                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find7b code
 41436                                  
 41437                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41438                                  ; Bug # 4 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 41439                                  
 41440                                  rpBug4:
 41441                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],360
 41442                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],360 ; only applies if 
 41443                                  	cmp	word [bp],360
 41444                                  	jbe	short rp3Exit 			; version > 3.60 and < 3.95
 41445                                  
 41446                                  	mov	bx,rpBug4Strs			; locate find8 & find9 code
 41447                                  	call	FindBadCode
 41448                                  	jc	short rp3Exit
 41449                                  
 41450                                  	push	di				; save find9 code offset
 41451                                  
 41452                                  	mov	di,si
 41453                                  	mov	dx,3
 41454                                  	mov	si,rpRepl8
 41455                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl8Len ; 4
 41456                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find8 code
 41457                                  
 41458                                  	pop	di				; find9 offset
 41459                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 41460                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; patch find9 to jmp to
 41461                                  	call	GenJump 			;   patch area
 41462                                  
 41463                                  	mov	si,rpRepl9			; copy replacement code to
 41464                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl9Len ; 5		;   patch area--it does a RET
 41465                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no jmp back to main-line
 41466                                  
 41467                                  rp3Exit:
 41468                                  	add	sp,StackVars.size
 41469                                  	pop	bp
 41470                                  	pop	ds
 41471                                  	pop	es
 41472                                  	pop	di
 41473                                  	pop	si
 41474                                  	pop	dx
 41475                                  	pop	cx
 41476                                  	pop	bx
 41477                                  	pop	ax
 41478                                  	retn
 41479                                  
 41480                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41481                                  ;
 41482                                  ; FindBadCode
 41483                                  ;
 41484                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 41485                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 41486                                  ;
 41487                                  ; Entry:
 41488                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 41489                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 41490                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 41491                                  ;
 41492                                  ; Exit:
 41493                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 41494                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 41495                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 41496                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 41497                                  ;
 41498                                  ; Used:
 41499                                  ;	CX
 41500                                  ;
 41501                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41502                                  
 41503                                  ;struc SearchPair
 41504                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 41505                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 41506                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 41507                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 41508                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 41509                                  ; .size:
 41510                                  ;endstruc
 41511                                  
 41512                                  FindBadCode:
 41513                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 41514                                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 41515                                  
 41516                                  	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 41517                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 41518                                  	
 41519                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 41520                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 41521                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 41522                                  	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 41523                                  
 41524                                  	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 41525                                  
 41526                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 41527                                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 41528                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 41529                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 41530                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 41531                                  
 41532                                  	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 41533                                  	jnz	short fbc_error
 41534                                  
 41535                                  	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 41536                                  	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 41537                                  	jc	short fbc_error
 41538                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 41539                                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 41540                                  	ja	short fbc_error
 41541                                  
 41542                                  	clc
 41543                                  	retn
 41544                                  
 41545                                  fbc_error:
 41546                                  	stc
 41547                                  	retn
 41548                                  
 41549                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41550                                  ;
 41551                                  ; GenPatch
 41552                                  ;
 41553                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 41554                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 41555                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 41556                                  ; code.
 41557                                  ;
 41558                                  ; Entry:
 41559                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 41560                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 41561                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 41562                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 41563                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 41564                                  ;
 41565                                  ; Exit:
 41566                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 41567                                  ;
 41568                                  ; Used:
 41569                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 41570                                  ;
 41571                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41572                                  
 41573                                  GenPatch:
 41574                                  	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 41575                                  
 41576                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 41577                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 41578                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 41579                                  	call	GenJump
 41580                                  
 41581                                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 41582                                  
 41583                                  	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 41584                                  	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 41585                                  
 41586                                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 41587                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 41588                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 41589                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 41590                                  	retn
 41591                                  
 41592                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41593                                  ;
 41594                                  ; CopyPatch
 41595                                  ;
 41596                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 41597                                  ;
 41598                                  ; Entry:
 41599                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 41600                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 41601                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 41602                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 41603                                  ;
 41604                                  ; Exit:
 41605                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 41606                                  ;
 41607                                  ; Used:
 41608                                  ;	SI, Flags
 41609                                  ;
 41610                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41611                                  
 41612                                  CopyPatch:
 41613                                  	push	cx
 41614                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 41615                                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 41616                                  	cld
 41617                                  	rep movsb
 41618                                  	pop	cx
 41619                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 41620                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 41621                                  	retn
 41622                                  
 41623                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41624                                  ;
 41625                                  ; GenJump
 41626                                  ;
 41627                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 41628                                  ;
 41629                                  ; Entry:
 41630                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 41631                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 41632                                  ;
 41633                                  ; Exit:
 41634                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 41635                                  ;
 41636                                  ; Used:
 41637                                  ;	AX
 41638                                  ;
 41639                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41640                                  
 41641                                  GenJump:
 41642                                  	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 41643                                  	stosb
 41644                                  
 41645                                  	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 41646                                  	sub	ax,di
 41647                                  	sub	ax,2
 41648                                  
 41649                                  	stosw			; output offset
 41650                                  
 41651                                  	retn
 41652                                  
 41653                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41654                                  ;
 41655                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 41656                                  ;
 41657                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 41658                                  ;
 41659                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 41660                                  ;
 41661                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41662                                  
 41663                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 41664                                  	mov	di,200h
 41665                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 41666                                  	push	cx
 41667                                  	sub	cx,dx
 41668                                  	inc	cx
 41669                                  scsagain:
 41670                                  	push	si
 41671                                  	push	di
 41672                                  	push	cx
 41673                                  	mov	cx,dx
 41674                                  	rep	cmpsb
 41675                                  	pop	cx
 41676                                  	pop	di
 41677                                  	pop	si
 41678                                  	je	short scsfound
 41679                                  	inc	di
 41680                                  	loop	scsagain
 41681                                  scsfound:
 41682                                  	pop	cx
 41683                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 41684                                  	retn
 41685                                  	
 41686                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41687                                  ;
 41688                                  ; VerifyVersion
 41689                                  ;
 41690                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 41691                                  ; from ES:2A.
 41692                                  ;
 41693                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 41694                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 41695                                  ;
 41696                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41697                                  
 41698                                  VerifyVersion:
 41699                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 41700                                  					;  in ascii
 41701                                  	mov	bl,10
 41702                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 41703                                  
 41704                                  	call	VVDigit
 41705                                  	jne	short vvexit
 41706                                  	call	VVDigit
 41707                                  	jne	short vvexit
 41708                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 41709                                  	jne	short vvexit
 41710                                  	dec	si
 41711                                  	;call	VVDigit
 41712                                  	; 18/12/2022
 41713                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 41714                                  ;vvexit:
 41715                                  	;retn
 41716                                  VVDigit:
 41717                                  	div	bl
 41718                                  	add	ah,'0'
 41719                                  	dec	si
 41720                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 41721                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 41722                                  	retn
 41723                                  
 41724                                  %endif
 41725

 41985                                  	;call	ExePackPatch
